1b1(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ rje lo kya bi dza sa ma hA kal ba rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 
1b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems
1b3(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
1b4(rgyud): 'das ri rob ri'i rtse mo na rdo rje dang nong bu rin po che rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ byang chub
1b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang 'byung
2a1(rgyud): bo dang sha ra dang rjed byed dang ma mo rnams dang bltar rung ba dang bltar mi rung ba du ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
2a2(rgyud): mngon par dad pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po
2a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
2a4(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lha chen po la sogs pa sems
2a5(rgyud): can ma rungs pa de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ 
2a6(rgyud): saphyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshig/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas
2b1(rgyud): gsan nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so// gnod sbyin khyod shin tu/ khengs pa shin tu khro ba shin tu 'thur ba de/ ci ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags
2b2(rgyud): kyi cheg ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das bdag sams can ma rungs pa
2b3(rgyud): gang gi phyir zhe na/ bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can rnams dbang du bgyi ba la sogs pas btul nas/ bla na med pa'i bde ba la dgod par 'tshal lo// sems can ma
2b4(rgyud): rungs pa rnams pas pal sogs pas sbyangs te zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la legs pa zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje
2b5(rgyud): legs so legs so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang phan pa'i phyir dang bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di smos shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas lha thams cad nas mirnam pa
2b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas la skabs su dong shig/ nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig
2b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyi pa la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sum b+ha ni sum du hUM/ gr-ih+Na
2b8(rgyud): kr-ih+nA hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa la gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ An ya ha thAg lan badra hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu gsos
3a1(rgyud): so// 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul to// 'bar rab tu 'byur kun tu rab tu 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'ang
3a2(rgyud): ying yeng nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lhags nas/ khor khor yug dang por khyod mug chen po'i ril sogs pa tshun chad kyi gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
3a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams su tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas 'di skadas
3a4(rgyud): grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabs su 'gro bar khas long shig/ nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig/ de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'a
3a5(rgyud): gan rdo rjes klag ste/ 'dar yang yeng nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po'i lha dang mthu bo che dang tshangs pa rnams kyis
3a6(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar byin che zhing bdag cag la 'chos pa 'di su la kas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan
3a7(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa 'di glengs te gsungs so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid
3a8(rgyud): 'di// phyag nad rje gnad sbyin che// ma rungam 'tshas la dbang ba ste// gang gi ming brjod pa yis ni// sangs rgyas pa yang thob par 'gyur // de nas phyag na de bya grum sems dpa' chen pas
3b1(rgyud): gsungs pa/ tsA kye lha dag sangs rgyas la skabs bu dang la bar bka' bzhin du la dkyim shig/ rdo rje'ab rab gcig tu 'ab nga gyur ba 'di byed thams cad gtan srel par gyur cing/ de nas ltaldan
3b2(rgyud): bathams cad kyi 'di skad smras po// khyed ni ga dong snyed de ni lta ba pa ni dadakyis gnod sbyin gyi bzha 'a rjes su myong bar mi num po// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de thos nas thos te/ bcom ldan 'das la la
3b3(rgyud): smad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ma rungs pa sems cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bskos so// de bas dgal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na/ 
3b4(rgyud): ste khar 'tshal lo// de das bcom ldan das kyi sa byu chen po la 'di skad gsungs so// bems can chen po la yong shig/ 'dis khyong pa 'dad de/ denas ma ldan das na
3b5(rgyud): 9/ 'phe chen ga lams cad byed rnanams kyis 'di ba dag s+ho/ ma su sa su sbyid jus pa 'di dka' bzhin du byed pa bdag sags lags so// de nas
3b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad smras so// kye gnod sbyinang ni thams cad kyi dbang po chen po byed pa po 'joms pa po skye dgu'i bdag po
3b7(rgyud): la pa la// rtogs 'dod de// dbang byug chen no'o// de / de kyang dub sems ba tshan 'thas nas ga sungs so// da thams pa ngab ga tshu rgyalas myed pa
3b8(rgyud): na'athams ste/ ga ba'i bus khrel pa la ngas pa dang / togs 'di dang gyug can po yin ma sa pan kya ni'i 'gyur cam// gtan pa 'did ces bya ba ni par pa'o// nga gyu can pa
4a1(rgyud): brda 'dra pa'i khams kyi kyang d+ha/  rnams cad byed pa ning yin pa pa 'dul nus so// de nas dang phyag chen po lha chen po khros das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gapas
4a2(rgyud): gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gdamos bgad nas 'jigs pa chen por byed pa' ba ba chen po skye ba 'den rten gyi khams mams cad mapa' med/ 
4a3(rgyud): / kAtsugapa snga tshogs su bya/ 'bang sa chen po'i 'grub pa/ sem chu sa bdod da mdung ce gsum pa dang thod me dgag nyid rtson mau dungs pa'i na 'as shing gtang sa
4a4(rgyud): rnabs kyi tshogs deng glang po'i tshogs rnams dang bcas pa kun bstan te// gdu dang brdegs byed pa dang mtha' dang mu med pa'i gzugs su tshogs su su pa/ khro bar ba tu mi bzad pal ras pa'i/ 
4a5(rgyud): tshigs chen po dang cig tu bdapa'abab cing shin kya bye pa/ gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khom sa mtshan mo'i rkye pa dag rgyas/ 'a ba chen po'i nga gyim spang sa ter 'du sna ba bya'o/ sa
4a6(rgyud): bcwon ldan 'das do ni 'chang ba chen po cung bdamache ba'i tshog sa gtsigs pa/ smin 'tshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa/ mig g.yon pa cher bgrad de/ rdo rje'i lta ba khro ba dang bcab pas
4a7(rgyud): gags/  mo mchog tan gsul banas rgyal pa da pa la nas bya ba 'dig ngas s+ho// da gas pa 'das stong sa kyi na pa'i na gyi
4a8(rgyud): sgradeb kang nas/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'grol rab tu 'grol kun tu rab tu 'grol lo// de nas dbang gag chen po la sogs pa la tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das
4b1(rgyud): d+hu ga sau la/ bdebar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsal nas rnas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs bu dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so// gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi
4b2(rgyud): smra ba ni khyod rab tu mi 'grungs so// de nas phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsungs so// oM sum b+ha ni prab+hU hAM
4b3(rgyud): \u0f85trAM/ gr-id+d+ha pa la gr-ih+NA ba ya d+h+ya~M/ yAn la ho b+ha ga wAn badz+ra hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha'i bdag pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
4b4(rgyud): / rdo rje gang na ba der mgo rkang bzlog ste/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yen pas mnan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
4b5(rgyud): kyikye phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'di 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed pa legs so lags so// de bas na phul la
4b6(rgyud): 'dugs byung shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi byer rdo rjes bcings pa 'di gsungs so// hUM badz+ra rna mtha bar byas rbAn swAhA/ de na jug lan rdo rje
4b7(rgyud): 'de gsungs pa tsam mes lha chen po la sogs pa lnga de dag thams cad dran pa rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po dag payis can chen po 'di'i bka' ba'i nang
4b8(rgyud): dpar las long shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas phyag na derdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
5a1(rgyud): rten pas yang rang gi snying po'i di gsungs so// DU \u0f7f ki ha~M/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyil lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rdza la phyag bya nas sa// 
5a2(rgyud): blags te ra ro bton nas skyabs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bslab du gsol/ da bdag cag khyod kyi bka' tan na ci ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol zhes so// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'
5a3(rgyud): chen 'os de rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag byeng chub kyi sems dang sdom par gzung bar bas long shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
5a4(rgyud): rnams kyi bsnyen bkur ba byed cing byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed par 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ri lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du btsud nas sdom pa
5a5(rgyud): 'dzin du bcug ste/ byang chub sems ni brtan byas pa// sems can thams cad bde ba stsal// phyag na rdo
5a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de dag sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas/ dam tshig byin pa ne/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a bi Shin+d+ra ma bI rA ga la sarba ka mAn hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdud kyis smras pas na
5a7(rgyud): bdag cag mi nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di lam brnyas shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis gsol ba/ ji ltar 'dod chags dang
5a8(rgyud): bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa kye grogs po dag de ni ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du byed pa ste/ 'di nyid kyis
5b1(rgyud): tan gyi khams 'di sun 'byin to/ nga bad pa la mchags pa dang sdug bsngal la 'dod chags pacan dzas bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'o kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad pa
5b2(rgyud): pang dang / de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu 'i bang 'i byang chub sems dpas ci nas 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ce sa bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang sa
5b3(rgyud): oM 'jas mas kyi ma 'i dgas bab N+Da)b+h+rUM / na ci gis di lta bcom ldan dngas kyis bka stsal ba bzhin no nas gsol to// de nas yang phyin na rdo rjes yog chen to/ 
5b4(rgyud): dbang bsgyur ba 'di byed no// me brgya'i 'i rgyas r+b+ba TI ga ta badz+ra d+ha t+t+wa Shadz+ra hrIN+DihrI/ hA hA haha/ den 'do rje ming gis dang bsrung 'byin pa ni 'di sa sa/ dang phrag cin pon rdo rje ga sngags
5b5(rgyud): mchog go// mthu bo chen rdorje sku ma'o// tshangs pa ni rdo rje mi smra ba'o// skye gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// dbang po ni rdo rje 'thung ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig tan grisum gyi dbang po thams cad
5b6(rgyud): ba chen po dbang sgyur ro// danam par snangul rgyu rnam po rdo rje ming gis dbang bskar 'byen pa ni 'di sa ste/ 'dud rje 'khyil bani me 'khyil pa'o// zla ba ni rdo rje / cor mon
5b7(rgyud): na no// sA ng+ge ni rdo rje skya blang ste/ de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskyed do// de nas dam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste cheng gis myos pa ni rdo rjes ben pa'o// 
5b8(rgyud): byed ni rdo rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // rgyal ba skyes pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro// de nas sa pa rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang
6a1(rgyud): 'ab+h+r-id pa ni 'do// mdzom da shing // spunA rlung // mnin rdzam //  rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/ da dag la sogs pan la nyi dbang bskur pa/ 
6a2(rgyud): sa'i 'ogon gnas pa'i lha'i dbang ba thams cad rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje kyo ba'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje drag po'o// pa'i spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dren no// bdu Ni
6a3(rgyud): kA g+he/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran du dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyi lha po thams cad kyilag tu rdo rje byed te/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur
6a4(rgyud): byin pa ni 'di lta sa/ nyon mongs pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i ma'o// nor can ni rdo rje gser ma'o// tshangs pa ni rdo rje ni pa'o// dug mon rdo rje gzhon du ma'o// dbang pon rdo rje 'u tsur te/ de dag la segs pa ni rig
6a5(rgyud): sngags kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskur ro// de nas par snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rtse ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi ya'o// 'thung ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o// be con 'cha
6a6(rgyud): dardo rje brtson che'o// smre 'phrogs ni rdo rje rked rjengs te/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khri mang dbang bskur ro// de nas rnam pal la rgyu ba'i man pas dbang bskur ba byin pa'i 'dris ste/ gsod pa ni
6a7(rgyud): gsod ma'o// ba mo ni rdo rje zab pa'o// gos ni rdo rje bgo ba ma'o// dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/ de dge la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mo dbang bsrung ngo // de nas sal rgyu ba'i marnams dbang bsrung
6a8(rgyud): kha phyir pa de 'di lta ste/ zhib mo ni jo bo nya ma'o// rlung me rdo rjes kyogs pa'o// me ni de rje 'bar ma'o// ku be ni rnga brag thug pa ste/ de dag la legs pa ni da rje bro mamong dbang bsrung ngo ro// de nas rjed
6b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i mamams cad dbang bskur babyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bag tshon rdo ngag dang // mgo lpags mni dzarje dag yor// snaH mnaun dza myags mal// klu mon rdo kyu smin ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa
6b2(rgyud): dpor dbang bskur ro// de nas phyagan rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po pa btsud pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje dmatshig byin pa'o// oM ba li tod pa li ta badz+ra A kar+dz+dza ya hU~M / 
6b3(rgyud): / oM badz+ra ma kri bi nAg sa ma ya hUM/ bar srung la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa la gra laM/ phreng ba 'chang ba rnams kyi'o// mo badz+ra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM
6b4(rgyud): pa bar+Na pany+dza hU~M phaT/ 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra/ sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa pa ya mu pra b+han+d+ha tsakra hU~M pharnga ma mo rnams thams cad kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
6b5(rgyud): gan rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi dkyil 'khor de dag ji ltar bkyi
6b6(rgyud): kar cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang gis sems can rnams thams cad la pan pa bya sa nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar
6b7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dmachog 'di nyid la chud ceg// de nas yang phyag na rnadzes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mapa' 'grom la sogs pa'i gdon 'di dag la de ltar nan tan bkye/ rims la sogs pa'i
6b8(rgyud): / dmyal ba la sogs par na song sa rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dam chog de nyid la nan tan bye du chung shig/ de nas phyags rdo rje la yang gsol pa/ bco
7a1(rgyud): 'das mi rnams ji ltar nan bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor che por btsud nas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du chung
7a2(rgyud): // dzun dkyil labang du 'chud nas dam tshig se kyil ber du nad cig// dam tshig gi dkyil la ba du btsud napa las kyi dkyil labar du tsu cin/ sa byag do kyang rgya
7a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te// grub pa
7a4(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dab pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor thams
7a5(rgyud): theg gdab po// de la srad bu zla ba'i chog ni 'di lta ste/ gsar zhing lags par byas pa dang // tshad ma bzang ba srad bu yis// shes rab can gyis sang bre ba// 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran ne
7a6(rgyud): deying bung drug dpa pa na// seng ldeng phur pa btan par mo// de la srad bu mi gsungs pa'o// phrad bu nyi ba gdas kyis byas te// bcu drug cha bgo bar bya// thams cad du ni rim gsum
7a7(rgyud): !// de mi mas panas pa /  sa thabs pa'i das dum banas// des zeng du ban pas// sangs rgyas gzugs pa skyes par bya// sa sa rgyas 'ang
7b1(rgyud): /  na yo zhon // TI ma ma na nag par // nam+b+haSh+Tamatshag rnams kyis so// sangs rgyas spyan pa de na ni// blanan dang bzhin na// khri ma 'an par byung / 
7b2(rgyud): rdo rje hUM zhes par 'dus so// de yi zhabs ni g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya'o// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyi btsir ba ni// nyon mongs ma yin lha mo'o// 'dod drug spyod pa'i lha
7b3(rgyud): bri'am yang na bzhag par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis 'gongs nas su// phyir khyung nas de ru yang // gling rnams bzhi yang bri bar bya// dbyibs da
7b4(rgyud): ka ji bzhin du// grwa yi ri mo legs par dgod// gling rnams dbus ni thams cad du// 'jig rten ji bzhin bsogs par bya'o// tshangs pa la sogs bzhi yi rnams// de rje 'jig rten dbang ba
7b5(rgyud): khor khor yu ki ri dang ni// gling rnams kyi yang bar dag tu// pi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dang bri bar bya// ske srungs bri bar dbye bar yang / rdo rje sgo ba zhi de dag tu// 
7b6(rgyud): dgas pa dang // sgrog dang dril bu de bzhin no// kho ra khor yug ri ye ri// phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnams so// gnam dal dang ni nad dag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon drag rnams// 2
7b7(rgyud): yang dbri bar bya// ces min can ni gzhig phyir ro// de yi phyi rol du dgod pa// gtor ma sna tshogs mchog rnams so// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i thog 'byung ste/ de la sogs nyid dusgo
7b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'jug pa ni/ gtsang ma yos gtsang ma bgos la/ ser la be gu dmang po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bci res la de'i steng du dri zhim pa'i me tog
8a1(rgyud): nas/ snang ba'ang brjod la zhugs shig/ oM badz+ra pratIts+tsha ma ma ha ha ha ha ti/ de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcug nas du r+ya sma'i bdug pa'am ci bdog pas gsol to// 
8a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis kyo ba btang du byas la snying po ni 'di brjod do// oM u ru gra gra bi re Ni bi ri Ni/ badz+ra ma ya hi/ b+hid ye swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni
8a3(rgyud): bsdu g.yo ba la sogs pa dang sa g.yo ba'am dri zhim po 'am 'od zeng mthong ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig/ de nas slebs gzhug ste/ de la thog sa nyid du bkris nas/ 
8a4(rgyud): slob ma kas gtsang ma skon te gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / bslab pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa la so sor gnas par byas nas byang chub kyi sems skyed cig/ de nas gdong ras kyis g.yogs
8a5(rgyud): mgo gtsug tor du byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chu gcig/ bcug nas me tog gtor te/ de nas gang la bab pa ni de'i lha'o// de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas rang gi rig
8a6(rgyud): pa'i lha ston la/ de la mchod cing slob dpon la yang ci 'dod pa'i yan phul nas/ de rang gi rig pa 'am sngags bzlas te phyag rgya'ang bcing ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
8a7(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal ba las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'byung te/ rdo rje'i phreng ba mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba
8a8(rgyud): 'dzag par bya ba de bzhin te// las kyang de dang 'dro bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor de du zhugs nas su// de bzhinar rje gsor bar bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas// 
8b1(rgyud): mchog bsgrub par bya// dpa rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga na// lag pa gnyis kyi rje phyag tu 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung la/ de srid na 'gus par srid du bzlas so// dbyin da rdo rje pa las thams kyang / 
8b2(rgyud): byed do// rdo rje 'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dri mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil lakhor chen po kun bris nas// mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya// 'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang // rdo rje'i dzin mchog
8b3(rgyud): phyag rgyas so// de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// rdo rje 'dzin mgun byas nas// rdo rje dkun tu brtag par bya// g.yas par bzhag nas g.yon pa yis// dril bu gsel zhing 'jug par bya// du
8b4(rgyud): nas su ni dril bu de// mnyam par bzhag pas gsil bar bya// slob dpon gyur cig dmatshig kyang // rtag tu bsrungs shes brjod par bya// de ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni// de yi me rtag pa ru gsungs// 
8b5(rgyud): lta khyod la byin pa ni// rdo rje chen po zhes bya 'dis// nges par sreg par gyur pa ni// de ste rdo rje 'dzin dad
8b6(rgyud): dkyis 'di tshe spangs kur na'o// de la 'di nyid dam tshig gi sngags so// a ha na sa ma ya hU~M paT/ de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rdo rje'i chu 'ad bsrud do// de nas ladong bcings pa 'grol nas chog
8b7(rgyud): de bzhin du zla'o// das tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kye dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas su// ralugs mang po bzhas par bya// btsud nas las rnams thams cad pa
8b8(rgyud): slob dpon gyis ni de bzhin bslab// da ras las kyi rab tu sbyor ba 'di'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab kru ba nir byas la/ mdang po'i lam shing la me thus la/ mang po che me tog dang 'bras pa
9a1(rgyud): bu rnams snang na dang ldan pa'i mas zhugs te/ brags ga pa sa sug pa la ga tha 'amal ma byas/ rdo ga tu bzlas ga son pa dang rgyam pa dang / yang dub bam sogs par// 
9a2(rgyud): ne 'i la rnamapa la la ga pe g.yon pas bdag gis phyag rgyas bcings te/ gsal pa sa sregs na de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgya rgyam pa chung gsus du tshwa ma char mnan pa
9a3(rgyud): yam shing dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang yal ga'i rtse mo dang sdong bu dang / 'bras bu yang de 'dra ba rang ge khrag gis bsgrub nas stan 'khrang po la 'dug ste/ bla gos g.yon du gzar la khros pa'i tshig
9a4(rgyud): bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcings pa dang rgyas gdab pa dang gzhom pa dang btsir ba dang bskal ba dang myos par bya ba dang gtan 'pho ba la sogs pa'i las drag
9a5(rgyud): dmas rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang bzhug pa dang dam tshig gis bcings pa dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams
9a6(rgyud): kyilas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas rba rgya 'das po gting ba la 'dugyun pa/ stod gsogs sgyur mi ltar bapo/  re 'dzin gyis bzlas shing 'kho mo d+ha bu'i babatu dub med pa'i mdags la/ 
9a7(rgyud): tel dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras galas g.yon gyis babreg go// bcom ldan 'das kyimo gartson du de dzalta bu'i thab byas la steng g.yegs kyis yan lag kun bcings te/ rlod spyar
9a8(rgyud): 'das po la 'dug nas/ yam shing thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng ba la 'dzings pa'i le la leg pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa de rje su tshur gyi phyag rgyabacings nas/ lag pa g.yen pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pa
9b1(rgyud): du la su dang ra rang chagag gnam zhing rabam phying bsgrags slad khyo pa 'du pa dang zhug pa la cing ba bang du byabs sogos pa par gyu
9b2(rgyud): sprin sreg gi chog bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal 'i las dkyil 'khor thams cad dkyi tshiga'o// de nas yo byed bshad par bya'o nas nas bcom ldan 'das
9b3(rgyud): na gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad mthong bar 'gyur nas bsgrub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor du ni mazhugs sam// dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni// phyag na rdo rje mi dra
9b4(rgyud): ga/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bcom ldan 'das sems 'dod pa'o// chags dang rdo de nyid de// de la chags par mgyur na// phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub bo// de bas yang dag ma mthong bas/ 
9b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs// yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni// the tsom can gyis mi 'thob bo// rab tu 'angs sa ma rnyed nas su// nad kyis kyang ni 'jig par byed// gdon kyang de la brtson par
9b6(rgyud): 'gyur// shi nas ngu 'bod du lhung ngo // de ltar dkyil 'khor thams du chug la/ nad dang gdon la sogs pa ston cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog ras la bri bar bya ste/ 
9b7(rgyud): de'i bang skor kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni 'di lta ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'phags pa spyan dus gzegs 'i dbang po dang 'jam dpal dang sems bskye pa zhag tu chos kyi 'khor chom
9b8(rgyud): / g.yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang byams pa dang nam mkha'i mdzod do// steng du sbyin ma mkha'i sring po'o// bcom ldan 'das kye 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje na/ rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje da/ 
10a1(rgyud): btsas pa lag pa gnyis/ lag pa gnyis pa gzhan pa g.yas pas ni rdo rjeg song gzon pas ni mi tog gi gzhu dang mda' lnga bsnams pas sku mdog ni u
10a2(rgyud): lta bu/ yid 'dzum pa mche bcung zad gtsigs pa khro ba dang bcas pas gzhad pa'i zhal/ phyir brkyang bskum du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pas lha chen po'i ldan pa ga
10a3(rgyud): paramanan/ zhabs g.yas pa bskum pas yu ba'i num btsir te/ sdod g.yogs khra bos yan lag gi yogs pa/ ko shom gyi smad g.yogs can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgya
10a4(rgyud): sogs pa'o// de nas chos zhag gcig nas brnams te/ chos bcoM rgya ma zlaba'am lo bar du nyin nir brgyad stong bzlas te/ gos dkar po gtsangam bgos te bdag gi khyim du gnas zhing // 
10a5(rgyud): zas bcang ma yid bzhin du thos te bzlas na/ de nas rgyu ba gcig lon pa dang zla ba dang pos ni rkyen khyab phyi rol gyi las rnams grub par 'gyur ro// gnyis kyis ni las thams cad 'grub pa
10a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad ston to// bzhis ni sems can thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya bar nus so// zla ba lnga
10a7(rgyud): yid bzhin du snang ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla ba drug gis ci 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// zla ba bdun gyis ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
10a8(rgyud): rdodza sngon cing po 'phrul thams cad kyang ston to// zlab brgyad kyis stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgral sogs pa/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang brtseng ba dang dbang du byed
10b1(rgyud): tshaM las su bskol// rnang dun rgya chu ma pa sems ca dbug pa dang gtsug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byed do// zlab ma sa bcul ba par 'gyur ro// zla ba bcu gcog nas na sa
10b2(rgyud): cig pa sangs rgyal gyis paba'o// ba bcug nyis ni da nga 'dzin par gyur ro// denas sgrub pa gzha te/ ras la bam ldan yang tu ma bya bad+ma bzhin du kyi la/ do ya ltar mas nga ma
10b3(rgyud): rol sogs pa nas/ klu ba ru Na'i mtha'i bar du bcom ldan 'das la sgong zhing pus mo btsugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phrag rgya grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba'i mtha'i bar
10b4(rgyud): pa nyi mu dbu mtshan thal byung du bzlas nanang par thams cad 'ong // 'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur thams cad bsgo babazhin du byed do// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
10b5(rgyud): dris nas/ gser mdangs kyi lha bal sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgyab sbeng nas gang byed ci mi sdug pa'i gzugs su bri'o// dran pa de bzhin du dra ba gcig go mapa'i mtshan pa la brang gros
10b6(rgyud): dede la nang bar kun lhags te de bzhin du gang dag gis sgrub pa po mchod do// 'di ni rtog pa 'dir bris pa de bzhin no snyam du bsam nas des mi 'jigs par bya'o// de nas dbang du 'gyur te rtag tu phas thams
10b7(rgyud): dbyed pa'i g.yog mer 'gyur ro// de nas cho ga gzhon te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du brgyad stong du bzlas na/ nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzid pa 'thob ste/ ci 'dod pa gru
10b8(rgyud): chog kyang 'thob bo// gzhan yang bsgrub pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dus zlos shig/ de na pa dgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do// phyag na rdo rje'i sman sngar ci 'dod par yam shing
11a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis sbyin sreg gis le gcig gi bang du phrogs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas la zas la na na ga ga na pa' bar dgrangs ma pa
11a2(rgyud): zlos shig/ de nas tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gis ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de bzhin
11a3(rgyud): gshegs pa 'gul gyi bar du zlos shig/ de nas phyag tu grub par 'gyur ro// grub pa des na dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang gzhug pa dang drang ba dang lhung ba dang dbab pa dang gtan 'pho ba la sogs pa las
11a4(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyi zer bcings pas hUM zhes pas mdzad de// de nas tshi ga gzhan te/ rag pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod de/ bri 'am 'jis pa las phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis brgya
11a5(rgyud): rje'adzin to// de zla ba yar gyi chos gcig nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du mar bzhi bre brgyad stong gis khrus shig/ de nas mtha' mar mtshan thal byung bzlas so// de nas nang par gzugs
11a6(rgyud): dgand de/ de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bco'i ldan 'das kyi tshe lug sa bri ba/ 'dim pa la de bzhin du phyag brkyang pa rdo rje 'dzin par byas
11a7(rgyud): de nags kyi bar du smos nus bkrus na/ de phyin cad yid bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa byas nas/ de'i phyas
11a8(rgyud): g.yas par pad+mo/ g.yen par rdo rje g.yas par rdo rjehUM zhes pa/ g.yon par bda' dang ga'u'o// de nas de'i spyan sngang pung phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu 'ag gsum sbyangs te mtshan zal byung
11b1(rgyud): sa nas/ de nang par de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ bskal par gnas yang mis lnga dang thams can mas cad dbang du bya ba dang thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor bsgru
11b2(rgyud): 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas lci ba gsum gyis khyab byas/ 'dum gsum du gos brjes la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya ba mis nas/ brgyad stong dus gsum du nyin bdun bzlas na/ de nas phyag na
11b3(rgyud): dpon gyi gzugs su byas nas rmi lam du thams cad su'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'brang ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gi bar du de bzhin du dus gsum du khrub bya
11b4(rgyud): nas/ dus gsum du gos brdas dus gsum du ba lang gi ldebs dkyil 'khor byas te// de ljags kyitshon chos dor rdo bris pa de la blta ni / rdo rje dzin pa'i phyag tu bcings te brgyad brgya zlas na/ b+ha ba gci
11b5(rgyud): bzar bco ldan 'das mthong ngo // de nas rdo rje bslab pa 'brang ste// rdo rjengs sam brtsigs pa'am shing leb la bris nas de la mchod pa byas te/ ngo rje bu tshung kyis bzung la lo gcig tu na rdo rje
11b6(rgyud): pa'i bar du zlos shig/ 'bar ba des nam mkha' la 'grob dang babacu drug len pa'i lus phyag na rnga dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang spobs dang mthog bya kar te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ 
11b7(rgyud): bdeb dang yid bde ba thams dang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe yang la steng phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri bsrub pa 'byung ste/ da 'gyur kyi ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na/ reg 'ang
11b8(rgyud): khams cad kyi bdag po ga 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de nas 'bar la bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma ma dkyil 'khor brisa'i phyags kyi 'khor mo thogs nas rapa rje byur cing spyang yang la ma lo ba gyur gyi
12a1(rgyud): bzlas so// de nas dathogs pas na ngag 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyo ba tang bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser kyi tho btang byas te lag pa/ 
12a2(rgyud): yon pa'i de nga rma dkyis pa'ang la grul pa rnams gsus du gyung gyi bar du 'azlas te/ rngas pa tsam gyi sa thams cad dgug dus par gyur ro// dung 'byung bcol gyi sems cad dbang du byang dus pa
12a3(rgyud): 'bar bas rnathams cad dgug pa dang dbang du byas shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas lhal sogs pa thabs ca dang klag pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa ldarnams gang yang du
12a4(rgyud): cha lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar du bzlas na thams cad rdzogs te/ las thams cad byed pa reg pog tu 'gyur ro// 
12a5(rgyud): klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na kwa'i mcho lta ba man ched chu'i nang du bcug pa lo gcig tshun cad klu thams cad rang gi gzugs su ston cing las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu kur pa'i bar du bags so// gdong / 
12a6(rgyud): sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gnod sbyin ga la gnas pa'i gnas deng ngo trUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnad sbyin du dag lhags te bka ci stsal zhes smra ba'i bar du bzlas so// de phyin cang bka
12a7(rgyud): da'adapa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'did pas mo'o gnas su song nas/ khro ma'i snying gang rdeg pas mnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas na
12a8(rgyud): la 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra 'byin par byed de/ des mi dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog yor 'gyur te/ phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su khrid de/ slar yang khrid cing 'ongs ram chags kyi mdag
12b1(rgyud): bcug cing / de dag gis mchod de ldan ma byung ba 'du thams cad dang 'dod pa thams cad dang na chung thams cad 'gug go// 'di lta bu nal 'byar yang sbyar / napa 'byong gang gis khra za'i 'jig rten dum pa gro ni pyi sa
12b2(rgyud): 'ango // de la lus kyang cung zad kyang byeda'i rus po// de nas dpal chen mo bsgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i sku las lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste de las ma 'phru
12b3(rgyud): sgo// de phyin cad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa'ang ster ba'i bar du'o// de nas mche dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge'i phreng ba bsal phreng ba'i
12b4(rgyud): kod ci mthar phyir gyi bar du klags te/ nyin pa neng dus gsum dul sa de byas la de nas brgya stong bzlas na/ zla ba gcig lon pa dang mtsho dbyangs ma mthong ngo // de phyin chad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa
12b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi gtsug lag thams cad shes gnyen du bya ba thams cad dang / ba zo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par de ltar rab tu shes so// de nas yig
12b6(rgyud): dang gur grus dang sdong ros dang bablarnams la bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ yig pu mig blangs la 'dos pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan te grub pa rnam gsus byung ge bar du bzlas so// gcig gis ni me snang sa
12b7(rgyud): gnyis pas ni gzugs lang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ninam gnas gong mar 'dzeg pa na nas la par la 'gro ba 'gyur ro// gur grum la sogs pa bzung ste/ 'dzabs pa'i bug 'a sa
12b8(rgyud): ridzi pa'i phyag rgyam mnan nas nam 'bar gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas thig le byas nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang rig 'dzin dang thams cad du 'gro ba dang tshe lo steng thub par 'gyur ro// 
13a1(rgyud): la b+ha ny+dzi ka bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas gang la sal b+hany+dzika ri ma~M bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa de'i 'jom pa la sor mo bzhag ste zla ba gcig tu zlos shig/ da nas zla
13a2(rgyud): mthar ba tshan pog lag zlos shig// de nas nang par gzugs su bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin me/  la cu 'o/ nod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod pas/ gnod sbyin me gang na 'dug pa'i gnas dpa'
13a3(rgyud): rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyur ro// denas ga pa po bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag dang phung po mes btang ste/ lag pa g.yan pas rang gi mtsha
13a4(rgyud): pa/ g.yas pas gzegs ma sregs pa dpag dang gyi phung po de las ci tshim na gza mo gdong mdangs gzugs mi sdug pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugs su gnas so// 
13a5(rgyud): nas ce bgyi ba bsgrub par 'dod pas nyin gag gcig bsrung bar byas la/ chos nyi shu dgul brgyang stong bzlas te/ de nas zla ba gcig slongs rol ba zhing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba gcig chen
13a6(rgyud): rubya gsus pastsu 'i byas nas ma tshan thog lag bzlas so// de nas dang par ci kye 'ongs deng yi 'jigs par bya ste/ de nas de ngas nas 'grub bo// dbyed cad 'dod pa thams cad 'bul pa'i g.yog tul
13a7(rgyud): yongs kyi lta ma yang 'khrugs she 'phrul lo// dbang skye ci bung yang 'azhugs so// 'das pa dang 'angs pa dang ltar gyi thams cad ca 'o// gzhan myin thams cad kyang thug pa ma
13a8(rgyud): rig pa'i brtul gas bya bar 'dod pa dngos grub med pa gang len pa des/ zla badrug gi par du byin gag bcu zhing skad pa sngam brdzas la/ slongs ma le sa zas la sogs nas rlung baba'aba'i bar du'o// des
13b1(rgyud): pas byung bas nan pang sangs rgyas pa 'a sbyin par 'gyur // de nas nyid pa ning bco brgyad kyi bar du ston gyi spyad pa rnams byas la da yadug tu mtshan pal byung bzlas mnang bar las thams cad 'grub par
13b2(rgyud): ste/ yaHsa mnyams pa'i mor blangs la legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi phreng ba btugs nas/ 
13b3(rgyud): pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs byung gi bar du bzlas de ldang ste langs pa dang / de zhon nas thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de des ro la ngas kyi phub pa mchog bsgrub
13b4(rgyud): mardzas ma nyams pa'i mi blangs nas/ de shin du rab tu brkyen nan te langs shing ma pa kyil gyi bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrar 'gyur ro// de zag pa la khyer na de bzhi gshegs pa 'ams
13b5(rgyud): 'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang tshe yang bskal par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas ma bad+mab kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba
13b6(rgyud): sa su 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ bang cig brjod pa ni bdag dang ldan na dang grong dang thob byed dang rgyal po la sogs pa 'asrung bar 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa nis rlub skabs mtshams sa
13b7(rgyud): da da na napa ma tsho byeng mi na gzhan ste snron po ridakyil 'khor dang rnam mapa' dang phyogs bcing ba'ang lta ba nges so// dpa' ba ni reg pa dang ma rig pas pa ge dang mi long dang snod dang ma
13b8(rgyud): dang bris pa dang lugs dang gzhu dngar 'dad rdal sogs pa de rje dab pa'i phyag rgyags kyis g.yogs la bcing sa te 'u yul gyi bdug pas dbab po// gdon zhi bar bya ba ni mu gis pas so// 
14a1(rgyud): zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'bubs par byed de// rdo rje sgeg gi phyag rgyas ni byad pa'i gdon las thar bar byed do// he rukardo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni byed mas bsad pa
14a2(rgyud): sla gso bar bya'o// rdorje'i phyag rgya bzung babs skal bzung ste bslang bas ni/ drug gnan pa dang drug bslang ba dang druga'i bar bya ba dang dug smra ba dang drug gzhig par bya ba dang drug gis shib la pa gsob bya ste/ 
14a3(rgyud): hUM zhes pa gcig gis so// gter byung ba ni/ zangs kyi rib brkus bkang la rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i 'dzub mo dang gru gul gyis 'dug pa byas te bzlas na/ gal te gter yod na ni chu lung ngo // de ste med nani kyil
14a4(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sku zhes bzlas te blang ngo // snang ba dgug pa ni/ dong ka'i lcen ging gi ma thus te/ sho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis rAng kA shA ta ka'i me tog la bsrub dang
14a5(rgyud): phrag brgyad sregs na snang bathob po// 'og gi gnas su ni de rje reg gi phyag rgyas 'phrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas de hU~Mgs pa bzlas te zhugs na de la na kyang gci bar mi nus so// gtogs
14a6(rgyud): 'khor los kyang ci yang byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyad sngar do nga'amador du man ti'am pad+ma rAg 'am mu tig gam gser ram dbyig gam gzhan ci yang rung ba 'am skyes pa 'am bud med dag yang
14a7(rgyud): sto byung du 'gyur ro// longs spyod dgun pa ni sto phrag brgyar ba zlas so// dkrug pa ni rdo rje gyi btang gi phyog rgyas zla ba lag zugs sa// dbang dub ba da ma su sa dang tshog shes
14b1(rgyud): thams can thams cad gtan 'tsho bani du rdzunas pa'i thog rgya btsongs te/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas na sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o// chu gnon pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyab ci
14b2(rgyud): la chu'i steng du 'grong rung ba'i bar du bzlas so// mi gnon pa ni bang cig bzlas so// me tog bsrung ba ni rdo rje ltabs te/ de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing bye ba la sogs pa yang
14b3(rgyud): 'da' bar mi byed do// rtog pa bos ni khro bo'i lta bas te gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o// bza' ba dang btung ba dang thams cad spo ba ri 'bar ba'i lta bas rI rang gi snod du 'pho'o// sdig pa dang skal thams cad med pa
14b4(rgyud): ba ni thang cig brjod pas so// gcan srin thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro// rkun po thams cad 'bum pa ni rdo rje lu tshur bcings pas so// dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag
14b5(rgyud): po// gzhu dang mda' dang mdung dang rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ dathogs na dpag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhal che la ni thar cig brjod pas rtsed pa'i lar phebs par 'byung
14b6(rgyud): sleb bam sa cad ni rgyal gyi sprin sreg gis so// rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin bsreg gis so// gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tshor ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// gso ba thams cad de dung ba'i lo
14b7(rgyud): skyed sreg gis so// 'tsho ba dang gnas pal dang mi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil pa ni til dang bras kyi sbyin sreg gis so// gzhom pa thams cad ni tsunas pas so// nad du gzhug pa dang myos par bya ba sa
14b8(rgyud): cod pa rjerjes sos so// bzas cad gnyed lag tu gzhug pa ni bskums la mig btsums te brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par byas pa yin no// sems can thams cad rgyas btob pa ni rdo rje tshwa car
15a1(rgyud): ya ga ma pa thog na n-i byams pa sunas rgyanas pa'i ma so pam/ nga ba ni lu
15a2(rgyud): bsngol te/ rang shesar mchung du tshwa shing snying po bzlas na chub bdun tshun mda' pho bar 'gyur pas/ snying bcad pan rdo rje blangs te bcad pa bya'o// snying dbye ba'i dong lcags bur kyis gdab ste me sa
15a3(rgyud): smos shing gzugs so// snying spro ba ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje blangs te mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'ams par 'gyung ngo // de nas byag rgya 'dra la las thar bar bya ba bshad de/ de rgyas 'das
15a4(rgyud): ba la ni ku tru dam pos so// nadag 'breg pa la ni rdo rje ngag gi bzlas pas so// snyi 'dren pa ldan de 'i gung kyi sa gran snying kyarang dkrol lo// gleng rab la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'om la khru shi
15a5(rgyud): lani phung bu phung nas rdo dris srus shig gaskyeng po pa lin rdo snying pos spang bar bya'o// de bzhin du byad mi phyag rgya yang spobar bya'o// snyi bla ba par 'dod da bud med kyi snying kar lta zhing lar gcigs
15a6(rgyud): na de'i gling gnas smra thos par 'gyur ro// dU pa'i phying kar yang de bzhin du byas te skyeng ga thams cad du yang de ltar ro// denam pha rol kyi ma po shes pa bsgrub pa pa 'od sa yini rdo sa hU~M zhes pa brgyang
15a7(rgyud): dpe sa khyim pa 'o// ldan gyi gnas shes pa sto na ky-i/ pa bzlab pa pa gos/ rmi lam ma 'ongs nod papa ring rdzog pal nyi sum mchen kyi sa shi pa 'i ces 'dug
15a8(rgyud): logog na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dngal 'ongs pa da ltar gyi shes pa ston teN+Da/ tshig 'du shA mar 'dod pa pa rdo rje srog gi stong phrag brgya ldan/ rdo rje
15b1(rgyud): sa cu // mgyu pa na // sa gyu dus du gyur na/ sangs rgyas bas pa dang bya chub sams dpa' dab pa na
15b2(rgyud): da ma sogs pa sems can mas sa gas pa kyi la gyun to/ pa sag zugs kyi dag ba myung ba myed dod pa rje ga sa myong phrag rgyanas
15b3(rgyud): gang da shi 'dod pa de dang bdag pangs rgyas kyi gzugs su yang byed par 'gyur ro// me snang bar 'dod pa bde ma bu chung gyis rdo bzung la rdo rje gzung ngab yi snang bar dbyung ba dkrid kyi bar du zlas so// btang bsan
15b4(rgyud): dgrol lo// bri gu 'dug nas rdo rje drabang ten lnga 'phang gi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du gzhugan tu shes pa so// gdor bskyod pas ni hag ces pas so// gdon gnos pa ni ngas cas pas so// 
15b5(rgyud): pa bya ba ni pi'i sgra'i skung pas rang gis dpung ba bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos rje bar 'gyur ro// snang bar bye ba ni do rje du mur byed mi tshig gi phyag rgya dra babs so// basmad pa ni rdo rje 'u chur gyis 'phang ngo // dge
15b6(rgyud): ba bskyed pa ni mtshan thog zag pa chen po rang gi khrag gis bslus te sreg so// gzhan gyis bud med dkrug pa ni rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/ yang na thams cad du khyab ba rje zhes pas thams cad
15b7(rgyud): / blad pa dpams cang dga' bar spyod ba ning gi tu ma du rje cings byas pazung ma nyen bdu dus pasas du spangs kyi bar du bzlas so// de nam ma jug tu nas byed kyi bar du bzlas na rtag tu ldang ba sa
15b8(rgyud): ni bcud mang la rtags thugs drag por 'gyur ro// bu po spyod pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab par hUM zhes bya ba byas nas spyod do// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag tu
16a1(rgyud): bcings la stong phrag brgyab zlas na bung ma dakhams cad mgra par 'gyuraro// b+hakan ji'i stan pa rgyun pag shegs pang da zugs sa la hU~M thug
16a2(rgyud): bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzed la nas ragul gyi bar du bzlas so// snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod naH
16a3(rgyud): tirang gi spyi bor bzhag la rdo rje spyi bor brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug nangs snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang skyob to// gnong bu dgug pa ni rin po che gtso bo'i phyems skyed/ 
16a4(rgyud): ga/ sreg byangs so// char dba' po ni da sbyin pa po stong bzlas pas so// ma ga dpon do rmugs pas so// si bgacad pa na rigs pa'i sal tus so// ga dgaga' ya byug tshu nyid kyis so/ 
16a5(rgyud): dgag pa ni rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba brgyab rlas pas// bsal ba la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan brkyang bzlas so// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang bdug pas mchod de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas mnan/ 
16a6(rgyud): rdo rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so// de thogs nas bskor na ci 'did pa bzhin du su ma'i las rnams ston to// rdo rje bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang me tog mthong ngo // nam mkha' ma
16a7(rgyud): tog sa byed lags par shA ni dbugs pasdams la dang 'tshung brjis te na chags so// lpags pa shang par bya ba ni rje'i phyug rgyas so// ga bya byin rdo rje dzirnams so// 
16a8(rgyud): ngang shAn b+hi zhes pas so// drug par bya rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so// smin ma 'gul bar byan de rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rjechags la rang gi srin 'tshams su byas pabs so// g.yo bar byan nang pa gsados
16b1(rgyud): bdangs so// khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dab pa'i phyag rgyas so// khang pa dgug na rdo rje bres pa'i kye matang ga phyag rgyas bcings pas so// shin med par char pa dbabang ni rdorje hU~M zhes pa bzlas so// skad ceg
16b2(rgyud): 'du ni smyon pa na rdo rje bsgre bas so// zla ba dang nyi ma dang bcing bstan pa ni rdo rje brdapa pabs so// nyi ma dang zla ba mang po brtan 'ang rje bzhin ma mkha' la gtor bas so// dam gnas bzhi pas na rdo rje bskor bas so// 
16b3(rgyud): mtshan po nyan par du byan rdo rje 'bang ba bska bas so// nyin po mtshan mo dbyen mig tshul la lang rje sko bas so// thams cad nas rdorje bstan nas brgya bras te rje bskong bas so// thams cad nas byang
16b4(rgyud): sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te ro bskor bas so// phyagan rdo rje thams cad pa bstan na stong phrag brgya banyas te bskor bas so// thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la byer ba zlas pa so// 'jig rten
16b5(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje thu gas bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
16b6(rgyud): kyis phyag na du 'di skad gsungs so// ngas kyang sems can thams cad rkyen kyi phying gangarig tan gsung las rnam pa tul ba rtog pa can po'i rgyal po 'di sartsor bar 'gyung bal/ de bzhin gshegs pa
16b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po 'di sbyin no// de nas phyagan rdo rjes bco ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chob cig por 'dug skyem nos pa/ hUM badz+ra bi swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa nas kyis stong chen po'i 'jig nyer/ 
16b8(rgyud): khams 'di rab tu g.yos so// sems can thams cad kyang rabatug yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing dbang dur gyur ro// de ras phyag na rdorje byang chub sepas dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'angs kyi rlabs
17a1(rgyud): ma mag pas phyag 'tshal nas/ rdo rje na kyil 'khor 'a bshad de// rgyam mtsham tshan po'i tshul du dkyil 'kha thams cad btags te/ de dbus sunas phul ban
17a2(rgyud): du las Tasate/ de'i skyen sngar byagan rje med kyi kyang chog cag ces banag go// den pa de bzhin du gzhugag/ zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod da nas de bzhin gshegs pa
17a3(rgyud): byedad na de bshad dogs sgo shig/ des smras pa gsungs shig ceb pA dang / de nas khyod dang pan nad de bzhin gshegs par gyur te nas smos shig/ des smras pa ci'i phyir dkyil la khong ma
17a4(rgyud): phyir ro zhes das smras shig/ gang dkyil 'khor 'drer zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta ste/ desas ngas rgyas kyi byang chub kyang che 'di nyid dam/ pha rol lob par 'gyur zhes smras nas
17a5(rgyud): slongs shig/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs yi phyag 'tshal nas do dkyil 'bar bshad do// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la rdo rjeb
17a6(rgyud): bslab po// laka pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung nas rang gi phyag rgya bsgom mo// rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yid sring po bsgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa'ang tshe
17a7(rgyud): zhan la thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// thams cad dmachog chen po'i tshul du bas la 'di sgos shig/ dad btan phyag na rdo rje la// de bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin mo/ 
17a8(rgyud): sems can thams cad mgu ba ru// khyod kyis de ltar brtag pa'o// de nas de ltar khyod kyis ma bas na sems can dmal bar rung bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// yang dkyis la
17b1(rgyud): non du bris la slob ma bcuganas las rnam pana'ang bslab // lus thams cad kyis gtugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'amal lo// de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas nas sbyis
17b2(rgyud): pa thams cad ni bshags so// de nas langs la thal mo sbyar te pus mo gnyis sal gtugs nas bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yid rang ngo // de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs la tshe
17b3(rgyud): dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gis badz+ra bid brjod cig/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang bkur
17b4(rgyud): stedang mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rdo rje rig pa bslab pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas ras
17b5(rgyud): laM bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas su spyan ras gzigs dbang po/ g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// de nas gas sbyong can dus gsum du zhus
17b6(rgyud): byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so// de'i mjug tu de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'u tshur bcings nas mtshan pa la byung bzlas na/ nang par du de bzhin gshegs
17b7(rgyud): pa thams cad gshegs te nal skyon to// mchog ci 'dod pa stsal te sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to// de nas yang chog gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa
17b8(rgyud): byas pa/ de'i spyad sngar phyag na rdo rngabal mo sbar te tsog tsog por 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyagan rdo rjes cig gis rdo rdegs g.yon pa na brjog/ 
18a1(rgyud): bam ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su darje bu dzud te/ khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams par byas la/ de nam ches gciganas brtsams te zla ba gcis de bzhin 'arnas pa
18a2(rgyud): nas mtshan pal byung na bzlas na/ de lta de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mchog ce 'dod pa sgom to// yang cho ga gzhan ni dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla baju/ 
18a3(rgyud): bzhin du bzlas pa'i mthul la nyin mtshan gsum du spang ba bya ste/ phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du steng phrag
18a4(rgyud): bras ram jug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo // des de la phun sum tshogs pa
18a5(rgyud): mas cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad blas na mchog thob po// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar steng phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar
18a6(rgyud): 'thur ro// 'phags bstan pas gzigs kyi dbang po'i stan sde stong brag brgya ba nas na spyan ngas gzigs dbang pos la gnas pazung ste bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su srid cing sla la
18a7(rgyud): dede // yi ga rten gsus 'i lam pa la pa'i ga de chen pa rgyalaphrul la dgazhin gshegs pa'i tog pa jogs so// / de nas pacos ldan das blag nga
18a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen pas yang bdi spa nas mato// bcam ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bangag rgyan gsus pas rnas par rnas bag na pa 'dir stong pa gang pa
18b1(rgyud): pams cad na rdza ga ma gas pa'i' bskyed ci 'dren nams can gzhanas/ tsams/ gang ngan pa ma gyis kya nas pa mas yangs nu rnas par 'gyuraro// gang badzad pa ma byas
18b2(rgyud): med pa thams cad ldag ma ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad la ma sung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyag na do rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog stsol ba dang / don thams cad
18b3(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / dgas pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
18b4(rgyud): kyis phyag dade rnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs par spros shig/ ngas kyang bzung ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang
18b5(rgyud): pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi snying kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// rak+ki hUM ngo / den pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// de bzhi
18b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'phar rab tu 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par gyur te// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to// byang chub
18b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sa'i snying por gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brten par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dong sems dpa'i grub pa yangs par gyur to// bdud dngam 'grungs pa'i
18b8(rgyud): phyogs thams cad kyang brlag par byas so// gdon thams cad bcos bsad bcom ste 'dang pang pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blabs su dong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slobs/ bdabar gshegs pa
19a1(rgyud): skyobs shog pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su deng shig dang / 'di nyid khyed la skyob par byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i snying kanas kun tu 'bar bas
19a2(rgyud): bskong ba/ de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'dum zhing khrog phyag gnyis kyis me tog ge gzhu 'gengs pa/ phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje hUM zhes pa
19a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs nas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bkang nod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
19a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ nga ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so// lag na rdo rje de bas na khyod snying po
19a5(rgyud): gib sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang bcos pa dang bcol pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang de rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de smos shig/ i TuM/ rdo rje go che'i phyag tu 'dim pa
19a6(rgyud): nyi dgo bgos na rdo rje'i lus dang rdo rje mam ba cing bsrung bar yang 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du tham pa cad kyis mi zhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rdo byang chub sems dpas rdong la jom
19a7(rgyud): kyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// gru bzhi pa ste sgo bzhi pa'o// ta babs pazhi dang bcas pa ste// bcu drug chang nga ldan par
19a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i rabs mdzes pa ste// grwa dang sgo ye bur dag dang // de bzhin ta babs mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya// bdan phreng ba dril bus brgyan// dang por phye yi dkyil
19b1(rgyud): la ga zu // dpon 'og yo// ngargyas sa//  sa kyang ldan// de la/ ban gnasas// lams / 
19b2(rgyud): da byed kyil ladzi bzhig pa'o// de yong sa su sem papa lta// 5gan gas pa // spyang 'i rgyas de rkyen mas da// dang rgyan brnyan pags pa// nang shA ca na
19b3(rgyud): rje rnams pa yang dab ste// me tig sa gsu 'amang bag// da la sa gzhan pa phyag zhig// rdo rjemasas dpa'i sngags da de//  gtong ba nyid po na / nyis kyis mo k+Sha/ su
19b4(rgyud): shing // gnyis kyis rdo rje hU~MHdzad pa'o// de rje can gyi g.yas phyogs su// rdo rje dag rab bre bar ba// skeng kar rdo rje btan 'dzin cing // 'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bas so// phyag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni// chu sri
19b5(rgyud): la mtshan 'chang ba ste// sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te// ri len char pa rab tu 'bebs// rdo rje can gyis g.yon bris pa// rdo rje snyems pa dmar po ste// gnyis kyis rdo rje snyems pa 'dzim// sgeg pa
19b6(rgyud): chod cing 'dud pa'o// dkyil 'khor grwa la gnas rnams s+ho// mchod pa'i lha mo bri ber ba// dpyid kyi do rdo rje'i sprin// sngon ka rje srabab po// phye yi dkyil 'khor brA ga tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs la legs pa
19b7(rgyud): yi dpung rnams thams cad du// de rje'i 'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dang// de rje slob dpon nyid rdorje snying po'i phyag rgyab cing sa la zhugs la 'di skad du smos shig/ sems can du
19b8(rgyud): kye ying khyab cing // sems can kun la bde ba stsol// sems can kun gyi bar gyur pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag deng 'grub// Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de lta
20a1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje'idzin la lan 'tshang rgya bar ro// de nas slo
20a2(rgyud): gzhug ste/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ des phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la/ ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcug nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ khyod kyis dkyil
20a3(rgyud): 'khor ma mthong ba'i mi mkhas pa phul yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig/ 'byung po'i gdon dang 'dra men pa la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal ba
20a4(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo nas gdong khrol cig/ de nas 'di skad ces smos sheg sa gang dbus na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'ad ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bdag
20a5(rgyud): dad pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'o// gang mdun na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod pa'i khro bo'o// 
20a6(rgyud): de ba ste/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// gang rgyab na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems pa thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor spyan
20a7(rgyud): 'o// gang g.yon phyogs na pa 'din bdag nyid rtse ba'i bdud de/ sems can thams cad tshigs par byed pa'o// gang gA'i bzhi po 'di napas ni dus kyi mched pa/ me trog dang bdug pa da
20a8(rgyud): pa me dang 'o// yang bya'i ske mi gnas na pa de dag ni ga zugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon ta // gang skye sa pang dag rim ga dang 'dod chags pa dang yang 'baste/  btang ba / 
20b1(rgyud): nags pa dang sgrog dang 'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro// khyad kyis gang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag pa la smod par ma byed cig/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems
20b2(rgyud): thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyis rnams 'dod chags bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
20b3(rgyud): pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la chags pas na bar pa ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed de/ 'dod chags ni byang chub tu bsnyen pa
20b4(rgyud): de nas snying po byin cig/ Tak+ki hU~M / 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i phro 'a grub par 'gyur ro// 
20b5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste/ Tak+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// hUM zhes pa ni khro bo'o// de gnyis dgug pa'i phyir dzaHzhes bya ba ni 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya
20b6(rgyud): po shes par spobs shig/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa gnyis su rdo rje smin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pra taM d+hA ra ya sid+d+hi Ta
20b7(rgyud): de nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la bskon no// de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang sbyin pa snying po 'dis so// oM badz+ra a be Sh+Tiny+tsa sa rba ka ma shwa red tre i dAm badra nA ma na ma a d+hiSh+Thi te dr-i d+hi s+yA Sh+Ta
20b8(rgyud): gyi b+h+yo / de nas deng 'dug ste phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje cig gis brgyad stong bsdus na de nas sa g.yo ste/ grub pa thams cad lan gcig bzlal pas 'grub po// de nas dam tshig gi phyag
21a1(rgyud): bcangs la brgya bzlas na de thugs dbang du 'gyur ro// debyin cad sems can thams cad kyi snying pe gas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sto la dbang byed do// thams
21a2(rgyud): sdug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi btan par chags so// snying thams cad las tshig mos par 'gyur ro// gyur pa dang 'gyur ba daltar gyi tshig bden par 'gyur ro// bdag gi skyeng las tsho
21a3(rgyud): pa bzhi mthong zhing gzhan la yang ston to// de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des na sems can thams cad kyis mi song pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang mi gcod pa dang mi phyed pe'i rdo rje'i lus su 'a
21a4(rgyud): sa bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje'i thugs bstod pa'i glus bstod do// dpyin cad grub pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad
21a5(rgyud): ngagasang ba'i mchod pa thams cad kur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyed pa'i zas dang ro dang smad pa thams cad kyis tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo // 
21a6(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lta ba bzhin bris te zhugs nas mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar khyimachi pas
21a7(rgyud): snyem pa ma stongs par byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ mas mas kyi spyan pa'i phyi rje'i bzlas pas 'brum bzlas so// de nas dro rje de lde bar 'gyur ro// de nas smra yang
21a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas de sa pa man gcig pa la byung du ba zlas nanang bar ngo len tam/ rdo rje thob spyang gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams thams cad kyi bdag po lha re gzugs dang / mngon
21b1(rgyud): dang spun// sum pa la phyag bzhi pa de rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshor 'gyur ro// rdoHdkyil 'khor gyi mag rgyas pa'o// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/  la 'thor can pa'i rma
21b2(rgyud): rum thog btub ste/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag nas 'di skad smos sheg/ ho bajadza sa twA sur ta s+t+wa~M/ de spyan sngar de rde gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzu bring te/ re
21b3(rgyud): ga tu che 'ad/ badz+ra ma shwa trUM/ g.yas su rdo rje dga' mgu 'khyud par bya'o// de'i phyag rngu ni 'di'o// badz+ra shil hU~M/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba byams pa'i rdo rje bri de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o
21b4(rgyud): bapram kri to// g.yan du rdo rje snyams ma bris te/ rdo rje g.yon du sbyar bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra ga ha ni/ de nas grA dang skor yang rang gi wa'o bri/ de nas rdo ma slob dpon nyid zhin
21b5(rgyud): rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la/ dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de bugs la 'di skad brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ sur ta ho Tak+ki hUM dza/ de das pa
21b6(rgyud): btsam gyi la bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa dang dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa lang stsol to// de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du snyeng pa mardo rje de nyid kyis bcud
21b7(rgyud): paslong shig/ khyod kyis dam cig 'di las ma 'da' sheg/ mi bde ba ma spangs par myur du shi zhing du 'thong chen por skyes par wAr ta re/ de nas dam sdig brjod de/ bdag tu kun kye byug bya'o/ 8
21b8(rgyud): bas ma las yang dag 'byung // de bas khyod kyis sdig med pa'o// 'dod dang bsam pa tshig ting sheg/ 'di ni dam chog bsrung ba'i sngags so// mo TiH/ hU~M phaT/ 'dis de de'i ru zad do/ 
22a1(rgyud): gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgrag ste/ de dag la ljang rdo rje'i 'dzin pas blud do// gang gis 'di las 'das ma/ bla ba byed kyis snying ngagaso zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na
22a2(rgyud): chen pos gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslob bo// donas de bzhin du 'byung ngo // shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris
22a3(rgyud): dkyi sku'am mtshan ma bzhag go/ deng btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o// de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyagan rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag pa
22a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas tre
22a5(rgyud): las bslab ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thang cig bzlas te/ hUM zhes pas bsdigs na de bzhin gshegs pa lang 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// go dpyin chang
22a6(rgyud): gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rdo rje'i las 'brang ste/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul ba pa 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas
22a7(rgyud): gal sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying kar bcings la phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin phob pa de srid du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
22a8(rgyud): dpar 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrung / bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtam la snyoms par 'jubya// shes
22b1(rgyud): yongs su rdzo rnam par bya ste/ 'ad dus kyis bya nang rtag tu bzlas pa na/ phyagan rdorje'i sku ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbub mang gi ba du bya'o// de nams bcu po'i thob ste/ dab na gshegs
22b2(rgyud): las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa// dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang // slob ma
22b3(rgyud): gzhan rnams la// me bad sring po 'di ma sten// dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sdeng stong phrag brgya bzlas na sdang bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi
22b4(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thA/ de ga yas bu phyag na rdo rje phag ba'i pa'i thugs ga nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du gri/ g.yon du sman ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyuphyag ran pa ste/ 
22b5(rgyud): dede pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ kha dog dmar po bri/ spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o// steng du nam mkha'i snying po bre/ grwar mchod pa'i lha
22b6(rgyud): nga gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro// de nas ras la bres pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhin dus pa'i stong bzlas shing bsgrub na de nas zla ba tsang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras
22b7(rgyud): bas ldar 'das dkyil 'khor kyi tshul du bris la sems dpa' chen po dang /  yang de bzhinadang bya'o// de'i spun sbur zla bo gcig tu grangs med par bzlas dri 'dod pa thams cad thos la bsgrubs te/ de ras
22b8(rgyud): gcig lon pa dang phyag na do rje'i phyag rgya chen po'i bcings la mtshar thal khrung bzlas na nang bar rnga rje 'dod 'thab bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed
23a1(rgyud): bar du rtag par 'azlas pa na 'argyal ma mnal par bzlas te// de nas bla ba phyepyid yon pa dang mtshan mo yang ba la byung du bzlas na nang par phyag na rdo rje dpa ma tshungs pa dang / 'dod pa mangs slo
23a2(rgyud): po bod pa dang med pa ba thams cad kya ci thams cad kyi gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das khri bdabazhin du thas la/ de spyan par dang thugs na pag sa te/ stong nag
23a3(rgyud): bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgob bzhin las thams cad byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer brisasangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad kyi 'dod
23a4(rgyud): thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no// des kyang longs spyad par nus na/ lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos brgya byin yang stsol to// phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgob sa
23a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sprin sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed de// phyag na rdo rje'i sman sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas sgor drag
23a6(rgyud): blas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byin nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ngo // de nas sgrub pa pas bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag gis grub par 'tshal gyi/ 'di
23a7(rgyud): sa smos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub bo// spyan ras gzegs dbang po'i spyad sngar 'bum bzlas na sbyar
23a8(rgyud): legs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum pa zlas na dbang stsol par 'gyur te/ bsam po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do// rdo rje bzhag
23b1(rgyud): 'dun du 'bum pazlas na/ de nas las thams cad yid la zhin du/ 
23b2(rgyud): 'dus na na na phyug ma nga da ma gyis me pa la la
23b3(rgyud): 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kyo ba tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ kyo btang des thams cad grags rus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na
23b4(rgyud): zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyur ro// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa bsdams te 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings na
23b5(rgyud): 'brus bzlal na gnas pa dang 'grib thams cad dpa nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dab pa pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'thum bzlas na gnas pa da 'gro tha mams cad dpa' nus par 'gyur ro// rdo dza b+h+rUM zhes bya/ 
23b6(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na hU~M zhes bya ba gcig gis gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis ltung bar byed nus par 'gyur ro// lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'ang
23b7(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun cad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyur ro// mthu bo che nang ba g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lol pa / 
23b8(rgyud): 'khrim par thogs na 'grub par 'thung ba/ tshangs pa man te mthum pa bras na tshangs par thod par 'gyur ro// btu byen nangs pa lan pas san te 'tham bzlas na dung skyed par mgyur te/ 
24a1(rgyud): bas char gcad pa dang / dbab pa dang thang cig gis na gnam lcags dang ser ba 'bebs so// sa nang gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ gzhan nu ma thams cad kyi bdag
24a2(rgyud): khor 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byad par 'gyur ro// khyim la bltas ta babum bzlas na bdud chen sbyin par 'gyur te/ dasan lha'i mi stong tso bar 'gyur ro// khrab langs pa'i skabs mags
24a3(rgyud): bkrus te stong phrag brgya bzlas na zla ba gnyis su mthong ste/ de phyin cad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems can thams cad kyis
24a4(rgyud): sdug par 'gyur ro// gza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con de thob ste/ be can das ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob bo// skye slong gi gnas
24a5(rgyud): song ste 'bum bzlas na skra sbeng las kun byed do// rkun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na chang gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i bar du mi bzad par 'gyur ro// ma d+hu ka ra la bltas te
24a6(rgyud): bcu ba zlas na dbang bskur ba thab par 'gyur ro// rgyal po la bltas te 'tham bzlapa na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba tho pa na te 'bum pan
24a7(rgyud): da thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mdzod skyed rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas nabaza' ba dang btung ba mi zad par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di la bang par me rus
24a8(rgyud): mngon du byas te stong phrag ba rgyab zlas na rlung gis de dang 'thun par 'dod pa thams cad byeng par 'gyur ngo ro// mal bltal te 'bum 'i zlas napa' dbus su 'jug pa dang nyal pa dang 'gron yang 'i'i
24b1(rgyud): mi'ig ring gu cing nyid gcig kyang gtso A r-i sbyin no// dam bas pa mnan te 'bras bzlas na gno sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas na mams cad kyang snyan par 'gyur ro// nan
24b2(rgyud): mngon du byas te stong phrag 'argya bzlas nas la 'dug pa'i gtir 'byin no// gshin rje mnan te 'bum pa bas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gnas 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te sang phrag brgya bzlas na de las
24b3(rgyud): thabs cad pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// grub du yanan te 'bum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// ri 'a gnas su song nas steng phrag brgyab zlas na mi thams cad gsog byed ci
24b4(rgyud): don thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas nas dbang por 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la bltas te 'bul bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad bsgyel ba dang dbang byed
24b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nasa'i 'og nang yod pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro// rin po che thogs te 'bum pa bya sa na steng phrag 'atu 'phel
24b6(rgyud): 'byung // gas kyi tshal sogs pa yang de bzhin no// skyes pa b.rung ste / 'jam pa zla sa na steng phrag brgyar 'grel bar 'gyur ro// bud med bzang ste stong phrag brgya ba zlas na stong brag brgyar phel 'ang
24b7(rgyud): nasan 'am / nga ba na ba rnan ma la ba gyu // ba'angam mags pa rnags kyi sa nyis pa rgya ste bas brnams / 
24b8(rgyud): bas par 'gyur / gas rgyan gyis byas pa seMng phrag brgyang ba ma pang blag brgya 'phel bar 'byung // dang las sa brtsas te tham pa sa na nga du gyur ro// mam
25a1(rgyud): la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chag nas par dag par 'gyur ro// de nas bslangs na ca ba slangs pa dkun stor bar 'gyuraro// gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pasam
25a2(rgyud): cad shes par 'gyur ro// grub byed ma bzung nas 'bul bzlas na 'das pa dang de lta dang ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs par nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// sA la b+hany+tsi ka mnan nas 'bul bzlas
25a3(rgyud): nyinyin re zhing yang gser gyi dong tshe brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyur ro// gos kyi slob/ ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gi snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang de mi zad
25a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gdod sbyin gyi chu lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro// srin po mnan te 'bum bzlas na dede'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// 2
25a5(rgyud): bo mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// shi ba'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bus bzlas na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs
25a6(rgyud): ril 'dzegs te 'bram bu zlas na ri thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// shing sngon gyi drung du
25a7(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// zhing li 'dug te 'drim bzlas na bza' ba'i bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// cong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum pa zla ben nor
25a8(rgyud): dam bslangs par thob par 'gyur ro// gnas byin can du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'byug/ grong du 'bum bzlas na bla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo// gtsug lag khang du 'bum
25b1(rgyud): bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nar thams cad sman par 'gyur ro// lhar tan du dul bzlas ni ltos na thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// khang pa stong par bus bzlas nashA tha thams cad de 'a
25b2(rgyud): tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i gnas su 'bum pa blas na ba dbang du 'gyur ro// skyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na skyed mos tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thams
25b3(rgyud): rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gnas su 'bum bzlas na gter dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgod cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga'ang
25b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bgad pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro// cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad dab
25b5(rgyud): du'agyur ro// lkugs pa'i brtul shugs kyis 'bum bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi 'doms par rtags btsugs te/ 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag
25b6(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'joms pa la mdzub mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad 'dren cing gugs pa dang / gtong ba dang 'grel pa dang
25b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'joms pa lta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par gur gum bsku
25b8(rgyud): te'adus bzlas na des bsdus pas 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'dzem par babri bcug ste bdus bzlas narnamam pa la 'gro bar grub pas kyi to// 'das pa parjor ros bdug ste
26a1(rgyud): ni ga len du 'gyur ro// ma gro tshogs te 'bus pa zlas na la gri na gyi rig lenan du gyur ro// 'bar lo rigs te 'bram ba zlas na la macan gyi sha yon du tur m-i
26a2(rgyud): sogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo btang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje lag gis bzung nas 'bum
26a3(rgyud): / zlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
26a4(rgyud): pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing 'bum bzlas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
26a5(rgyud): nga 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rdo rje snying po
26a6(rgyud): zung nas 'bul bzlas na nor thams cad smin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcings la rdo rje khu tshur gyi sprin sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur gyi sngams pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par 'gyur
26a7(rgyud): ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la lta zhing 'bum bzlas nanam mkha' la yi ge snang ste/ thams cad smra ba dang spobs pa bogs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor la / 
26a8(rgyud): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor cing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i mdzod la bltas te 'bum bzlas nanam mkha' las chub thams cad
26b1(rgyud): don thams cad dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to// byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams
26b2(rgyud): su myong bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen por brtags
26b3(rgyud): tetezhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i bzlas
26b4(rgyud): pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bai shes gnyen thams cad dang / las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro// 
26b5(rgyud): dod pa'i bdag po dang dbang phyug dang byed pa po dang 'byin pa dang mi zad mi nyams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad nyams su myong zhing bde ba dang yid bde pa thams cad rnyed cing 'thob ste sems can thams/ 
26b6(rgyud): dal phan pa dang bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / de rang gi gnyen dang bshes gnyen dang grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo // de dag la yang 'grub par byed do// bsams bcam
26b7(rgyud): kyis sgyu ma thams cad ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho 'phrul yang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
26b8(rgyud): marnamapa po 'phrul pa yang ston to// skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang stobs dang gzugs dang na tshod dang shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes
