27a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyog na dngas gsungs so// dam mtshan par 'dug snyed mtshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro ba'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la lha zhing don gyis 'bum
27a2(rgyud): bzlas na des rdo rje khro ba lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro// hUM zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzin pa dang khams gsum gyi dbang po dang / spyan gsum pa'i khro ba chen por gyur
27a3(rgyud): nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad mi nyams par 'gyur re zhes pa bcom ldan 'das phyag
27a4(rgyud): rjes gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gci
27a5(rgyud): dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dadi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir ra
27a6(rgyud): snying po 'di stsal to// gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jigs pa dang gnam dal dang 'tshe ba dang nad thams cad 'jig pa
27a7(rgyud): gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so nas bya ba byin te legs so legs so// spyan ras gzigs kyi
27a8(rgyud): dbang po khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// a ro li ka/ de nas 'di
27b1(rgyud): dzod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus te/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhin gshegs pa gol ba der dang nas bcom ldan 'das
27b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs so// de nas 'phags pa spyan dus gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rang gi
27b3(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dri nas yang dag rab be shad pa// dkyil 'bar chen po dam pa ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phye yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus
27b4(rgyud): da bu mnyam pa ru// grwa bzhir par ni gdab pa ru// gnyis pa'i gra ni sgor bstan te// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// dbus su thig ni bzhi yang
27b5(rgyud): na ci dmar po dag gis ni//  d+ma brgyad thub bya// dmam po ngas // 'ag rten pa zhan pa bzugs pa d+haH// ra sa kun gyi stod rnamasas// sangs rgyas
27b6(rgyud): bar bya// pad+ma che mchog phyag rgya yis// der ni slob dpon bzhugs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor gnas su 'dug nas ni// nal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya// ji ltar pad+ma
27b7(rgyud): rnams dang // nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis// chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin// 'di lan gcig brjod nas bsgom ste// 
27b8(rgyud): de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo btang gis kun drangs la pad mo chen po de spun ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar dgrol lo// de la pad mo chen po'i kyo ba ting ni 'di'o// 
28a1(rgyud): oM ma hA pad ma hU~M dza dziH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rnyed zan te/ slob dpon la zhal ston par mdzod nas yang ni 'di zer lo
28a2(rgyud): / 'gyed do// de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis slob ma gzhug go// dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos la/ lod dkar pos mgo la natsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis
28a3(rgyud): brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yon par pad mo byin// g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smos shig/ sangan rgyas thams cad pad ma che// dkyil 'khor chen po
28a4(rgyud): dam pa ste// rtag pa ru ni brtag par bya// khyod ni deng nus spyan ras gzigs// de nas phyag chen po bcing ba dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bsgrub po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
28a5(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ pad mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa
28a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab mkha 'byed pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas da
28a7(rgyud): chog gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas pad ma ro re nang bzang po/ bang nges bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong 'bral lo// de nas
28a8(rgyud): spo ma bcug skyed mchog brjod do// slob ma bu min ma yin te// dam chog can la dam tshig bsten// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad de// dag pa nyid de padra bzhin// dam tshig gi dkyil
28b1(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchad pa rnam bzhis mchod do// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te// phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gis so// lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// 
28b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras
28b3(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs par bri/ de nas zla ba yar gyi chos zhag gcig nas partsams nas rtag tu
28b4(rgyud): thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun tu bzlas te/ nam spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bung nas sgrub pa po'i pad mo dbus su bzhugs te/ yang de las
28b5(rgyud): gzhan pa'i sgra byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi sgor kun gyur te/ skad cig gcig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
28b6(rgyud): khams su 'gro zhing ldog go// sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyi
28b7(rgyud): bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad la lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// sum 'bus bzlas na ba sod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang de bzhin gshes
28b8(rgyud): pal sogs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings ste steng phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung na blas na de'i na
29a1(rgyud): dbazhin gzugs pa thams cad can nas dang sbyang kang zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tho // yang na pa zhugs na sbyin ras gzigs dbang po thab bo// de
29a2(rgyud): ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'byur ba ni dang po brjod papa bdag bsrung ngo // gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang greng dang grong khyer bsrung ngo // gsum ba brjod pa sa ni las thams cad byed do// dpa
29a3(rgyud): na gyi bdug pas so// gdon thams cad zhi bar bya bani rje zhes byabs so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje ma chog bzlas te byin no// sems can thams cad gnon pa sa nis
29a4(rgyud): ser pos so// bud med dbang du bya ba ni sum na'i me tog la bsngags pas so// chom rkun gnod pa ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so//  ri dgas dang bya gnan pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so// stu
29a5(rgyud): gnon pa ni ma bya'i chang bus so// rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so// rmi lam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi smin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyi
29a6(rgyud): bya'i sgo'i sbyin sreg gis so// bu mo bor bu dbang du bya ba ni bu mo'i sgra'i sbyin sreg gis so// yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so// bud med thams cad
29a7(rgyud): dbya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg ges so// 'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcos ldan 'das sman ras gzigs dbang po la mchod po byas nas/ nub gsum rangs par ba
29a8(rgyud): de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan snga nyin ri zhing dus gsum du lan sum 'bus bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsus
29b1(rgyud): rab ci 'dod pa'i mchog spel bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las na
29b2(rgyud): rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las sbyin ngas gzigs kyi dbang po'i tig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa rnam mapa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dis
29b3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rang gi snying po 'dul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshes bu gsol/ 'dis sems
29b4(rgyud): can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la skyes
29b5(rgyud): rkyen po smos sheg ces bka' stsal to// de nas 'phags pa nam mapa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// dzaM bA bAr+NaT hrIH/ de nas 'di brjod pastan
29b6(rgyud): la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang / gos dang gser dang nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis
29b7(rgyud): rgyun da kyis brgyan te bzhugs so//  nas rnam ma nga nga mas sa kyis na la gu sa so//  u la / 
29b8(rgyud): lda // klub rgya shin tu mnyem par bya// don na ku dang num po// deng ba pan gas te na papa'i phrag tu dang sgyur ba gas pa nags nags
30a1(rgyud): brjod do// rab thams cad grub pa yi// nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te// grub shig grub shig sems chen po// bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ska
30a2(rgyud): po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la de'i bad 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad bzhag
30a3(rgyud): b.rabya'o// den pa slob ma do nga khu tshur gyis gzhug go/ bcu gnas 'di skad ces brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir// don zhes bstan pa gang yin de// byang
30a4(rgyud): drub sems ni brtan pa yin// de napa sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab po// de la dbang bskur ba smin pa dang // nor smin pa dang zas sbyin pa dang chos sbyin pa'o// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
30a5(rgyud): rnams la'o// nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad lha'o// chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la'o// den so snying po byin la ri
30a6(rgyud): rjethams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do// oM badz+ra rang na b+hai She kA b+hi Shany+tsa sarba ma d+hi pa ti hUM bA bA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas rdo rje nor ngu'i khru
30a7(rgyud): kyis phyag rgya ba slab ste/ sngags ni 'do'o// smye TaH/ de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'dra'o// oM bA~M bA Ta su ba ma/ de nas mtshad pa rnam pa'i bya ste 'byung ngo // dbang
30a8(rgyud): thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rnga rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// rdo rje rin po che dbus su bris la/ lag/ tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rje po ma langs kying radung
30b1(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byin te dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// rin po che dkyil la nga // danas dam chag gi dkyil la bar smras
30b2(rgyud): mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la/ spyan sngar nor dang gser dang mu tig dang nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la/ de nas de btsud de thams cad bstan nas/ dam tshig 'di sprin
30b3(rgyud): do// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa'i dge/ gal te nyin re mchod spongs na// khyod kyis nor dang don bsags pa// tshe rabs kun tu 'jig par 'gyur// de la 'di ni mna'i snying ba'o// mi bA
30b4(rgyud): pa swA hA/ de nas rkus dbang bskur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pargyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag nas der bcu
30b5(rgyud): napa las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyi sbyin no// 
30b6(rgyud): nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin no// dri nas mi 'jigs pa'i smin pa ni gyong khrid thams cad la sbyin no// de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no// 
30b7(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bslab pa 'byung ste ra sa la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur
30b8(rgyud): bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o// g.yon phyog su bcom ldan 'das phyi shin du rje rgyan pams
31a1(rgyud): kyis brgyan pal// den pa ngas la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'thus 'arnas pa mjug tu nyam shar banas partsams te/  na gyi nyi na kyis du na pa ma ldan
31a2(rgyud): ngam khrim pa de las byung nas sgrub pa 'di sa rdo rje rin po tsho'i dbang bsrung bas dang srung ngo // dbang bsrung bde na pa de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// denasam bsgrub pa par gang las su 'gyur ba ni 'bras bzla na don pa
31a3(rgyud): dbun bu mtshogs par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'khum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do// s+yAd rab gzigs dbang phyug gi sman sngar 'bum pa zlas na sun ngas gzigs dbang pos phun sum chags pa zar
31a4(rgyud): stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying ba'i spyan sngor 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid 'thob po// rol brgyar gyi spyan sngas bram ba zlas namamakha'al khu tshur bcangs pas gser gyi dong che 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal
31a5(rgyud): la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzus thob po// des nor yang skye bar byed do/ kardo rje 'khor lo sran lag gi ser mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur re// nam mkha'i mdzod can
31a6(rgyud): khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las ner thams cad dang zas thams cad kyi yo byad bad mi shes par 'gyur ro// byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa
31a7(rgyud): dgar ldan gnas byed bang mchog byin dang slar yang 'ang // debyen cad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nod kyi bdag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyam pa las rnamam
31a8(rgyud): snying po'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje du tshur gyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum la
31b1(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba rtag pa chen pa rgyal po 'di rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gas bskal pa dang brag kubacu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ring ba de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ dpa rten ga pa
31b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi mams can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo 'tshur byang chub sems dpa'
31b3(rgyud): chen po la legs so gas bya ba byin te legs so legs so// rdo 'ugu tshur khrod kyis smros shig/ de nas de tha bu tshur gyis steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ra btu g.yos par byas dang nan
31b4(rgyud): po 'di gsungs so// o du Tu Tu hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin dang la bor thams cad dang bcas nas ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das gal ba de
31b5(rgyud): lhags te/ lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'bor chen po bzur nas bkod do// 
31b6(rgyud): denas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyal btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang ba bshad ga/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la
31b7(rgyud): bde// rdo rje chu ba des gsungs so// / de'i dbus su mamachen po// rdo rjeg batshur bzhag par bya// rdo rje 'tshur rdo rjer bcas// laga' gnyis ni bcing bar bya// de ma ni thams cadang / 
31b8(rgyud): rgyas gzugs rnams bzhag par bya// de dag gi ni grwa kun du/ rma/ byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o// de das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khru rgya gyi dam chog gi phyag bya
32a1(rgyud): bcings te/ thug pa' 'de brjod do// pUd+yA k+Shi ni s+pha naya/ denas bcom ldan 'das rdo rdzab gyur slob pon ma thub par 'gyur te/ de la phyag rgya yang brtan par gyur ning sras kyang bye bar ma dus/ 
32a2(rgyud): de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying kar dgrol lo// e badz+ra mus+thi mu/ de nas slob ma bzhug ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ram dmar po
32a3(rgyud): mig gnyis bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do// deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo// khyod chos dang rdo rje las
32a4(rgyud): 'dod// des smras pa gnyis ka shin/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nas phreng bde'i mgol banag ste/ dgrol pa'i snying pod nyid kyis drub tu snying kar dgrol lo// 
32a5(rgyud): nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin do// 
32a6(rgyud): lag pa g.yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo shig/ 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod pagyis shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'di zhes smos shig/ 
32a7(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems de rje rnams// bsus pa khu tshur shes bya ste// bcing ldan do sde tshur bshad // de nas snying po byin la ga d+ha bcings bslob shi // dam tshig sa/ 
32a8(rgyud): bya kyil la'ajos ga sa rgyag rgya'i kyis la khor 'a / da ma tshan pa pa tshul lazhin // dkyil la ba bams pade pa ga so// de 'i sa gsapa/ 
32b1(rgyud): a ma pa nag pa // mas cad na/ da / na / 6 nan thab //  dal lakhor bus rnams su// do
32b2(rgyud): yang de bzhin// de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo dbus// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// gra yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mchod pa rnam pa ni bri bar bya// de nas bcud nas phyag rgya kun// bcing ba dang ni bslab par bya// sgrub pa
32b3(rgyud): gsang bdag dang ni// bskul ba gsang pa bslab par bya// 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas// bsgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// den pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'thung ste/ rlu de
32b4(rgyud): bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di shes brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na// pag rgya shes par bstan na ni// rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang // sna tshogs pas byed gsod par 'gyur// dam tshig gi dkyil
32b5(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khutshur gyi spyan sder phyag rgya'i las bslab bo// de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o// rdo rjebacing bkun byas la/ 
32b6(rgyud): sngo thams cad dgug byaste// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya ba cing // de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de lta bur ma ldanan 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pas ni dam
32b7(rgyud): tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po pang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi ni ma yin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ba chung
32b8(rgyud): kye sgrub ba / 'om sa na'i/ chung byed pa gi phyag chub kyis nas mang ba gas snang bsnyen pabras par gyu // den sa sal bar byaste/ sal tsam ldan
33a1(rgyud): 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la/ kha ro zang
33a2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing bar bya'o// 
33a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la steng phrag brgya bzlas pa'i
33a4(rgyud): mjug tu nag bdun bsrungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsdoms la/ mtshan thal byung du bzlas so// de nas nam byed nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro/ 
33a5(rgyud): des 'di brjod cing / oM badz+ra ma sti ha na ha na sarba mA da Na phaT/ de nas nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byin te lus kun tu 'jug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
33a6(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te/ de'i g.yas su bcom lda
33a7(rgyud): 'das dong khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis btsun pa/ sku mdog sngo bsangs ut+pal sngon po lta bu rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag tu g.yon pa le'u chur gyis rdeng bsnams pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ 
33a8(rgyud): gagasas bamam ldan 'das mdun dam che gshes tshor chan can thams cad kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu mdam tshig gi/ la chur kyimardo rje dam du 'tsher ba mdog dmar por bya'o// de'i bang du
33b1(rgyud): yum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sman gsum pa lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rjegs la zur thogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zer tshugs cad bu rgyan
33b2(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i gabon du pad+mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba'o// de'i g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal me dang rdo rje pho nyam / 
33b3(rgyud): rdo rje dpal mo na gser gyi sra mdog go/ dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pho nya mi mdog sngon po la rdo rje mkhar ba 'chang ba'o// de nas zla ba yar gyi ro tshes gcig nas ba
33b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'tshur gyi dam cheg gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya ba zlas ra/ gzugs kyi ngas de las phaT ces byab pos na// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de byin
33b5(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod nami snang bar yang 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen du yang 'gro'o// ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// kun tu 'khyim pas 'khyil pa'i sgra can po
33b6(rgyud): drug lon pa'i lus su gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pa slab
33b7(rgyud): pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas shing / rga ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yang tshi ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris
33b8(rgyud): derig yas phyogs sa phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ska ma dag ut+pal sngon pa'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ de'i g.yor
34a1(rgyud): / phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma mtshig ga zu tshur can thams cad kyis brgyan pa yid tsam 'dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal pa/ lag pa g.yas pa nam tha'i 'bras bu 'bul ga/ 
34a2(rgyud): ban rdo rdzokhu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to// de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum bsrung bal/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ka'i 'bum la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong dub med pa'i mdag pa la ba
34a3(rgyud): / de nas gzugs de 'khrul te bcom ldan 'das kyigal nas 'di per 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog stsol ba ni rgyal po'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ lham yin pa dbang ba
34a4(rgyud): sa brjod pa'am/ sa'i reg brjod pa 'am/ khams brjod pa'am/ 'dod pa'i khams mi snang ba'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang bsgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'ad
34a5(rgyud): rdorje tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa muta ba la sngon pa'i ma dog du byas la de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu rgya
34a6(rgyud): bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung bzlas nanam phyed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon te mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// ram sam shing lab bam/ brtsig ngas
34a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mardo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang ma mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon meza bar byed pa
34a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas sa bsgrubs pa'i las rnams byung ste/ rdon dam tshig gi khu tshur ba ce mnas sus pa zlas na/ khu tshur bcings pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lagapa g.yon pas don dang bcas
34b1(rgyud): na tung bache na phyag na darda la mags pa'i gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas pas so// lag pa g.yon pas de rje tshur ba cang ma nye stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 
34b2(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur ro// rdorje bcing ba le su cur byas la 'thus 'phrusas 'chur bcangs pas bcing pa dang / rengs par ba bdang gnyid log par bya ba thams cad rnas par gyur ro// namamapa' ma rje 'gyur bca
34b3(rgyud): bum bzlam na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la nor dang / gser dang mu tig dang rgyan dang rin po che dang gos dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang / ra me dang chu dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang mu gu dang yi ge dang 'a
34b4(rgyud): ngang ston skyobs dang mtshon cha dang glegs bam dang rtog pa dang mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed do// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tur bcangs la'ang
34b5(rgyud): zlas na rdo rje khu tshung bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang 'dren pa dang 'gyel bar nus par 'gyur ro// khu tshur sbyar bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro//  g.yas pas rdo rje khu chu
34b6(rgyud): bcings la stong phrag brgya ba zlas na rdo rje khu tshur byab pas thams cad las nor dang gser dang rgyan dang gos dang mtshon cha dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad 'gugs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dr-i
34b7(rgyud): dang reg bya las dam pa thams cad kyang 'gugs so// bud med kyi num dang mngal phyogs dang mig dang sna dang mchu dang na ba dang mge dang brla dang ska rags dang gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang 'gug
34b8(rgyud): nathar bar 'gyur ro// nyin nag gcig bsrungs la lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin cad khu tshur bams pas las thams cad byed do// de la las rnams ni dgug pa
35a1(rgyud): dang gtsug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang nges par bya ba dang drugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab bapa dang gnyid log pa dang bslang ba dang drang ba dang basbrel ba dang brdabs pa dang skang ba dang / dbub da
35a2(rgyud): bzlog pa dang gtan 'pho ba dang gso pa dang sbrum thams cad bstan pa dang dus tshigs bsgyur ba dang ma la sogs pa g.yo ba dang thams cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang gar byed pa dang bla len pa dang / NA
35a3(rgyud): mabyung ba'i sbyor ba dang / so sor lung ston pa dang 'phrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad dbye ba dang gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang dug thams cad bslang ba dang / ma bum par bya ba dang thams cad
35a4(rgyud): slob dang thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang thams cad 'gegs pa dang / gsab sbyar ba dang sbrul bskrad pa dang / gtu ba dang gtang ba dang ser ba dang char dbab pa dang glog dbyung ba dang thams cad slar gcad pa
35a5(rgyud): sngan chad med pa'i gos dang rgyan dang rin po che dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang skyes pa dang bud med dang bya dang ri dgas dgug pa dang gtong ba dang gzugs mang po ston pa dang mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba
35a6(rgyud): stan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rnyog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rjekhu tshur gyi tog du'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
35a7(rgyud): ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang
35a8(rgyud): dpa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisa'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis spos sheg ces gsungs so// 
35b1(rgyud): nga ma dpa la gshin nu gyur pas smras pa/ yang bshA/  sa rlos pan bzhin gags ma kyis thams cad mnyan pa nyid da nasems cad kyiman
35b2(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i grib pa tho popa par 'gyur ba bgad do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyu ste/ rgyal maud kyil 'khor sa 'i chos bcu bzhi'am bcoM la bris te/ di dbus kyi lte bar 'angam dpal bzhugs par
35b3(rgyud): bya'o// rdo rje ral gri dang glegs pa ma thogs par byas la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du yi ge a ra ba can la sogs pa'i phreng babri bar bya'o// nade nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral grid ma tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la thug
35b4(rgyud): ni' ban ca gra zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di la brjod de/ dan bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la phogs pa med pa'i slob pa pa lang stsor te/  byin cad bcom ldan 'das kyis ram mkha' la yag bris te thams cad
35b5(rgyud): gsung ngo // de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste/ 'di zhes smros shig/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyis/ snying po 'di khrod kyis sul yang ma smra shig/ de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams
35b6(rgyud): u ra pa can zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob pa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o// na pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o// 
35b7(rgyud): bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang chags pa dang don dam pa dang spyod pa dang rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po de bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
35b8(rgyud): slo thams cad kyi snod yin te de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /  rdo rje 'dzin kyang sbyar du thob par 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgyab cing ba bslab po// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o// 
36a1(rgyud): de nas ram gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rma de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su ram gri ba nag ste/ mdun du spang pa'ang bsgrubs na// des 'angs dpa la gzhon nu
36a2(rgyud): gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po tshul bzhin du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do// a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+har+m+ma
36a3(rgyud): tu rud pa nin tA da/ ma zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes nang bar langs nas nyin re lan re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so// dam tshi dgi
36a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyid kyil 'khor 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'bri ba dang /  klog pa dang kha ton byed/ 
36a5(rgyud): pa dang bsgom pas so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bsgrubs par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bres nas/ yi ge phreng ba thams cad 'arjod de 'di skad du chos thams cad/ 
36a6(rgyud): de rang bzhin gyi bsgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na slobs pa mi zad par 'angam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las sa
36a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni la na gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo/ 6/ gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin
36a8(rgyud): mngon du 'gyur ro// ba'i bzlas pas dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rab tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i
36b1(rgyud): tshad nyon ma moni thong bgapas gyon pa nas mnos b+ha shi chu dun zhes bya ba na bya bar du // dunas bskor zhing mig 'bram pazlas te/ e ge 'brum rdugs na bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshogs pa dang / 
36b2(rgyud): ngas dpal dang phyag na rdo rje cig char 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas chos bshad de slar gshegs so// tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsol to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par bya
36b3(rgyud): rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las la ma dpa la gnon nu'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rnga 'bor la byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las na
36b4(rgyud): rgyas pa tog chen pa'i rgyam tsha shA la pa / gang gdug nam kyis dkyil 'tshar sems ca byugs par gyung // des bcom ldan sa kyi mdza 'a yong sa byang chub semapa
36b5(rgyud): bskul lo// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po dul ba/ oM badz+ra krA hAM/ den pa 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems can
36b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs so// de nas rdo rje la por lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la// rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba// rang gi lag na phyag rgya
36b7(rgyud): thogs// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// de yi thad 'a khor thams cad du/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri// de yang sems can chen po rnams/ de dag nyid ni legs par bri// de nas blo ldan thog/ 
36b8(rgyud): maru/ rdo rje 'khor los 'jug par bzhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas so// / pra dz+ra ba~M hoHzhes brjod na des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du stsol to// de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du
37a1(rgyud): // bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rjes mi la phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum ba zlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnan na ba gyur ro//  na pa /  rdo khong ma 'dabus su r+b+ba
37a2(rgyud): de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste 'di zhes brjod de// rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa yis/ gamathong dang de bzhin bsgrubs na ni
37a3(rgyud): tog pa thams cad 'grub par ro// de bas brtags te bslab par bya// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid du// phyag rgya shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtan pas
37a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi// tha med pas ni bslab par bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil la khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad du byed do// ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga 'am rtog pa las
37a5(rgyud): shad bslabs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad
37a6(rgyud): / gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'di rang gi snying po su 'khar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi
37a7(rgyud): gnas su 'akru ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis smos shig ces gsungs so// de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/ oM ga ga na saM b+ha ba badz+ra lA tsa ho// de nas de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi
37a8(rgyud): dkyims thams cad mamapa la pa sus byas so// sa dkyi lakhor gyu ste// da sa d+ha// dpe sasun //  la pa nga nga ba
37b1(rgyud): par bya// rgyal btsun gyis bskar ba'o// dang po'i slob dben 'jug pan// mched pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas ni// ra thams cad brjod par bya/ danas bcom ldan 'das/ 
37b2(rgyud): 'grub ste/ de bzhin du slob ma yang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjid la phyag rgya yang slobs shig/ mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rnam mapa'i dkyil 'khor te/ 
37b3(rgyud): yid kyis dkyil 'khor brim pa de dazhugs shig/ zhugs nas 'di skad brjod cig/ 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de bden pa gang gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba de pan de bzhin
37b4(rgyud): gshegs pathams cad la mchod pa dang / yid la 'dod pa 'grub pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste/ rdo kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'brus bzlas na de nas nam mkha' las
37b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / don thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dmatshig go zhes rjod cig/ 
37b6(rgyud): 'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga ba'o// nam mkha' la ni 'dod pa nga// 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/ ces smras nas/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gsheg sa pa thams cad
37b7(rgyud): mchod cig ces bsgo shig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor do// slob sa nam mkha' pa yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'dring bcug la/ deng slob ma yid kyis mchod pa yang spobs shig/ yid kyis 'di skad rjod
37b8(rgyud): nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las nas mkhar mdzad kyi
38a1(rgyud): rtag pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'dri skad ces gsol to// zhabacom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'a gtan gsum las
38a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smos
38a3(rgyud): ga ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM me tri dr-i D+ha tsita tiSh+Tha ho// de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
38a4(rgyud): thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor kris pa der dbyams pa bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhid
38a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/ go cha brtan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do// badz+ra dr-i d+ha tiSh+Tha/ de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la skems par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'kho
38a6(rgyud): chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do// btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya bslab ste/ de nas go chas bskon do// brtan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// des
38a7(rgyud): byams pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig/ byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di zhes brjod do// rangs
38a8(rgyud): lam yang na khros kyang rung // mdza' rang sdang ba de bzhin te// 'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na// byams pa chen po bsgom par gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor
38b1(rgyud): btsud pa 'di bslab bo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyog tshal lo// sems can thams cad dge bar gyu cag/ 'byung gi thams cad la byams pa dang // byol sang thams cad lam 'jigs bsta na/ 
38b2(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub pas bsgrub bo// las rnams kyang yid kyi ci 'dod ba'i chog dang byams pas bsgrubs shig pa 'jig to
38b3(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las byams pa'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gabs la rdo rje rig pa'i dam pa la sogs pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten gas pa
38b4(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dra nga shi snying po phul ba/ oMng+ga// oM sbyin da drA shUl/ 'amo sbyin d+ha hU~M tsakr-i pha sase bya b+ha bas+t+ra swA hA/ oM ha na b+hin de badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM la la la la a b+hiH
38b5(rgyud): g+har+thA nan/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i srid bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po br-i.a der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad du bri'aphag bas
38b6(rgyud): pa'amamathar na tshon gyi mig le lang ba na 'o// de na sa phog mar slob dpon gyis gsal zur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag chu bcings la 'dug go// g.yon logs nas rdo rje'i skyod ma yang bcug ste/ de nas
38b7(rgyud): lcag rgya yang bslab po// debyen cad thams cad 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig ladzin du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po mas rig pa'i blon
38b8(rgyud): chen po'i rtog pa'o/ 46// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba la sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'di rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM a mr-i ta kuN Da li kha ga ga
39a1(rgyud): d+ha la d+hU ya/ a ma hA prA ba s+kha dza ya hA phaT/ oM kA la da na tan tan na phaT/ yak+Sha la pra sha gra ma kaun+dad+ha parba/  nas de dag grad kyil 'bar shung so+o/ la la
39a2(rgyud): gru bzhi pa bris la de'i dbus su rdo rje bzhag go/ phigs bzhir ni khro ba rnams de bzhin du bar bcad du bsal 'godang // de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya
39a3(rgyud): cing ba bslab po// de nas thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bab dang gtan 'pho ba dang bsrung ba 'grub po// rdo rje khro ba'i rtog pa'o// // de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso

39a5(rgyud): dza ya haM phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste gcu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris la der rdo rje ba zhig go// g.yas su'ang gnyis g.yon du'ang gnyis so// de nas rdo rje srin po'i phyag rgyas btsud de/ 
39a6(rgyud): nas phyag tu bslabs nas chos bslab pa ni/ gang dag pa dang drin gzo dang // lA yi 'khor mthong ma gtogs pa// gzhan rnams de dag thams cad kun/ me dge ba rnam pa gtan 'a
39a7(rgyud): jig rten gsum la sa rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal ba las tshogs kyi gtso ba'i rtog pa'o// den pa rdo rjeg tan shi la tshogs pa'i gnyis dadage skyeng po sbas pa/ oM thAg
39b1(rgyud): rdo rje gtun shing gis phyag rgyas bcug la las 'di bslab pa// ma dag pa' sems can thams cad 'thung shing / phrogs shig/ sregs shig/ ze shig/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab po// 'jig rten ga
39b2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rnyog pa chen po'i rgyal po las pa nya'i tshogs kyi rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldanu 'das la rdon kyo btang la sogs pa bran rnams kyis de da ces nimal to// bcom ldan 'das padag kyi
39b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsu la rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'di rang gi 'ing dbang dul lo// maM bA ra ha da~MSh+Thi traka rba bi ga to d+ha ra sarbam kham pan hU~M phaT/ oM barba pA ra Ta hUM phaT/ oM b+hig te ka du

40a1(rgyud): chom ti d+h+r-i la~M/ oM Sh+T+rI t+ta mau na dz+nyA tan hU~M / man d+d+ha / dkyil la lo brgyad pa thos ti dus sri rdzo na so+o/  ni gas pa ma lakun tu
40a2(rgyud): kyis banag go// 'dug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do// 'din sbom dkyil 'khor ro// 'jig tan gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje khyim rnams kyi tog pa'o// de das

40a4(rgyud): su me sa srang bu byas te thig zhi btab la rim pa pa nir bre'o// gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil lakhor de bzhin du zlum par thig pa ni rim du btab la de'i dbus su gnod byin gyi gdong bri'o// ngos po nir ni ris kyis te sha sha/

40b1(rgyud): 'i tog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje pho nya ma rnams kyis smras pa/ oM b+he/ oM ka li ma dA / badz+ra dAkA sa ha na sarban nIm/ oM bA Tha Ne ba/ oM ma hA ka la bA ka tre hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor grwa lnga bar bris te/ rdo rje ni gA dbus su
40b2(rgyud): 'dug go// bani ni rdo pa nya mo banan ste de cog zhin dubya'o// 'a ga ten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i tod pa chen po'i rgyal po la sa do ba nyi ma tog pa'o// de nas do bran mornams kyis smras pa/ oM d+yA badzu / 
40b3(rgyud): ti ta rA pa ta la ma sa ya ma nu sma ra A bi sha hUM paT/ oM kA li ka pA li mA la d+ha ri NI ka Ta ka Ta maT maT b+hi mA rA ya sarba mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM pu ta ni u tsu sma ru dra khA ta sarba na sho Sha ya swA hA/ oM ma ka ra mu khi ha ra
40b4(rgyud): 'a'ar bu zhe no ni bres nas/ de 'i byasas do bres te de bzhin ga gyis mchod do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i tig pa chen po 'argyal po po mazhin ma martog pa sten pa'i spyad rdzogs so/ 
40b5(rgyud): de na pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na dong la 'di skad ces gsudus so// de bzhin ga shegs partsams cad kyi ga sang ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no// de bas tog pa'i rgyal ba 'di doni yod ci sa
40b6(rgyud): rgya ba byung byu gang shing sems can pamasacad pas zu dam pa pa blag tu ba par 'gyuba'i ma rgyud shod ce/ de kyi / ma pa can dzin ma ni ba can 'grus kyis 'gyu ste/ dpa
40b7(rgyud): 'a ba sdig pa byed pa/ bdun skab la lo can dka bsrud pa mi 'dod pa/ 'dod chags dang gal bas 'gyu /  ga tu chags pa ng+ge gu gdon ni bye ga dgyes sems can zlab nga cu bye bsnye pa
41a1(rgyud): /  ga na danag grags pa dang pa dang ma dang bu dang chung ma rnams ma thang 'dod cing de yang srid pas lakham pa ste/ phyogs nas phyogs so ya 'gram nus na/ sangs rgyas kyi nang dang ga 'angan gyig
41a2(rgyud): d+ha si smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/ phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa galas byung // phyag na rdo rje ga las
41a3(rgyud): / rdo rje yang na ga las kyang // phyag tu snying po yin pa dang // sngags rnams khyad par ci zhig yod// gsang bsgrub pa'i lta bu// phyag rgya bcing ba ji lta bu// de rnams kyi ni de nyid gang // byid kyi
41a4(rgyud): brlabs sa gas la// bsgrub pa rnams kyang de ltar mchong // das grub 'dod pa'i b+ha Ta// rapa la ri mo ltar gr-i// skug zugs tshad ni tsam nig/ nga ltar bzlas pa bya bar gsus// 
41a5(rgyud): mchod par bgyi// bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'gug/ ji ltar grub pa myur bar 'gyur// slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'akur// las rnams bsgrub pa ji ltar bya// de dag gi ni de nyid gang // thams cad bang
41a6(rgyud): labashad pa'i rigs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan te/ sems dpa' phag ma tha ma med// nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// kun du bzang po thams cad bdag/ 'dod pa 'gro ba bdag pa
41a7(rgyud): yin// sems can kun sems gang yin pa// brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o// mnyam par bzhag pas ting nge 'dzin// nges par rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de la smras pa sems gzugs med pa la ji lta na sra
41a8(rgyud): ba rdo rje 'gyur/ smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ba na sha dang / rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin te// sdug pa dang chags pa dang bde ba dang rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa rnams
41b1(rgyud): / bal ba sems can sa ba dang / ngo ska klu rnams khrom pas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin ngas pan mtha la gnam lcogs byung ba ma/ glog dang bcas te byung bdi bzhin du ngos po dag las rnga rje nyid du 'gyur te/  mas/ 
41b2(rgyud): / dbar byin brlabs sbyor ba yin// rdo rje sems dpar yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan rdo rje de nyid ni// bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de la sems dpar byin gyis rlab pa'i skyer ba gang she na/ sems
41b3(rgyud): kun gyi bdag chen// bdag nyid la yang gnas so zhes// byin gyis brlabs nas sems dpa' bdag/ yin zhes ngadargyal bsgom par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rgyal ba yi
41b4(rgyud): dang sems so sor brtags pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid yin// de nyid phyag na rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis so// 'jig rten dbang po nam mkha' snying // de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do// sangs rgyas
41b5(rgyud): rigs kyang de nyid de// de ni rdo rje chang ba'i rigs// de nyid spyan ngas gzigs kyi rigs// de nyid nor bu'i rigs yin te// khams gsum de nyid yi dashes gsungs// 'jig rten gsum po'ang de nyid do// de nyid
41b6(rgyud): byin papo// sems can kun gyi mes po ste// de nyid sems can gnas yin te// 'brang sa che rnams de nyid do// de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste// gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das thonam
41b7(rgyud): ma med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de kho na chen po zhes bya ba'i bar du byed pa pa'o// de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa'i khyad par gyi bar du bya ba ste/ snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba
41b8(rgyud): ti nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang ba brjod pa dang / smra ba ni snying po brjod pa ste/ snying po brjod pas na snying gis bsam pa'i grub pa 'ob ces bya ba ni snying po'i khyad par 'o// de nas byas
42a1(rgyud): / byang par // / dadza sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// gzugs brnyan stong ba 'ad ga// / phyag rgya kun gyi ga te// 'byung ba yang ni de yis paskyen/  ma // bran rnams 'gal
42a2(rgyud): mi byed pa// de bzhin rgyal ba nyid rnams kyang // phyag rgya 'da' bar yong mi mdzad// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// ji ltar gnas par mthun byas la/ hA/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen por bad
42a3(rgyud): nyid bsgyur// de ni phyag rgya chen po'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// sor bsnol brtan padam tshig ste// sems kyi shes ra ldan pa las// gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin// de dag dam tshig rtsa ba ste// 6
42a4(rgyud): cing ba rgyu'i mchog/ gang gis thams cad lus btan 'gyur// de phyir phyag rgya brjod pa yin// gang gis thams cad rgyas btab ba// chud mi ga ning rab sbas te// mnga' bdag gzugs brtan 'chang bas
42a5(rgyud): sgrub po rnams myur du 'grub// gang dag mthong na sangs rgyas dang // sems dpa' la sogs mthong bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pas gzir bas na// 'da' bar mi 'gyur gru par 'gyur// phyag rgya'i khyad par
42a6(rgyud): yin te/ don das pa'i dakhon nyid kyang phyag rgya chen ponas bya'o// de la sngags kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te/ ngag cam smos pa med pa ste/ sangs rgyas bka' ris grub pa nyid/ chos kyi tshig gis paphrul pa kye/ 
42a7(rgyud): sngags shes bya ba yin// de la rig pa'i khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig par ni med par byed// rig pa de bzhin chud par byed// don rnams rtogs par gyur ba pan// reg pa zhes ni de phyir bya// snying po dang phyag
42a8(rgyud): sngags dang rig pa'i rab tu bya ba gnyis pa'o// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba'i rab tu bya ba bshad do zhes bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pas gsus so// de la phyag rgya
42b1(rgyud): ni nyid basprul pa sa bcing // dmatshig dang las kyis phyag rgyan rdo rje cing ba dang 'dab pa la tsags pa byas nam / tshan chen po ga ga nyid nga ces rgyan rgya chen po la rdzogs pa
42b2(rgyud): thams cad bcing ngo // de yang ma chags pa dang slob ma ma yin pa dang / snod ma yin pa dang dad pa med pa la mi sbyin no// yun du sbyangs na de dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po 'di'o// 
42b3(rgyud): sa ya s+t+waM/ de la dam tshig chen po'i de khon nyid bskul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya ho su ra s+t+wa~M/ rdo rje khrobs phyag rgya thams cad rang gis bcing ngam/ gnan bci bdu gzhug na ni hUM zhes bya ba thang cig tsam gyis
42b4(rgyud): so// de nas rdo rje bcing ba la sogs pa bcing ba 'byung ste/ badz+ra ban d+ha shes brjod la rdo rje bcing bsnying gar chings shig/ de nas snying po 'dis sor mo thams cad brdab par bya'o// moM badz+ra ban d+ha nA tha/ 'dis ni phyag rgya tham
42b5(rgyud): dgug cing dbang du byed do// de nas rdo rje ye shes dba' pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo // badz+ra mA be sha zhes brjod la// snying po 'dis rdo rje dbab pa bskyed par bya'o// maHthams cad dbab pa'i snying po 'di na
42b6(rgyud): don mi za ba'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni badz+ra muSh+Ti zhes brjod la bcing ngo // de ste de ltar ma byas na yang sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag
42b7(rgyud): bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dang ga dang sems kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnying po dang yod pa 'ad bar byab ma yin pa ste/  stong bzlas pas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
42b8(rgyud): dmachog chen po'i phyag rgyal nag tsug bzlas na tha byab thams cad la gces par 'gyur ro// dus phyag rgyab cing ba babyung ste/ thal mo sbyar la song mo phan tshun bsgrol ba ni rdo rje'i thal mo'o// de nyid long mo mo bar rnam
43a1(rgyud): sbyinan tus mas can chung na/ du ngas sum pa na gnyi sa na du btsug / sa chung dang srin logags du ga tu bcug tum pa dzin rdodza dpa 'o mchogs phyag tan rdzu/ 
43a2(rgyud): rte pa la mthe bo gnyis gshibs la nang du bcug la de bzhin du mthe rgyang dang srin lag gi bar du btsugs te/ mdzub mo shin tu bkrug pa ni rdo rje tshur dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gnyis sa sa
43a3(rgyud): nilas kyi phyag rgya gzhan du 'gyur te/ dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod la snying ka 'am/ nam mkha' la so sor bcing ngo // ngag gi phyag rgya yang badz+ra dze hA zhes brjod la phyag rgya bcing ngo // lha / 
43a4(rgyud): kar+b+ha ni snying po'i don gyis bcing ngo // so sa'i phyag rgya dang mchu'i phyag rgya dang mig bskul ba'i phyag rgya dang / snying dang lus g.yo ba'i phyag tu ni sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod ni bcing ba grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo/ 
43a5(rgyud): hUMshes pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i khro ba'i mdzub mo na rdo rje khu tshur du byas la mdzub mo rkyang ngan rdo rje khro ba zhes bya ba yin no// rdo rje khro bo'o mdzub mo gnyis// lag dang bsnol te bcing zhas kyang / ma
43a6(rgyud): chung lcags kyu spel byas la// hU~M zhes pas ni bsdigs par bya// de nyid g.yas bkyo ba tang du byas pa ni// rdo rje khro ba'i gyo btang nga// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag mthil drug tu da rdzob cing // mthe bong
43a7(rgyud): gsheshes pas pa pa pa yi// margyur byas pa dam chezhe zhe/ byag rgyan rdo thob ste/ tang te shes bya'o//  ni dag ge phyag // legs kyi phyag tu rnamams cadag ba pa za 'o//  rdo'i ma gzhe cing na rdza
43a8(rgyud): babasal brkyang ste banag pa 'dis rdo rje ris gzhir 'gyur te/ de la sus kyang glags mi rnyed do// de la 'di ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bcings la mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas pa ni thams cad la dbang byed
43b1(rgyud): byag ts+tsha'o// rje tshig rdo rdza bcings yong bamag mnyam po gagabs pas sta ga gtugs shig/ gas ta mas 'du bar bas na mong gas oM// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis / 
43b2(rgyud): ci// de bzhi pyi dkyi byas pa ni// lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog yin no// rdo bcing ba brtan byas la// mang ba mo bcug pa shin tu 'acir// mam bong gnyi sa ka ga shibs pa yi// dbus su bci babar snang gi/ rdo sa su chu gnyis
43b3(rgyud): bcangs la// mthe 'u chung gnyis ga sbrel nas su// mdzu mo yin tu ba sbyar te// bzlog pa nam mkhar du rnams kyi'o//  rje pa cing ba brtan pas nas// 'a tshur kyis nis mnan pa// 'di ni sa pa'i dmatshig ste// thams cad byed pa
43b4(rgyud): 'a ba dkal// de thab tur gnyis bcas te// g.yon pa'i ma khyims mang byam ba cir//  rlung mong mamanyam brdabag// 'don gas rnams dgug pa'o// pa khyi mo gnyis kA/ tan po// deng bcis bsnyel la
43b5(rgyud): // gung mo mthe bong rdo rjer bya// rgyan rnams thams cad 'joms pa'o// rdo rje dkri ba dang rdo rje btsi ba dang rdo rje phreng ba dang rdo rjes dang rdo rje sa'i 'og dang rdo rje he ru ka'o// de la rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dkyil 'khor dag ni
43b6(rgyud): dben// srad bu'am yang na ri mo la// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba na// bsgrub pas yid kyis bteganas so// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra be ga hUM/ 'dis ni dam tshig ma nyams par 'gyur ro// gzham
43b7(rgyud): tshig tams pas grub pa med par 'gyur ro// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgyani 'di'o// dpung pa gnyis rdo rje bcengs te// rdo rdzam gu cur gnyis su byas labum mo btsugs tem
43b8(rgyud): byo la btsugs te phyug bya'o// phyag na rdo rdza ma na nyid byes dang pa'i stongs kyis gnas par bya la/ 'dus zhing baspyod padang srin ma byed pa dang bcas pa'i migagis phyag btsal lo/ gagazhan nam 'ayin sa
44a1(rgyud): nyin pa //  rgya rkyen 'dzin ma ma sa sa sa la de na gags ga sa nam
44a2(rgyud): yar mi byab ste/ dam cig lcags su yin no// de sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i phyag tubacang 'byung // rdo rjel tshur gnyis bca nas// gams pas bsdam par bya ni// ngo rje
44a3(rgyud): mdzub mo g.yon// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog bsam pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmachog gi phyag rgyani 'di'o// mthe bong gnyis ka'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis ka dgug par bya/ 
44a4(rgyud): rgyal mo'i dkyil 'khor// bung mo gnyis gang 'byed ga/ din de bzhin gshegs sems cad kyi dru'i phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thug pa dang gsug pa dang dbang du byab las/ 'da' bar mi gyu
44a5(rgyud): zhing / 'di mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur// de nas badz+ra'i kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ sems ni rnam dag shes bya ba/ brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o// mnyam par gag
44a6(rgyud): pas te dzi sa pasadon nyid du 'gyur/ ngas rgyas papa'i bdag nyid de// sems nyid ngas rgyas nyid rten no// sangs rgyas kun gyis khyen pa byas pag// des par bas rgyas nyed byas kya chen po
44a7(rgyud): das de bskor mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi sems so sor btag rtsub la sogs pa sangs rgya
44b1(rgyud): thob ba pa sa// dpanan ga shegs pa du rgya rnams kyi byan rgya'o// denas rgya da na tshod yas/  panasamapa bras/  bdag nyid 'gyod// dang 'a kyang ba / 
44b2(rgyud): byed cing // 'gying dang bcas pas rdo rje gapor// 'di yis kun 'gro skad cig gis// 'od dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa kun dbang thams cad pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas dang tshig gi/ 
44b3(rgyud): rdo rje bcing babacing ma nas kyang // gung mo nang bcug snying gar bzhag/ mthe bong male'u chung kha phye mnyam// rdo rje chen po ltar bcing // sems dpa' kun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// 'di ni snying kar bcings pa
44b4(rgyud): yis// phyag rgya kun gyi dngos grubab// dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rje bdag gi lus// bsgoms
44b5(rgyud): dmyung du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la// 'bying sa cas rdo rje gsod byas na// kyi shing gyen du ston tshul gyis// steng dang bzung na 'grub par 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
44b6(rgyud): 'di 'di med do// rdong la chur gnyis btsangam la// g.yas pag su dre spyong ba pa// mda' tshan pa yi tshul gyis sa// kun la bstan na chags par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya
44b7(rgyud): che ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyag rgya gtsug tor du bzhag go// de nas pa ba ste gung mo rdo rjer byas te/ delas blod te 'ung me nor bur byab la// g.yas phyogs su banag go// rtag par gung ma'i de rje'irje pad+mo ba nag go/ 
44b8(rgyud): sgo te gang mo dang mthe' chung gyes par byas la dayon du panag go// de nas mdzung ma gnyis dud pa byas te phreng thu ba cing gyi tshul du rtag par mdud pa byas sa tu sor mo thams cad ma the ru chung nas mthar kyis 'dzi/ 
45a1(rgyud): tham na da la'o// Sh+T+r-i // rnas pa ma ma ma ma shA
45a2(rgyud): nyin gcig cid bdag nyid byin gyis brlab sa nas/ de lta kyi sa nus pas ci 'do pa bde bar bya la/ phyan rgya chen po'i tshul gyis skang bus kyis tshig tu sems dpa' ba zlas te snying por
45a3(rgyud): 'a sa bzlab po// mam hA mug padzas tra wats+tsha ba hoHsu hahA trA~M/ de sbyar zla ba gcig bzlas te bsgrub bo// zla ba gcig mon pa'i mdzun tu tsho ba me na srog ci bkro ba/  thal mo
45a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis phyag bya'o// cung bdaganas nas ji ltar ngal bar mi 'gyur bar byas te/ de ltar mtshan mam par bzlas na de nang par bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i bdage zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa'i 'od
45a5(rgyud): sgrub pa po la 'khrung nas de'i lus kun du zhugs so// de nas sgrub pa pa yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i 'od can dang / zla ba'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa dang / lha'i rgyan thams/ 
45a6(rgyud): dkyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi lus dang ga dang sems rdo rje thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi rigs dang gtan dang / grogs po dang gnyen pa shes la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis ga
45a7(rgyud): 'ang po ma po na yang che bar mi 'gyur// lta bar byed do// mdzod par byed do// skrun par byed do// don thams cad byed do// de langang gi bye ma de nyid na gnas pa bzhin du gyu'i tshe 'grus byed do// de bzhin gshegs par
45a8(rgyud): yang gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang tsho 'phrul thams cad byed do// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba la segs pa'i gzugs kyis kyang 'dul bar byed do// sems can de dag gis kyang mthong ngo // ma brtul ba rnams kyang 'dul lo// 
45b1(rgyud): d+hA de par gzugs su 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang phyir 'ong ba dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma mchod pa byas nas phyir ra bya
45b2(rgyud): / don thams cad la longs spyod pa dang 'dod pa thams cad la dbang ba dang / 'dod pa thams cad spyod pa tshe nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dod pa
45b3(rgyud): 'iphyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje la bu tshur gnyis su bcangs pa las/ mda' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis me tog gi gzhu 'dren pa ni thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin no// rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyis snying kar rdo rje hUM shes pa
45b4(rgyud): g.yas pa'i dorje khu tshur gyis 'phen pas rdo rje 'phangs pas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o// de nang 'di ni dmachog gi phyag rgya'o// 5/ rdo rje 'u tshur gnyis bcangs to// de ltar kyob mthe'i chung mdzum
45b5(rgyud): mdud nas mthe bong gshibs pa yis// bsdams te snying kar banag par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa nges par dgug pa dang gzug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang 'dren pa
45b6(rgyud): byedapa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'khyud pa ni rdo rje dga' ba'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste// rdo rje bcings pa bsdams byas nas/ 8/ g.yon pa'i mdzubya mjeb ma mtshan du// mthe bo'i rtags ni sa
45b7(rgyud): nums// de bskyod par du bsdam par bya// 'dis ni bud med thams cad dgar bar byed do// rdo rjel khu tshur gnyis kyis rgyal ma chen 'dzin pa'i tshul du du'o// rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan no// dam tshig gi phyag tu 'bru'i
45b8(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni dgug par bya/ srin lags/ pibs la mthe'u chung ba skyed// de ltar mthe bong gnyis kyang bskyed ka 'di bstan pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang
46a1(rgyud): byams pa bston pa mang na gnan tu smos// du kyi stongs par byed pan mas pan chag gi phyag rgya'i byung hU~M/ cing bkun gyis naso//  legs gta du
46a2(rgyud): bsko dam su// 'jim pas bstod pas mdud pa ste/ khro ba thams cad mgu bar byed// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bcas dang // rdo rje gar gyi ba sbyor bas// sa da na me tog la sogs pa'i// gas pa'i mchod 'gyur du u
46a3(rgyud): / toko pa gzhan gyi gsang ba'i mchod pa dang yang sbyar ro// de nas rdo rje gar 'byung ste// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// 'dzum pas mtha' nas brtsams te dgrol// glog bzhin bsgyur te bskor zhing dgro ga 'gram pa dang nig
46a4(rgyud): cang ba ga jug zhes bya ba ste// bdag ci'i mchod pa thams cad do// mchod nga 'di ni gsol bas na// dom med nyid kyang myung du grug/ de nas rdo rjeg zlagam pa segs pa'i phyag rgyabacing ba dro bum ma btu las cel
46a5(rgyud): blta'o// rdo rje bcings pas g.yon pa'i mdzu me ni pi bang gi shing ngo // g.yas pa bkug pas ni len to// brkyang ba'i lag mthil gyis rang gi snying par byug go// me tog gi thal mo'i tshul gyis rdo rje robatung ba bya'o// rdo rje
46a6(rgyud): butur gnyis bcangs te/ g.yon pa'i mthe chung ni g.yas pa'i kyo btang gis bzung ngo po// slob tang dag yas pas sems dpa da mi tshig thams cad dang // sems can thams cad kyang gug go// rdo rnga bcings la ba
46a7(rgyud): mdung pa ni nags pa'i phyag tu'o// ngong khu chung gnyis kyi mdzub mo spel ba ni thams cad bcing ngo // de rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas ni thams cad 'bebs par byed do// de nas go cha'i phyag tu 'byung ste/ khu tshur bcings
46a8(rgyud): bai rul du bya'o// smos nas yang lhag par yang de bzhin no// spos nas snying kar yang de bzhin no// yang bar du yang mdud do// yang smom nas sring ka dang lhag pa pa yang de bzhin no/ 
46b1(rgyud): kau rang bzhin du dbang bskur ba gnas su'o// phreng ba drang ba'imadung 'tshul rgyas ma chu la sogs dngam ma thams cad dgral ba'i cad pan kyis tshul du 'o// danas 'phags pa sman ras ga nas
46b2(rgyud): dbang po'i phyag rgyab cing ba ni/ pade mo bums pa'i thal mo sbyar// pad+mo can par grags pa ste// mabe'a'u chung mthe bo gnyis 'gyed pa// sdig pa rnams ni sel ba'o// de nyid mdzub mo kyab tang du byas po ni thams cad
46b3(rgyud): 'gug pa'o// de nas pad+mo 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcings pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo mnyam pa'i steng du gung mo gnyis bzhag go// de gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa la g.yas pas pad+mo 'byed par bya'o// de nas
46b4(rgyud): drodrodog gi phyag rgya ni hrIHye shes kyi phyag rgya ni pad mo 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma sprod par gsungs pa nyid do// de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgyab cing ba ni nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis kas dbang bsku
46b5(rgyud): ba'i phreng ba bcing ngo // de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas nas// mdzub mo mnyam nas mtheb dang sbyar// de dag ngos su smad pa ni// dbang bskur gnas su dbang sbyin no// de nyid kha yang ba
46b6(rgyud): la snying kar bzhag pa ni ne bu'i khu chur zhes bshad do// ngan thams cad 'bog pa'o// de nyid las mthe bo'i rdo rjes mdzubs mnyam pa mnan te/ rgyab bskus pa ni rdo rje'i nor bu'o// rnaM rjes kyi phyag rgya'o// ye shes
46b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya thams cad nam mkhar bsgom pa'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyab cing ba ni de kur stA ra bshad pa nyid do// bAM/ ngag gi phyag rgya'o// khyams pa'i bcing ba ni bcing ba'i nang na mchog ste/ ye shes kyi phyag
46b8(rgyud): rgya'o// mdun du ni rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bstan pa nyid do// rgyab tu ni rdo rje bcing ba snying kar bkan nas mthe bo sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis dgug par bya'o// rdo rje
47a1(rgyud): / bad+ma chag go bAg r+b+ha kau/ dang du cung ba ma ba mnanan gnyis snying gar brkyang ba ni rdo rje ste/ rdo rje thams cad do// sathams cad kyi dmachog gi phyag rgya ste/ grub pa mas ca// 
47a2(rgyud): tshul ba phyag rgya kyil 'khor du bye'o/ danas 'angs dpal gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni drang 'udur mdzub mtsho rtse mo bcug pa 'di ni mabri'o// snying po ni glegs pam mo// dag cig phyag rgya'o// zhecan pa'i gles
47a3(rgyud): bam bcangs pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pas bzung ngo // yA/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o// chos thams cad la yi ge med ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya cing/ 
47a4(rgyud): bani/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs te// mthe'u chung mdzub mo do rnga'i bcing // do rda'akhor lo nas bshad de// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub papo// 'di mthong bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong ba pa gyur
47a5(rgyud): ro// de bzhin du dbusu kha bzhag ste bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur shing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro// hUM/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcing ba rde rdo rje / 
47a6(rgyud): bu phyag rgya las mthe chung dang srin lag mnyam pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du bya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya ni trA~M/ 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje ko tsho'i phyag
47a7(rgyud): rgya'o/ ga gi phyag rgya na ma~M/ de nas rtog pa thams cad spyi'i phyag rgya shes pa 'byung ste/ de la lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / rkang pa mnyams te brkyang ba dang lag pa bsgre ba
47a8(rgyud): ni dza phyag bya'o// mchog bsgrub pa la rjo ngam srungs par gyung // yangs nas g.yan pas do rjes gyur ba ngas nas g.yas pa 'jug pas drangs pas ni de rje lcags kyu'i phyeg bya ste/ thams cad rjes/ 
47b1(rgyud): 'phyag rgya la mo// langs la bus mo bskyed de ba cu gnas lag gnyis bsdams tacan dug ban thams cad gtan chu ma gro'o// bzung ba gnyis nyes ga sung gapa khyud pan ga ca snyam byed pa/ 
47b2(rgyud): de nas rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni a ho haM hU~M/ dbab pa dang dbang du bya ba dang bsrung ba dang gtan 'pho ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba ni/ myur 'gyur rdo rje'i lta ba ste// bgra de de btsums pa 'dren pa yin/ 
47b3(rgyud): / khro bo'i lta ba khro gnyer te// brtan par lta ba mi g.yo ba'o// de nas 'di dag gi las 'byung ba ni rdo rje'i lta bas skye 'gro thams cad mgu bar bya'o// bgrang pa'i ltabs ni thams cad dgug pa dang rims dang gdon dang du/ 
47b4(rgyud): dang byad ma la sogs pa dang nad thams cad sel to// khro ba'i lba bas ni thams cad brtan 'pho'o// brtan par lta bas ni thams cad bsrung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra dr-ishrI laT/ dI pa ta dr-iSh+Ti ma~M
47b5(rgyud): ku sha dza/ oM kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti phaT/ dr-i D+ha dr-iSh+Ti haM/ so'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ so bca' bas ni gtan 'pho'o// mu ra bas ni dbang du byed do// snying po bzlas shing khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas te phyag rgya'i las byed do// g.yas
47b6(rgyud): das gtsub ni 'gug pa'o// g.yon nas gtsub ni dbang du byed pa'o// ma ma chu sos mnan pas ni gtan 'pho'o// mchu gnyis ka bsdams pas ni bsrung ngo // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran
47b7(rgyud): ba dang rdo rnga khro bo rjes su dran pa dang rdo rje rjes su dran pa ni bamos cang sab pa ste mthu'i phyag rgya'o// mig g.yas pa bskyed pas dbang du byed do// mig g.yon pa bskyod pas rjes su chags so// gnyis ka tsums/ 
47b8(rgyud): pas ni gtan 'apo'o// gnyis ka bgrad pas ni bsrung ngo // thams cad kyi snying po bzlas te rkyen du bltas nanam mkha' la 'gro bar 'grub po// mthur du bltas nasa'i dbang por 'gyur ro// g.yas nas bskor ba
48a1(rgyud): naduganon gnags pa sems ca chod do// g.yon nas paska phyag na mad pa thams cad ni slong 'i sbyang sa nas bsgrub pa// danas bya sa bye nga rigs bya
48a2(rgyud): bcing ba 'byung ste/ de la 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i khu tshur las 'byung ste// rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje bcing ba las/ g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug nas mthe'u dung dang srin lag gi bar du
48a3(rgyud): bcing la bsdam par byaste/ de nyid la phyag rgya'i snying po 'di 'bum pazlas te bsgrub po// oM badz+ra muHb+h+rU~M/ rdo rje'i bu tshur gnyis su byas stegayas pas mtshan ma de ltar byas pa bzhin du gzung ngo // ma rnams
48a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur las g.yon po rdo rje'i khro bo'i mdzub mo spang ba ste/ dur khrod dam tshogs kyi gnas su rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mos mi khrag thigs pa gsum khar blangs
48a5(rgyud): temyangs nas mi rim mas shing mnyams pa rkang pa g.yon pas man te brgya bzlas na nas mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang pyad ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshogs de dag thams cad kyi dbang po
48a6(rgyud): gyur te/ zag 'jug pa dang phan 'dogs nus par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog thams cad dang rtog pa thams cad dang las thams cad dang phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khro ba'i
48a7(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// mo badz+ra mA ra li/ phyag rgya bache ba'i rab tu bya 'o// de nas do rjes la phyag rgyamams cad kyi gsang pa'i bsgrub pa'i skabs pad par byaste/ de nas dengazhin gshegs pa'i phyag
48a8(rgyud): gaming ba bsgrub pa ni dkyil la bang bri ste pa des du rjod slabacom ldan phrag rgya btsun mo 'ad// bla bya dgal su la bar stso'o// sems can kun gyi da sgrub byes// grub sa mchog ni bsgrub par bkri// phyag
48b1(rgyud): dzarda dkyil 'khor nas 'di zhes brje do// sur \u0f7fsa ma ya swAH/ badz+ras pras t+ya sid d+ha na~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyigs rnga pa'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bdan
48b2(rgyud): re// rtag tu bdag la grub pa stsol// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje khro ni thams cad byed pa yin no zhes de skad brjod la bsgrub par bya'o// ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag
48b3(rgyud): bsgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod cig/ gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// de nas phyag rgya'i de kho na 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni sems las sangs rgyas kyi
48b4(rgyud): chos 'byung ngo // yang dag par na'ang dag ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun po'i thugs la gnas pa yin no// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas bdag gi chung ma yin no zhes sngar bsgoms la phyag rgyab sgru/ 
48b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i de khon ni rabadaga' bcing ba kun gyi mchog/ de las phyag rgya rnams su byas// 'dod pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ grub brtan myur du stsol bar mdzad// de nas gzhan dag ni/ bcom ldan rtag pa
48b6(rgyud): 'dod pa ste// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de las thams cad bdag nyid gzugs// bdag kyang phyag rgya grub pa shog/ de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i de ben ni phyag na rdo rjes lha thams cad dbang du
48b7(rgyud): nas rnga rjer byas te/ de dag gi phyag rgya yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid do// de nas ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni/ ma rungs pa thams cad za ba'i phyir// lha rnams kun gyis byas pa ste// phyag rgya 'bebs pas de yi phyir// bsgom
48b8(rgyud): nam kyang ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de khon rab tu sbyor bas so ga mar bsgoms nas bslab po// phyag rgya'i de kho na'i rab tu bya'o// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab la sogs pa'i
49a1(rgyud): las bshad do nas den bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ nyinar dang po dus bzhin du// rdo rje che mchog phyag rgya yis// snying ka smin mtshams lkog ma bcug/ bdag nyid byin
49a2(rgyud): brlab par bya// de la byin gyi brlab pa'i snying pon 'di ma no// badz+ras tra badz+ra hA badz+ra d+ham badz+rag ma/ de la bde ni rdo rje rngon pa che'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po yin no// oM sa rba ta thA ga ta ma b+hiSh+Thany+tsa/ snying po 'dis
49a3(rgyud): rje rin po che'i phyag rgya smin mtshams su bzhag ste/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba'i tshul du bcings la/ lhag par mdud pa'i tshul du byas nas bskor te/ mthe'u chung nas brtsams te bkrol byas so
49a4(rgyud): thams cad bkrol ste dang dpyad pa ltar bya'o// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bskyod pa ni rdo rje bcing ba bkan ting dbang bzhag nas bsgom pa'i snying po 'dis rang ge snying kar rdo rje bsam mo// oM ba dz+ra AH
49a5(rgyud): \u0f7fdo rje'i brlas pa ci 'dod par bzlas so// de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa'i rab tu bya'i ni/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas// rdo rje 'gying ba legs par bya// rdo rje phyed pa de bzhin glo// 
49a6(rgyud): / po nas// dong bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing mchod par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'o// rdo rje rin chen bla med de// rdo rje chos ni grur blangs pas// rdo rje las ni mdzad par gsol// dga'
49a7(rgyud): dang dbang bskur ba dang gludang mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang rnyed par mi dka' na grub pa gzhan gyi ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems dpa'i bde ba 'di dang mtshungs pa med do// de nas
49a8(rgyud): phyagan rdo rje sa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/ nyin re dang por dung bzhin du/ nardo rje'i byin gyis brlab tshul gyis/ sa dag gis bdag rnyed byin pa byas na klag sems dpar byin pa rlabs
49b1(rgyud): 'byor ldan// rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje bcing // rdo rje 'bebs la sogs tshul gyis// rdon du hur rdo rje bcas// gnyis byas phyag rgya'i mchog gis su// bdag nyid byin gyis brlang par bya// 'de bapa dang nyid
49b2(rgyud): ces kyang bsgom// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o// de la gsang ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje'i klas ci 'dod par bzlas so// Tak+ki nga ho// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan lang rdo rnga bcing pas rtags
49b3(rgyud): bzung ste 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang / 'dod pa'i gzug sa dang 'dod pa'i tshe dang 'dod pa'i bdag po dang kun tu 'gro ba thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba
49b4(rgyud): du bya ba 'byung ba ni de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba de lta ba bzhin du snying po 'dis sbyin no// oM sarba ta pA ga ta rat+na b+hi She ka a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
49b5(rgyud): bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nyid yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang thams cad nyid do zhes nas snying po 'dis thams cad da gug pa dang gzhug pa dang
49b6(rgyud): btsong ba dang dbang du byas te bsgom mo// de la snying po ni 'di'o// ma~M satwA wahUM baM hoHde nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa thams cad byedang / 
49b7(rgyud): rdorje khu tshur gnyis bcangs la// rdo rje gar dang sbyar nas su// me tog la sogs dbul ba ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa phyog rgyas dbul// gzhu 'dren pa yi tshul gyis su// rdo rje mda' ni 'phen par bya// kun
49b8(rgyud): nas 'byung dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng // gnyis snyems 'dzin pas 'dud pa'o// derdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis rdo rje gru blang zhing mchod do// gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa dag gi bde ba dang / shin tu yid bde bcom ldan
50b1(rgyud): dngas dang shing dang ri dang chu rnams las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ston par byed do// 'od zer ston pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad ston to// rang
50b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// mig gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang daltar gyi shes pa thams cad mig rnams las mthong ngo // thams cad las
50b3(rgyud): rorolo shing rang gi lces sgra'o// sngon ma byung ba'i rtog pa dang mdo sde thams cad 'chang ngo // sngon skye ba thams cad dang sil snyan dang 'phong dang mtshon 'debs pa dang shas nyen dang bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad k+Sha
50b4(rgyud): kyis grub par shes par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du gzugs chen po dang / mdog dang stobs dang dpa' ba dang tshe dang nang med pa dang dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can tham
50b5(rgyud): cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang sgra skad dang tshig shes shing mayong ngo // nyin gcig bzhin thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur ro// mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub pas
50b6(rgyud): cadam bsgrubs pa tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro// byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// de la bslab pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrub pa ni mdun du bdag nyid sangs
50b7(rgyud): sa sbu rdzas su dran pa bsgom zhing snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams bsgrub po// phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa ni sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ 'dod par bsgom pa'am/ rdo rje sem
50b8(rgyud): rjemo su dran pa 'am/ bdag gi srings rdo rje bsgom pa'am/ bdag gi mdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i byed bzhin du snying po dang phyag rgya drang sngags dang rig pa rnams bsgrub po// sems dpa'acan
51a1(rgyud): da kyi gsems da rnas san / smyiganan rgyu mau / phyag kyadang sngags pa yin pa rnams bsgru ba rgya/ 
51a2(rgyud): gas pasgrub pa ma khro ba'i tshul gyis snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams bsgrub po// dang ma rnams bsgrub pa ni sems can thams cad pa pa'i rjes su dran pa'as bdag nyid do rje srin por gyu
51a3(rgyud): te/ de phyir bdag nyid kyang sems can thams cad bza'o zhes khros te snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams pa sgrub par bya ba'o// sgrub pa'i rab du bya ba'o// de nas sgrub pi'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba
51a4(rgyud): 'brang ste/ ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar bsgrub par gsangs pa ste// grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba'o// de nas ras kyi rab tu bya ba 'brang ste/ dal pa
51a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ni sgra med par byas la dkyil 'khor zlum por thig gdab po// phyag na rdo rje'i ras ni ngos thams cad por gru bzhi po dang ram sa la bri'o// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni rim
51a6(rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor bzhin du'o// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi mardungs pa la 'dus pa'i 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du dgod do// rdo rje ma rnams kyis nyams pal chang ma bcad pa ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis
51a7(rgyud): tshon rtsi snod sar par bzhag pas pre/ ras kyi rab tu bya ba'o// de la cha lugs kyi tshad rab tu bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam du bya ba'o// phyag na rdo rje'i ma
51a8(rgyud): yid pa'i phyir de ltar 'dzid pa'i tshad du'o// de sa 'i ched do ma du 'gyur zhen/ rang shes tha'i tshogs kyim mo ban cu/ rgya byag// dmi dzu byims ci bar byanas/ bu bzhel che lnga pa'i
51b1(rgyud): brang can dun tu bya'o// semapa dang nan pa thams ca nan tu chags tu sar bcu drugag cid bya ste/ thams cad kyang pad+mal bzhugs par bya'o// de bzhin du skragazugs kyi tshang las kyi
51b2(rgyud): dpa 'a bar byog / dpa 'di ni bzlas pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung ting nge 'don gyi chog ste/ de rna rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no// de la rtog pa thams cad kyi
51b3(rgyud): tshig gis 'azlas te bsgrub po// phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rje tshig gi klu dang sbyar te bzlas so// rdo rje'i hUM nas pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i khro ba rnams ni rdo rjerje khro bo'i tshig gis bzlas so// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams
51b4(rgyud): chos kyi chog gis rba za'i sgra chen po gsal bar byas te khro ba dang bcas paso bzlas so// de rje'i marnams ni rdo rje'i tshig phra mos bzlas so// de la ting nge 'dzin gyi dag ni yid kyis bzlas so// de la rdo rje'i drag ni lce
51b5(rgyud): garab tu mi g.yo ba pa/ so mchu gnyis ka sbyar ba ste// rtog pa kun la rig pa ni// rdo rje ringag ni sgra spangs pa'o// de la rdo rje'i glu tshig ni// sha rnga pa la sogs pa'i glu// grong dga' ba rnams blangs pa yis/ 
51b6(rgyud): chog bzlas tog par// dro rje'i spun 'khrugs pa'o// de la khro bo'i tshig ni 'a'o// rnyinas pa'i 'brug sgra 'dra// di mnon phra zhing ska dang ldan// khro bogs pa brdo rtse'i// blo na tshig ce la grags pa
51b7(rgyud): tshig ge bya ba'o// de la 'dir ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya ba yin te/ tog pa dag ni kun la yang // sems dpa' gang dang gang dag gi/ snying po phyag rgya sngags bsgrub pas// de yi bdag nyid spyan drang bsgyul
