51b8(rgyud): dras dang srog cags thams cad ni// rang gis tshul gyis chog thams cad bsgrub pa'o// rdorje bzlas pa'i tog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'o// darje sems dpa'i gas pa pa'i bzlas pa 'byung ste/ phyag na rdorje stong
52a1(rgyud): po dang phrag rgya sngags rig de bzhin te// bzlas pa'i don gyi mgon po bzlas// rtog pa kun la'ang bsgrub par bya// phyi yi rdo rje rags rnams kyi// khro ba'i mnyam par 'dzag pa'i// 
52a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyi// yid kyis mu ni snying yang gzung // bzlas pa'i don zhes bya ba la// phyag na rdo rje'i 'dod pa bsgom zhing bzlas pa ste/ 'di ltar e zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ste bde ba chen po'o// 'dod pa ni rdo rje
52a3(rgyud): sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'dod pa ni thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro// pa zlab to 'dod pa ni shin tu dga' ba'o// 'dod pa ni bzlas pa'i don to// gsang ba'i bzlas/ 
52a4(rgyud): pa'adi bzlas na bsod nams chung ngu yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bslu bar mi nus so// thal mo khong steng du sbyar ba mchod pa bya ste/ de la me tog gi mchod pa ni mcho
52a5(rgyud): thal mo gyen du phye bas so// bdug pa mchod pa ni mthung du brkyang bas so// mar me'i mchod pa ni mthe bo mnyam pas g.yogs pa'o// dri'i mchod pa ni rab tu brkyang ste spong ba'am gang bas so// phyag rgya/ 
52a6(rgyud): de rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid du mchod par 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig
52a7(rgyud): dang lha thams cad la yang ngo // mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// de la bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba cig nyin re zhing ci tsal 'dod pa'i ched dukyi
52a8(rgyud): bzhir bris nas ri lta babazhin du mazhugs la phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rang ge lug pa'i lha la na brgya bzlas so// bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// de bsgyur du 'grub par gyu
52b1(rgyud): pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin chos sbyin la sogs dang // rgya chen tshul nams klog pa dang // dang la gnas te bzhin mchod// dngam grub tu
52b2(rgyud): po yin// de la phyag na rdo rje'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ 'dod la chags dang bral min dang // 'dod la chags pa'i dam pas mchod// 'dod la ci nus chags bya ba// myur du dngos grub sbyin pa yin// de la'i
52b3(rgyud): dbems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa ni/ sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod// brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin blo// ci nus gyis kyang bya ba ni// nyin gcig bzhin du ci 'dod par// phyi
52b4(rgyud): ri'i rigs kyi grub pa myur ba ni/ sangs rgyas mchod cing de bzhin dang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// rdo rje rtag tu lag na gzung // mi bsrung ba thams cad tshar gtsad mchog/ de nas rdo rje sa rnams kyi grub pa
52b5(rgyud): 'du bsgrub pa'i bya ba rab tu bya ba ste// sems can dge la dang pa dang // mchod cing dam tshig bsrung ba ste// phyag rgya'i gar gyi mchod pa dang // sems canam rungam drag shul bya// grub pa mAr pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// sa slo/ 
52b6(rgyud): dkyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bsgrub pa ste/ dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar badz+ra bidade ces bya ba'i snying po steng rtsa brgyad bzlas// 
52b7(rgyud): sa slob dpon rang gis dam chog gi phyag rgya srong bzlas te slob ma dbang bskur ba'i snying po na 'di'o// badz+ra sa rba badz+ra rat+na badz+ra d+harma badz+ra ka ma ma~M a mu kha ma d+ho tiSh+Tha sarba ta thA ga ta A dAd t+te swA hA/ 'di brgya bzlas pa/ 
52b8(rgyud): snying ka la sogs par phyag rgya bzhag nas spyi bor thams cad bzlas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dben sbyin no// phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs spyi ber bzung nas snying po 'di brgya 'am brgya
53a1(rgyud): brgyad du gag/ brgya bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pasan tu 'dun gyi smras dpon du gyur ro// dal stong pon 'dig/ 
53a2(rgyud): oM ma hA pu ka badz+ra sa twa dzaHhUM baM ho/ sung ste/ de nas de'i lag tu rdo rje sbyin no// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi ste/ lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin nas rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje'i dri chus bsres pa'i dus pas dbang bskur ro// 
53a3(rgyud): dpo 'di'o// oM badz+ra a d+hi ba d+hi ShAM ma b+hi Shiny+tsa me dri D+ho b+ha ba tsu ts+tsha ba~M hoHhUM phaT/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi slob dpon du bsgrub pa ni pad+mo lag tu byin nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te pad+mo'i phreng ba sa mgo cing
53a4(rgyud): snying po 'ding rjod do// oM pad+ma mA le ma ny+tsa la~M ke shwa ra ra tra~M swA hA hrIHrdo rje rin po che'i slob dpon du bsgrub pa ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya skyob ma dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag nas snying po 'di stong bzlas
53a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa rat+na d+hi pa ti twe b+ha ba ru Ta/ slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du btsud de dbang bskur ro// phyag na rdo rje slob dpon du bya sti/ yang bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la bdag
53a6(rgyud): tede la bdag gis slob dpon du dbang bskur ro// de la slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob na po na ni zla ba gcigag bar du rab tu byung la bslab pa thams cad bzung ste
53a7(rgyud): rang gi lhag pa'i lha dus gsum du bsgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byin gyis brlab pa la
53a8(rgyud): sogs pa byas nas phyag na rdo rje'i sbya'am/ rang gi lha nyid la mchod nas kyo btang gis bkrus ste/ me skyo bar bzlas te lam dang sam ma yin pa'i skabs mi dbye'o/ dan phyag na rdo rje'i brtus
53b1(rgyud): byung ste/ nyin re zhing nang par ladras nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te bkrus la dri zhim po dang gis 'tshor ba dang rgyan gyis chas te glu dang sil snyan dang bkod pa dang / sgeg pa rnams dang la
53b2(rgyud): pas bcom ldan 'das la ma tog la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das dang / bdag nyid la 'dod pa'i dngos pos mchod pa bya ste/ dam chog chen po'i
53b3(rgyud): nyid ci 'dod pa bzlas te/ phyed yol gyi bar du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spang nas de bzhin du ma chod pa byas te ci 'dod par bzlas so// de nas yang mtshan rangs par 'dod pa lnga rnams la brten cing bzlas par
53b4(rgyud): de lta bzhag pa'i'i bar du bya'o// den pa rdardo rje rigs kyi brtul zhu gas ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du smon par bsgyur nas de bzhin gsheza pa thams cad la phyag 'chal zhing phyag na rdo rje mchod de/ mgos pas
53b5(rgyud): nas sgren mor byung ngam/ gos gyon yang rung ste/ mdo bo rdob cing mi 'o cog la gshe zhing rgyal phyag rgya na mas kyis gar byas te/ yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsams nas mtshams bcing ba la sogs
53b6(rgyud): khyal nas bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas mo// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ ba'i gcin tu ba gang 'thungs la pa
53b7(rgyud): bzung zang thos na dag pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad 'grub po// de nas zhag bdun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bsastan pa stong rje brgyad bzlas so// dedam de rigs kyi 'dul thugs ni nyin paning pa
53b8(rgyud): rabaskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po rnams mchod
54a1(rgyud): datson gyis grub pa thams cad dang / phun sum chags pa thams cad dang zhes pa thams cad dang kun gyis mchod pa la sogs pa dang las thams cad rngub par 'gyur ro// sleb dpa
54a2(rgyud): rab tu bya ba'o// de nas las grub pa ni snying po brgya sa brgyad bzlas te las thams cad byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa brgyad stong bzlas na
54a3(rgyud): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad la phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags ni rdo rje tshig gis stong phrag brgyad
54a4(rgyud): bzlas na sngags thams cad zad cig bzlas pas las kun byed do// rig pa stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ de nas rig pa thams cad zang cig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do// de nas snying
54a5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams 'byung ste/ badz+ra satwa ni/ snying po'o// swa ta badz+ra ni phyag rgya'o// oM ni sngags so// khi ti ni reg pa'o// de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang ri
54a6(rgyud): pathams cad bslab pa'i snying po 'byung ste/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra swAr+b+ba dzaHhUM baM hoHswar ta s+t+waM/ 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpas bzlas pas glu dang rdo rje'i cho ga sa
54a7(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nA snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang reg pa'i dngos kyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 'jig rten gsu
54a8(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las phyi ma'i rgyud bshad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pa phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
54b1(rgyud): lda 'das bdag gis 'jig te gsum las rnam par rgyal chos kyirnam grangs 'di bshad lags na/ na mam ldan 'das lta na gshegs pa rnams grub pa dpam
54b2(rgyud): 'dul ba'i slad du yul gnan du mchi ba'am/ dbul por 'gyur ba'am 'khrug pa 'am phrag dog gam mdaba' pa 'am sdug bsngal ba pe 'dod pa chung pa'am 'dod pa la chags pa'am rab tu 'byung bar sems
54b3(rgyud): sa gnod pa mang ba'am nyes pa mang ba'am mya ngananam na dang ma 'jigs pa mang po la sags pa gzhan yang dad pa med par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur bar lhag pa'i bsam pa'i chos skye ba dang / 
54b4(rgyud): yongs kya ba byin gyis brtsub par gas la/ danapa na kyis na ding pa din ces ga su la/ tshon pa pan nyid ska dang gsung dang
54b5(rgyud): thams cad pa/ mthul ba 'dul ba 'di khyod kyis de bzhin du bshad pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so// 
54b6(rgyud): 'i lta bar bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan dag gi yang rung bsgrub par bya'o// gang dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyis 'dul ba de lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la yang snying po 'di na no// 
54b7(rgyud): rnas rba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa tra to/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ 'di yang brgya snying du bzlas nas de nyed dmag nan yang bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi napas la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bca pa/ 
54b8(rgyud): spangs so// sems can ldan la pan pa'i phyi// rtog pa'i das parab bgad pa// 'jig rten lasum rgyal zhes bya ba// grub pa thams cad ngas stsolamachog/ gang gipa po du btsam gyis ma// rje pa
55a1(rgyud): las rnam par grol// 'jig rten kun na mchod pa ste// grub pa thams cad mthob par 'gyur// gang dag 'dri zhing klog pa dang // 'dzin cing dad pa de bzhin te// des tshe'adi nyid man
55a2(rgyud): grub pa thams cad thob 'gur na// dad pa brtul zhugs brtan pa yis// sgrub par byed pa ci smos te// sangs rgyas phyag na rdo rje nyid// tshe 'di nyid la de yis thob// tog pa kun kyang slar yang rung // rang gi
55a3(rgyud): / byas pa'ang de bzhin te// rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid bsgrubs na// dad pa med kyang myur du 'grub// bdag gi khyim du gnas pa'ang // de la bdag kyang kun 'grub phyir// de la bdag ni bsrung bar gnas// dngos pa
55a4(rgyud): / dang ni 'dod kun dang // 'phel ba dang ni 'tshe med dang // shes pa rnams dang tshe dang stobs// gzugs mchog nges par stsal par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan pas bzhengs te/ khams gsum mtha'
55a5(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i rdul phra mo rnams kyi khyab nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// sems dpa'
55a6(rgyud): / rdorjes gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs s+ho// // 'di'i 'gyur la lo chen rin chen bzang pos bsgyur yang ze
55a7(rgyud): nal 'byor rgyud la mkhas pa sha lu ba ye shes rgya mtshos tshe gdon la legs par dpyad nas nus dag/ yang 'ga' zhig ma dge blos bskur re zhes kyang 'dod pa yod/ skrag lung brgyad 'bum la skyugs pa'i ma las
55a8(rgyud): sa khyi grus/ ma// rgya yangs/  As sa/  byung du// deb sheg gags par gyi tshol pa pangs
55b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su song ba gze rjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba/ bam po dang po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
55b2(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi dgang ba'i tshal mchog tu yid du 'ong ba ma nor bu dang / gser dang / gser kyi shing lal ga dang sdug mar bcas pa dang / shing shel ba dang / sman dang / 
55b3(rgyud): ka ma la dang / u pa la dang / kar Ni ka dang / bku ba dang / ti la ka dang / a shoka dang / man+dA ba dang / man dang bachen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / dpag bsam gyi zhing rnams kyis mdzes par byal ni
55b4(rgyud): rkan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya sna tshogs mang po skad snyan 'byin pa/ rnga dang / cang te'u dang / ker ko dang / glang bu dang / rnga bo che la sogs pa'i sku grag pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dang
55b5(rgyud): 'i du mo sna tshogs rnam par rtse ga/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu'o
55b6(rgyud): khong bye ba khrag khrig nga rgya stong phrag dum dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / yi ma ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / klu ma sogs pa 'khor dum dang / byang chub sems pa
55b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyang la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad meng pa dang / rtse gros mi g.yo ba dang / khyo gros yangs pa dang / kun tuH
55b8(rgyud): krol dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros gsal dang // blo gros chen po dag kye grom grangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu grom snosogs la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i bya
56a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnamapa kyis spyi stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ mched cing rjed pa rab tu mchod cing smrab te/ 'bar mang po'i dbu ma na tshangs
56a2(rgyud): bachen po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ngan pong gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i byang chu
56a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang sdud pa mang po'i phreng ba nyid kyi dpral ba'i mdzod spu nas byung nas/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
56a4(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad kun tu snang bar byas so// kun tu snang bar byas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol te/ bde ba so sor thob nas
56a5(rgyud): ba'i tshal thams cad kun tu snang bar byas pas mchod pa'i sprin ma tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas nas mgo bos lan brgya phrag stong du phyag 'tshal nas/ 
56a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma'o sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs// gang phyir ngan song bdag cag
56a7(rgyud): spangs// byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
56a8(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'ad bar kun tu snang bas ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol zhing / rnam par grol ba'i la ma la bkod pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngom tshar lag
56b1(rgyud): po// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mche'o// lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na
56b2(rgyud): med pa bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yang dag par bsags pa'o// lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa'o// lha'i dbang
56b3(rgyud): sang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamapa ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o// sangs rgya
56b4(rgyud): ldan das rnams kyi spyod pa ni tshed med pa'o// sangs rgyab bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba'i skye satshad med pa rnams snod du gyur bar mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad rnams ni mi mnyam pa
56b5(rgyud): nyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smod pa
56b6(rgyud): sa dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i dbang po de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod ji lta ba bzhin du sem can gyi don mdzad pa dang / ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi dor
56b7(rgyud): dang / sdos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di la the chom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyes ma byed cig/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar
56b8(rgyud): 'gyung ba'i gnas na med do// de nas gya rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rang gi stan las langs nas yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa che ba rgya che ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
57a1(rgyud): gsol to// sems can thams cad la phan pa nyid du bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la skyang bache ba nyid bu bgyi ba dang / ltung can nyid du 'gyi ba dang / skang du na/ 
57a2(rgyud): bo can du bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs pa bskyed par gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs pa bskyed par gso ba/ bcom
57a3(rgyud): ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris 'di nyid nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos te/ dus las 'das nas dgung bdun yon lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang du skyes/ bde
57a4(rgyud): ba dang / sdug bsngal ni ci zhig myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po che ste de'i dus
57a5(rgyud): la bab par shes na nyon cig/ lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus ni 'di lags so// bde bar gshegs pa dus dang tshod ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
57a6(rgyud): / dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/ des der lo stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du sdug bsngal ma rungs sheng
57a7(rgyud): mi bzad pa myong nas sems can dmyal ba chung ngu rnams su yang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo // de nas byol song da // yi dgas kyi gnas su yang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo // de nas/ 
57a8(rgyud): mas tha' khob kyi mir skyes nas kyang 'on pa dag/ reg pa dang / lhag pa'i rang bzhin pa ni dang / slu ba migs la bar lo skyong phrag drug cu'i bar du sdug bsnga la myong // kye stong phrag brgya na rtsa bzhi nad nag gra
57b1(rgyud): 'jog pa dang / mdze dang / rol mig rnams kyis gzing ba dang / skye bo mang pos smad pa dag yongs kyis blangs pa dang / rigs dman pa'i rigs can rjes su myong zhing sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal
57b2(rgyud): ba dang / gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa bar chad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang / gzhan yang sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa myong shing myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin la sogs
57b3(rgyud): lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas shin tu sngangs shing skrag ste/ skyo nas kha thub tu 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal chen po brgyad pa 'di las ji ltar
57b4(rgyud): der bar 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa de ltar thar bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci ras kyang sdug bsngal kyi phung po 'di las rnam par grol bar 'gyur bang 'di bskyab du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa 'di ba skyab tu ga
57b5(rgyud): so ga bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang bshad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig/ de nas lha'i dbang po ba
57b6(rgyud): gzhan dA nga ba dang / man drang ba chen po dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che dang rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang / dag pa dang / se mo la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi byed par rnas pa
57b7(rgyud): tshogs kyis mngon par chod/ lanab cu sto drug ma 'i sbyor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal te mnom ldan 'das lags so// 'de gshegs pa legs so nas byabs mnyes par byal dang /  'du
57b8(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnam pa ngan song gi chad gsum las rnam par thar bar bgyi ba'i slang du legs par bshad du g.yog de nas yang tshar la pa
58a1(rgyud): la sogs pa lha mang po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so// ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams
58a2(rgyud): kyis mtshan tsamathos pas kyang ngan song gsum gyi las las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten nam/ mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi
58a3(rgyud): slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir ro// 
58a4(rgyud): yod gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang de nyid kyi thugs kanas sngags 'di phyung nas lha de dag dmachog can du byin gyis ba
58a5(rgyud): oM sarba bi drA badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ngan so
58a6(rgyud): thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne/ shud d+he be shud d+he/ sarba karma A par
58a7(rgyud): bi shud d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen po 'di bshad ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud kyi 'ching ba thams cad rnam par chad do// ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par spangs so// sdug bsngal mi
58a8(rgyud): bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi ste/ skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ oM sarba a pA ya na/ saHsa
58b1(rgyud): / 'i dbang po gzhanas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stso pa'o// oM sarba a pA ya sha~M d+hin hU~M phaT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
58b2(rgyud): dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM traH/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po la/ hUM/ A'i dang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams tshung
58b3(rgyud): ke mas can rnabs ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'di yin no// na mo b+ha gA ba te sarba durga ta pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa mya ka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ 
58b4(rgyud): d+hA na d+hane/ sarba bA tsa b+hI no ne/ bud d+he ste thud d+hes rbaka k+Sha m+ba par Nami nung d+he swA hA/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'o// mi smras bid sa sa ma par Ni na rgya la chen hU~M phaT/ oM larba be hA/ oM man med paT/ oMs
58b5(rgyud): da.a/ oM sarba bid tA Ta ya/ oM sarba bid oM/ oM sarba bid pra/ oM sarba bid a/ oM sarba bid hUM/ oM sarba bid tAT/ oM sha/ oM b+haN+Da lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i
58b6(rgyud): bi 'arjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yang nyan tam/ bcangs sam/ bklanas sam/ bris nas kyang mgo bo 'am/ gtsug pung dag/ dang
58b7(rgyud): ba'am/ mgul du btags te 'chang na tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang 'brel ba'i rmi lam gyi rnam pa 'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag
58b8(rgyud): thams cad mi lam tsam du yang mi 'byung na/ dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la// zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur la snying po yang bzlas brjod byed cing / sngags kyi ngan yang sgom pa gang yin pa lnga smos
59a1(rgyud): ci dgos te/ de dag la ni sreg pa gang yang nya bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro// skyes pa'am/ bud med dag/ b+ha'/ klu / gnod sbyin nam/ srin po la
59a2(rgyud): song ma/ yi dgas sam/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gang bang rang bzhi pa'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug stong bang bsrung na/ desems can dmyal bar skyes na yang dam thag tu rnam par bar
59a3(rgyud): sa lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la
59a4(rgyud): sogs pa yang byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/ rgyu dngas pa can du yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su lang ste/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
59a5(rgyud): dkyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung bar bde ba skyong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po mdor na 'jig rten nam/ 'jig rten pas 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur
59a6(rgyud): deras lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa/ 
59a7(rgyud): mas la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pade blag tu
59a8(rgyud): gas par bgyi ba'i slad dub sang bu gsol/ rje gcig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong bar
59b1(rgyud): bzhi dzi shA 'dzin pa snyoms pa bzhugs na nga lan gshegs pa tham tho sems cad yongs su myong ba'i gas na yin na pa 'di gsung pa/ 
59b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang // de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la
59b3(rgyud): gas brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gtsug lag khang dang bskyed mos tshal// mchod rten lha khang kun dka' sogs// de bzhin pa'i cho ga yis// gnasa'i byin gyis brlab pa bcag
59b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// bu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtang pas bzhi dang ldan pa dang // them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang // seng ge bar glang rnams kyis brgyan// dang dang
59b5(rgyud): dogal phreng / khril bu dang ni rngams brgyan// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan// srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang // phyi yi'o khrud rnams kyis brgyan// dgra me char ni bkos pa/ 
59b6(rgyud): a// sgo dang sgo ljang sum char bya// rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la// lte bar bcas sher rtsibs bcu drug/ rim pa gsum dang tran/ 
59b7(rgyud): la// rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya// dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni// dung dang kun dbu 'a dral// zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yi/ seng ge'i gdad la bzhugs pa dang // ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang / 
59b8(rgyud): nams kun gyis brgyan par gro// de 'i spyan sngar ngan song sus// slong ba'i rgyal po ze bya bre// byas gnyis ting 'dzin du 'du bsngol// zla ba rgyas dang pad+ma'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis legs/ 
60a1(rgyud): rdzogs la// rgyal mchog skyes bu gang bar gre// N+ya tu shAkya'i rigs dbang gau/  zu pa khra ba bya// g.yon dang galas kyi phyogs oM/ mag
60a2(rgyud): tog gnyis// lo tsan dang sA ma kI// de bzhin dkar mo skal ma rnams// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin// Ta grA li phyo gas ni kun du bris rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// rdo rje sems sogs
60a3(rgyud): dpa' mchog/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa' rnams// go rim bzhin du bri bar bya// mkhas pa sa lA s+ye la sogs pa// mchod pa grwa yi phyogs su bri// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ 
60a4(rgyud): shi ni bri bar bya// ta babs khyams ni thams cad du// byams pa la sogs bri bar bya// nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang // de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams// khro bo mngag pa po nya sogs// bri bya
60a5(rgyud): ming yang rung // phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya// 'jom bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri// byang
60a6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas par bri bar bya// gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te// lha mi dri ba nam mkha' lding // gnod sbyin srin po lce 'byem// 'byung po yi dgas 'dre rnams dang // klu dang grul bu la rin
60a7(rgyud): dang// rgyal po bzhi rnams bri ba dbya// gang 'dang sangs rgya skar dang // khro bos rdungs 'thob ye// bgegs dang bi n+da ya ka nams// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// drang srong skal pa chen po rnams/ 
60a8(rgyud): bkra men ma dang bud med bri// de bzhin sring mon la 'byor ma// 'byung ba bzhi yi lha chen po//  khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang // shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs// dur khrong grong khyer gnas pam
60b1(rgyud): dbang ban 'am ya na na// thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya// de nas mkhas pa sa kyil 'khor la// bra ra rgyal mtshan lhas zhu ba dang // gdugs dang ngam wa wa dang // 'phan dang sna chags na
60b2(rgyud): gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni// brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung // dbang bskur rin chen tshus bkang ba'i// bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya// mar me gtor ma bum pa dang // mdzes pa'i bshos
60b3(rgyud): gzhag bya ste// bza' ba btung bsgyur legs dang // bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya/  gnod sbyin srin po'i khabs su// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ 'byung po dag dang klu ga pa li
60b4(rgyud): de bzhin te// me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang // 'o ma mar dang kha ra bcas// nam rgyal bum pa dri'i chus// rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya// de nas khrus la sogs byas la// dri dang phreng mchog
60b5(rgyud): can// dri'i ma kha bkang mchog mdzes pa// rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang // me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug/ gtso bo rgyal bsras kyi 'khor// mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te// phyag rgya sngags
60b6(rgyud): bdag ldan ning// lcags kyu la sogs nal 'byor gyis// dzaHhUM baM ho thug sa rje'i bdag/ tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang // gsang ba'i bcing ba bcings nas ni// mdzub gnyis lcags
60b7(rgyud): 'i tshul du bya// zhags pa bzhin du srung nas kyang // de nyid lcags sgog tshul du bya// mtheb gnyis nang du bgug nas ni// bskyod par gyur na dbang dur 'gyur// de nas mtshan ma skyes nas ma gungs
60b8(rgyud): galam mo med pa mngon sum mthong // margya mchog btags gsar la sogs pa 'i// dbyangs snyan pa yi ba myed dang lha ngas kyi// mchog gi das pa rnams kyis legs par mchod// den pa
61a1(rgyud): po kun gyi gtor ma bya// sems can bkres shing sgom pas gdungs pa dang // phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag/ na sa gtor med ltar 'thun par bya// do nas sngags pas
61a2(rgyud): bla med byang chub kyi// gnas su slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par// de dag byang chub sems mchog skyed du gzhug/ de rnams byin brlabs byang chub smon lam ga
61a3(rgyud): bcing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la// bsrung ba byas nas brtul zhugs sdom gnas pa// rab zhi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya// dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni/ 
61a4(rgyud): 'dzin dpal pad mar lag gnyis bya// me tog rin chen la sogs de brtsod la// yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya// sngags ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra mad+d+hi baN+Di ts+tshaH/ 
61a5(rgyud): swa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra be sha hAM/ a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hU~M// de nas lcags 'dis ma tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob pa'i phyir// bdag la lugs brtsed dgo
61a6(rgyud): // ldan par dgos nas na bya ga/  /  na la sogs gang// 
61a7(rgyud): gaN tsa rigs de bsgru bas // dngos sul gyur chom med// denas sngags pa mi bas pa yis// sngags 'dis dang tshig sbyin par bya// oM badz+ras ma ya hU~M phaT/ denas / 
61a8(rgyud): skyeb ba bcis tu ma cig gis bye pa gnas par bya ba'i thugs/ ya 'dzus ma mdzad pa mem pan u taHhUM// de na pa 'dis dang cig bslab par bya'o// 'din khyod kyi
61b1(rgyud): cag dasan rjeg pa / ma tshog sus dus su/  / daldag nas gzhag/ 
61b2(rgyud): khros nas kyang // bdun rgyad rigs ni brlag par mdzad// de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// shin du mos pas bsrung
61b3(rgyud): khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// sa byin par yang blang ci bya// brdzun dang 'dod la smang pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas byas yin// tsAng ni btung bar mi bya zhing // shil sogs pa pa' mi bya/ 
61b4(rgyud): sems can gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnams kyang bya ba la yin te// dkan ma chog gsum na yongs mi smra// dus kun tu ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // lha dang blam de bzhin no// 
61b5(rgyud): la sogs pa gang yin dang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// lha la phul ba'i rnying ba dang // de yi grib ma 'go ma mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te// sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya// gang
61b6(rgyud): la sogs bya ma yin// mu stegs can la'ang slad mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis som gnyis potshom mi bya ste// bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no// mos pa brtan dang ldan pas ngas
61b7(rgyud): rgyas nas// sarba bid kyis ji bzhin dbang bskur \u0f7f// bum pa la sogasa'i snyed zang thogs pas// bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dkar bskur// de nas lag tu rmel bu rdo byeg// 'khor lo la
61b8(rgyud): gas na can bdan sogs pa// mi bang dab phyug 'am ma zab pa dang // sdigs gnom phyi dab ni bsu bar bya// lugs pasgrupa byer rnams can slongs la// sngags pa ga zhi / 
62a1(rgyud): bsgo bar bya// des kyang mos pas skye bos phyag 'tshal te//  snyen yod bram dbul bar bya// nor dang gte dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gaper// banon pa khyis gdan thu ba bumanam
62a2(rgyud): skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni// grong dang grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams// rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis// yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya// myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la/ 
62a3(rgyud): mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang // 'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kun pa
62a4(rgyud): bla mar mahAm// rdo rje slob dpon brnyam na ni// rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur bas// cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya// dod sun dang sring mo dang // rdo rje ma rnams nyid pani// rnal 'byor can gyis
62a5(rgyud): brnyas ma yin// rtag tu 'khon gyi bcugs mi bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // bla ma smod byed ma rungs pa// dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang // de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la// bzod
62a6(rgyud): bsgom par mi bya ste// da ltar gyu na kur rig gis// gsungs pa'i dngos grub phob par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan pa dang // brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
62a7(rgyud): kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang // phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de
62a8(rgyud): du bris la/ g.yas su ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su myong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po/ g.yon phyogs su 'i bla 'thub pa/ ngan song thams cad skyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun du spyan
62b1(rgyud): rag gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad ma bsnams pa'o// shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi lha mo mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra ba
62b2(rgyud): pa/ phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du bya/ rta mgrin dang / 'jig rten gsum la sa rnam par rgyal ba/ ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lhal brten par bri/ de gnyis kyi dbus su la
62b3(rgyud): dang / mAm kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrolas rnams rang rang gi mtshan ma/ phyag na bsdams par bri/ de dag gi 'og tu pad ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu krir dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / 
62b4(rgyud): dkar po dang / nya khar pa la sogs par bcas pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog rna mi pa du mas yongs su gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar ma dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / 
62b5(rgyud): tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i 'og tu bsgrub pa po nyid pal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ning 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba
62b6(rgyud): den pa la byin gyis brlabs par dmigs par bya'o// de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo ni gnas dngos grub du 'gyur te/ bas
62b7(rgyud): dang ni nga sra nga // dri ba bu'i sgra dang 'brugs dang // dge slong bram the po mo dang // 'bras bum thong na myur du ma// mchog dang ba masam 'grug// de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang // phyag rgya mngon pa
62b8(rgyud): byed brlab sanas// ci bdag pas ni mchod par bya// rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang // 'di gi rkyen gsum las rnam rgyal kyil// bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang // bdag gi nyid pa
63a1(rgyud): dngos klu ba mtshan mabyung bar du// 'byam phrag gsum 'am drug 'bum bzlas// de nas dben pa'i gnas sum// brgyad pargyas nyid du tshong bar bya// sdigs khrel la tshul med// 
63a2(rgyud): par bzlas// de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin ba sams la// mchod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag 'azlas par bya// ci ste gtso ma de yi sras// 2
63a3(rgyud): dag+hA na mas mthong gyur na// bsod nams sdod la ci dga' ba// dngos grub mchog ni gsos par bya// g+ha ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni// de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol// phyag 'tshal dngos grub la
63a4(rgyud): / sogs blang // dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la// skal pa re phul nas ni// de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing // med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis// blangs nas bdag nyid spyad par bya// sems can
63a5(rgyud): nal phar brtson par/ bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur// ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na// las rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur// gnod sbyin skam ma'i gdon la sogs// 
63a6(rgyud): bka' tsam gyis// zhi bal sogs las kun ni// bran bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po ba rgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
63a7(rgyud): sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar nasems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal spang po'i srang du bsgrub par bkye// bcom
63a8(rgyud): na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal
63b1(rgyud): par cig/  so+o// sa basbyin du / brgyad du bzlas nas ni// dbang bslang ba ni rabatu brtag/ dan
63b2(rgyud): sdig pa kun sbyangs te// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las// de ni byur du rnam par bar// sdig las rna ma grol bdag nyid // dag pa gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi// rigs su skyes par gyur nas kyang / 
63b3(rgyud): rtag tu sangs rgyas dang // chos 'gro ba ni thos par 'gyur// de yi gzugs brgyan briba'ag// gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung // na sang gsum gyi sdug bsngal las// sems can rnams ni dkrol ba'i
63b4(rgyud): phyir// sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing/ snying rje can gyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur// lha yi gzugs su btags nas
63b5(rgyud): chod rten dbus su gzhag par bya// rang gi lha'am g+ha gzhan gyi// snying po snying gar bris nas kyang // lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de/ 
63b6(rgyud): ku bzang pos sngags bris la// rim gyis 'bum ni tshad tsam du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig can sreg ni ba dbya'i phyir// bye bsnyed ni tshang bar bya// de ltar byas na nges par ni// dmyal ba
63b7(rgyud): dgrol bar 'gyur// yi dgas byol song sdug bsngal las// grol te g+ha yi gnas su skye// de'i ming nas brjod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing // 'bul phrag stong ngam yang shin/ 
63b8(rgyud): phrag stong du tshang ba dang // bye ba stong du rab bzlas ra// lha yi gnas su nges par skye// na yi ming nas brjod nas kyang // mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya'am ni// yang na brgya phrag sor skyengs
64a1(rgyud): / sbyin sreg byas par gyur nan// dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur// de srid mtshan ma shin tu ni// 'bar pa'i gnas na myos gyur par// mtshan
64a2(rgyud): yang dag byung ba do // til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // ra mi 'o ma ldan pa dang // dri yis bskus pa'i lam shing gis// chog bzhin du sbyin theg bya// donas de ni nges par yang / 
64a3(rgyud): / lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas// de yi mtshan ma ston par byed// yang na g+ha yi mchog tu 'gyur// yang na he ma lung nang du ni// me yi lhas ni ston byed cing // lha yi gnas su skyes pa dang // sdig
64a4(rgyud): bcom pa'i mtshan ma ra ni// dkar po nyid dang g.yo ba su 'bar// gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med// zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phrol// brtan pa glog bzhin dri ma med// yang na me lce nyid kyis ni// bdag
64a5(rgyud): / nyid de bzhin ston byed de// zla ba dri med dkar 'dra ba// bzhin mdog dkar shing lam mar 'bar// de ni mtshan ma 'di dag gis// dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde
64a6(rgyud): 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni// cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la// rdo rje mnga' ma bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya// rigs sde yi ni phyag rgyar
64a7(rgyud): de bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri// de bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten gcil sogs paze// bya dang thum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang // brgyad snyed tsam sa
64a8(rgyud): bzhag pa 'am// yang na bcu drug skyed du gzhan// bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos// me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla re rgyal mtshan dang la sogs// gdugs mchog rnams kyis la
64b1(rgyud): par brgyad// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khar dam par ni// skyon sreg rab tu bya ba yan// chog shes pas bris nas kyang // lharnamapa mang po sbyin drangs la// sngags shes pa sa~M ni sr-ig sa phyi ga rgyas/ 
64b2(rgyud): dbul bar shes nas kyang // mdor na mchod ba byas nas ni// lha yi sbyor bar rab gnas la// gabur gur gum la sogs pas// mer dang 'om til bsgos la// til dang yungs kar 'bras
64b3(rgyud): rnams dang // dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste// 'bras chen yos dngal du dang // sbrang rtsi sha ka rang ldan pa// brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la// yams shing la yang de bzhin te// rang gi sngags kyis
64b4(rgyud): btab pa'i shing // khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya// rol sngags kyis btab nas kyang // chu mchog gis ni bkrung na sa su// bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang // 
64b5(rgyud): sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas 'dug/ me tog phreng la sogs pas mchod// gtsug pud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bres nas ni gdags par bya// snying ga zhog sa la phyogs su// @
64b6(rgyud): drwas byin gyis brlab// dpral ba mdzod srun pa gnyis// mgo bo gtsug phud dpung pa gnyis// sna dang rked pa pus mo po la/ long bu s+tha yi rtse mo dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba ye// dbang po
64b7(rgyud): nams kyi gnas lan// de ltarang gzhan du sngags// mchog tu dge ban sa gzhag go// de nam ngan meng srung ba'i phyir// spyan dang bcas nyam pa dbus su// gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin// de nas
64b8(rgyud): sngags pachang sngags kyis ni// btab pa'i gos kyis g.yog par bya// de nas byed pa dge bar basbyar lo// me kye stong gis la khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// bla dkar kun da'i gal 'azhi ba'i ga
65a1(rgyud): mtha' las pa yi gzugs kyi me bkug sa// ar+g+ha dbul par brtags nas de bzhin du// rtswamachog ldan pa'i mdun tu gzugs sogs gzhag/ de ltar gsungs bzhin
65a2(rgyud): yon tan 'dod pa yis// de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs la// ar+g+ha la sogs btags te de bzhin du// bder gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya// de na
65a3(rgyud): byin pa la ni brtag bya ba// bsreg byas bkang ste de yang sbar ba'i phyir// de nas bsreg byas bkang ste rim gyis ni// rgyal la sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag/ de nas skyong ba'i sngags
65a4(rgyud): rgyal po la// bsreg par bya ba nyi shurtsa gcig brtag/ de nas sman drangs yo byad lan gsum dang // a rgyal sogs pad+ma ma'i dag panal mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad ma nags bsdams
65a5(rgyud): pa'i// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs// zhabs kyi pang las sdigasanan cing // rkyen rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho// bsam
65a6(rgyud): sam ya nga na bris kyang rung // de yi snying pos de bzhin du// brgya phrag stong ngam yang ni ni// bye ba'i tshad du sbyin pa sreg bya// ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung // de bzhin sreg can rgyud ces bya// de
65a7(rgyud): la bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni// cho ga bzhin du bslu bar bya// phal ba de dang rus pa'i rdul// sngags kyi btab pa'i dri chu dang // bskus 'o ma la sogs lngas// spyong ba'i
65a8(rgyud): lcags kyis blo ldan gyis// 'brum du bzlas pas brdzis nas mig ga bur dri dang bsgos pa yis// 'jim pa dang ni bkres nas kyang // gzugs su bya ba'am yang na ni// mchod rten gyi ni ltar
65b1(rgyud): byas la// gcig gi gnyis sam gsum 'am la// yang na bcu rtsa brgya da nga // sngags dang phyag rgyam btab nas su// 'brum phrag garnya ba du bzlas// denasamachod rten 'bar gyur
65b2(rgyud): yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum 'aya// dri dang bdug pa 'od kyang rung // snang ngam yang na dang ldang ngam// lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs par ni snang gyur tam// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phya
65b3(rgyud): dang // me tog la sogs la ro ba dang // dung dang ngal sogs pa'i sgra// glang bupi bang la sogs rnams// ci ste mtshan ma 'di dag ni// sdig can thos ni ma mthong na// 'du ma chag ni brgyad
65b4(rgyud): ma// ji srid mtshon ma byung bar du// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal ba
65b5(rgyud): de nas da yi sdig pa'i// dag pa nyid dungs par mthong // g+ha yi lus kyi gzugs gyur la// rang gi spyad du ngoshes 'gyur// mtshan pa 'di dag shes na sa ni// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis kyang // byas
65b6(rgyud): dang snying rjer ldan pa yis// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// yang na med par gyur na yang // bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni// ming tsam lags par bris nas kyang // mchoran
65b7(rgyud): bya ba dang // yang na gzugs su bris kyang rung // phyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs// rang gi meng smos sngags btang nas/ 
65b8(rgyud): blas pa byas te song nas kyang // rgya mtsho nga 'ab po'i klung du do// de ltar na ni sreg can yang // ngan song las ni par 'gyur na// dge ba'i mchog me bskyed pa dang // byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/ 
66a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i rgya ldan pa// sbyin pa'i pa ma phyin par ldan// tshul khrims chu dang rab ldan pa// bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dag// shes rab rnams kyi
66a2(rgyud): bsgoms pa'i// 'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos// myur du de yi ngan song ni// bcom par gyur te po chos med// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la// med par lta ba gang yin dang // byang chub
66a3(rgyud): lam las rnam log pas// bstan la she sdang gnod byed cing // sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma thob la// ma dang pha la snying ming shing // byang chub sems la brten pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba bsad
66a4(rgyud): pa rnams// ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam// sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin// sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs// shes rab thabs rnams med na ni// sdig can de dag mi thar nas/ 
66a5(rgyud): bder gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas brgya byin la sogs lha// pad ma lta bu'i mig phye nas// legs shes bya bas mnyes byas te// rab tu mgu bas mchod byas nas// brgya
66a6(rgyud): byed gzhan la phan brtson pa sa// ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa/ na 'dren pa nyid du byas gyur nas/ nang nas de ni dmyal ba ye// sdug bsnga pa las nA~M/ 
66a7(rgyud): bar nas kyang // dga' ldan gnas su sems can ku// phan phyir bdag shegs 'dra bar skyes// de nas dbang por bcas pa yi// grags chen lha rnams gar byed cid// mchod pa'i sprin ni/ 
66a8(rgyud): mtha' yas pas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod bya'i phyir// lha ye tshogs kyis mdun byas te// tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas/ khre b+ha rdzas rnam pa sna
66b1(rgyud): ma tog bdug po byug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyam mtshan 'phan lo sa gas// rgyan la sogs par ba mdzes dang // na bza' rin chen char la sogs// dga' bamatshal na gang bar byas/ 
66b2(rgyud): dgas la mtshan mor gyur te// lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas// dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yi// sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags// bcom ldan 'das
66b3(rgyud): ka' rus pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis zhig/ rdzu 'phrul nam par 'phrul pa 'di ni m+bu'i bu nor bu drim med pa'i 'od ces bya bar yin no/  mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa yang myong zhing mthong ba
66b4(rgyud): chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro'i dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nga mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad
66b5(rgyud): grin gcig tu chon 'di skad ces klub so// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med// chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med// dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de// sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med// de nas lha'i bu de dag/ 
66b6(rgyud): shes bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyimangala' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra bzhig/ de'i rdzu 'phral dang
66b7(rgyud): madz+ra ni dzi ga bra lags// lha'i bu nor bu drim med pa'i 'od ces pargya ba bdag cag la bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis b+ha thams cad kyi snying bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
66b8(rgyud): dper gyi phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis las byung ngo // byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'ad mas bya ba'i chus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying kar zhugs te bskul nas
67a1(rgyud): / yang de nyid du ma snang bar gyu// dri nas lha'i zung nyid rab tu dga' ba gyu nas sus kyi ma pag cad kyi ka stong tshun chad nyon pam oM thams cad ga su
67a2(rgyud): / lha'i bstong blag du sa lal kyis pan ming bdun du byas nag/  du 'phrul chen thos snang sa te'o sbyin pa dag ma pad gas shing snang bar byas/ 
67a3(rgyud): ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to// de nas lha'i bu das bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 
67a4(rgyud): ma shA kyam gan pa yi// sangs kyis mdzad pa la mtshan te// gang phyir ngan song lhung ba yi// sems can myur du grog bzhin grol// denas skad cigs na rgya shi t+ya'i rabang mo tsam gyi me / 
67a5(rgyud): thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad brgya brag stong du dri'i dang ldang ba/ lha'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grag pa/  mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi klu dang / gar dang bdung ba dang / gling
67a6(rgyud): dang rnga dang ker ko rnams kyi sgra snyan pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung ste/ dam par nas kyang shin tu ma mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bas // 
67a7(rgyud): kyab// grags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bsas mi khyab// byang chubarten pa nams kyang bapos kyi khyab// tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bsam pas// de nas kyi'i bde dag gis de blta bar 'dodapa
67a8(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha'i bu de dang / de'i 'khor gyi dkyim 'khor rnams palta bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das palta bar 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa blta
67b1(rgyud): bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mas pa gnyis nas 'od zer byung ste/ 'ad bar drim med pa das lha'i bud dang lta mam de dag kun du snang bar byab te bsgral napa de nyid dum snang bar gyur pa / 
67b2(rgyud): nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lce'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba tshal thams cad g.yos
67b3(rgyud): bar byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas shing bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// sngags kyi byin brlabs ya mtshan che// gang phyir mtshas
67b4(rgyud): med lhung ba yi// sems can ma gnas myur du skyes// de nas spyi'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu dang // gser dang / dngul dang / do shapa
67b5(rgyud): dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan chal sogs brgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / lda ldi dang / rnga ma la sogs pa yo bya
67b6(rgyud): kyikhyad par sna tshogs pa dang seng ge'i gdan dang gzims cha dang pho brang dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang / spos la sogs pa mchod
67b7(rgyud): pA'i khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams kyang phul te/ ba klung dang / rta dang / seng ge dang / phrag dang / spe dang / rko ba dang / zug re dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / ra mo dag
67b8(rgyud): srin dang / bge dang / ra dang / glang dang / kha dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par dum yang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod/ 
68a1(rgyud): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyi mkhor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon pa mchod de/ lags panas bya ba gso pa nas maldan ldadas dang / na gnyis pa dram da
68a2(rgyud): spyang du byas tesdug 'tshal nas de bsnyen du song ngo // den pa pargya byin dang mangs pa la sogs pa rnams ma jug tums can du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang legs so zhes byabs
68a3(rgyud): spyod cing mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang ba dang klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin
68a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol/ sa kyi byin deng tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis/ legs pa mnyon la yid la zung zhig na lha'i bu rnam pa dge ba \u0f7f/ 
68a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyin lam du mos pa gyu khamams can sa rab sa rnams kyis ni mayin no// sa col tu phyin pa bcul mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi na lam du nyaM bar 'gro ba
68a6(rgyud): sems can pa la bas rabs kyis ni ma yin no// sems can bsas pa nges pa rnams dang // phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi na lam du 'gro bar
68a7(rgyud): / don thams canam khyen pa'i gapa na pa ma dun khyen masu thob pa ga // dam pa / ngal pal dog la ba dag kyang dag pa
68a8(rgyud): sa dzin cas nas chom ldan 'das padag sa yod du krung pagasas de pa gzhags pa padag can rjod thas ste/ gang ge sang bdag cin shes
68b1(rgyud): dathabatsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su myo 'i gza brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i zhal nyid nas thos pa
68b2(rgyud): dag cag de ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ 'che ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pas 'jig
68b3(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po'i 'dis sems can rnams
68b4(rgyud): don pa kyad pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur// rnam par smin pa ni ni 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de dag ni skyes bu dam
68b5(rgyud): 'ba' zhig du bzad kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyam nyid du blta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po gango ga phyir 'jig rten pha rol du song nas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyapa
68b6(rgyud): chen por skyes pa'i sems can nams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spang bar byed pa dang // byang chub la gdon mi za bar brtan par byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi
68b7(rgyud): pal rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po dper na khyod kyis 'i bu gong bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no// 
68b8(rgyud): 'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongasas pa'i semasasananalas kyodapa byed pa'i sems can de dag/ cos son skye bo yin snyam sems sam/  gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// de/ 
69a1(rgyud): ba gshegs pa ma lags so// lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni nyis bu dam ma chen po// gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya/ 
69a2(rgyud): mchod pa/ rjed pa/ sti stang du bya ba/ 'phrag la bkur bar bya ba yin na/ kAr bcas pa'i 'jig tes mas la spos kyang ci dgos// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams
69a3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems
69a4(rgyud): dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu rgyal po dga' ba dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang / 'phrogs bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sdeng por/ chen po pan tsi kang
69a5(rgyud): na cig chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya chen pa'i b+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ljang dang / dri ba dang / mi 'am cid
69a6(rgyud): lho'aphye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / skar ma la sogs pa thams cad kyis migrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
69a7(rgyud): bran 'das bdag cag 'dus shing chags pa thams cad kyis skyes bungs pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang bar bkye'o// mdo pan rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / 
69a8(rgyud): bsgrub pa dang / sra bar brtse'o// bcom ldan 'das gang du brtas pa'i rgyal pa 'di rigs kyi su ma/ rigs kyi mo da pas sang ngam/ srog 'am/ gzhanas byakyil la pa dag
69b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan lam gas pas mchod par 'gyur ram/ rgyas ring/ sa sam/ bram ze'i rims sa pa/ rje'u rags sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan ya
69b2(rgyud): rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i bu ram/ rgyal po'i bul 'am/ rgyal po'i tsun mo 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor po la/ rgyal po'i gakhor mo 'am/ gangs yang rung bas 'chang zhing klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher
69b3(rgyud): yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lags so// rang gi skyo bo dang / gnyen gyi skye bo dang / yongs
69b4(rgyud): byebyebo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams yongs su bskyang bar ba gyi'o// na dus dus su char dbab par bgyi'o// 'bru la sogs pa bskye
69b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o// skye bo mang po la phan pa dang 'dra ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi phrum mang po gzhom par 'gyi'o// sems cad ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan pa'i sem
69b6(rgyud): bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i sla du bsgrub par bgyi/ ma rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gdod par bgyis pasal panye bar gnas par pagyi ste/ bcom ldan pa
69b7(rgyud): lader na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta 'um ldan pa pa la das pas/ ma ldan 'das bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar baN+DI
69b8(rgyud): sgra'i dbang po khyod kyis ri ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtastan pa'i byam pa 'don de bzhin du ba bar bya'o// daN+Di ra ra'ang pa lags kyis/ 'jos bu'i gleng na gnas pa'i sems can sreg pa'i
70a1(rgyud): chas la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por
70a2(rgyud): bgayod par byos la srubs shig// ngan song thams cad yongs su stong pa'i gzi brjed kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa las btag pa dang po'o// / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan
70a3(rgyud): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad do// dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni// dgye
70a4(rgyud): nga rdo rje gsor nas kyang // shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa// thub pa'i gtsol phyag 'tshal nas// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugasas
70a5(rgyud): nasong thams cad rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+han ba dra hU~M phaT/ oM sarba karma A bar
70a6(rgyud): b+ha sh+mi ku ru hUM phaT/ maM nu b+h+rU~M bI nA sha ya A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ ma~M d+ha bi shwod+ha la A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ a~M dz+wa la dril d+ha kan ka ha na ha na sarba A ba ra NA ni trAM phaT/ oM bru~M sa ra sa ra pra sar thas
70a7(rgyud): rba A bA raNI ni hU~M phaT/ oM druM hA ra ha ra sarba A ba ra NA ne hUM phaT/ oM hUM phaT/ sarba A dA ra NA ni pi s+pho ta ya hU~M phaT oM pra ta pre ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM tra Ta tra Ta sarba A pa pa/ 
70a8(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshe ts+tshid sarba yA ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti ha huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sa rba pre te ka ga ti he huM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba ti r+ya ka ga ti he huM hUM phaT/ de nas
70b1(rgyud): dgan chos kyim tha~Md can dang / mo saH/  nashAd+hA hU~M / ma sasas 9/ ni rnam lo ka ka trA phaT a
70b2(rgyud): natsa n+dan naM hU~M phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'kho lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can// skye bar bcas shing rtsibs nyams
70b3(rgyud): dang gi ris pa bres nasas// zhi ba'i na ma sa// dgra po thub pa gzhan bya// lakun rdo rje slob ma ni// dpa' byed pa spyan thar bri// rgya baN+Dal ci mos sbyar ba bri// g.yas phyogs rgyal
70b4(rgyud): gtsug tor la// g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri// gse ba'i dpung po mi yi phyogs// dbang po phyogs su gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs// rnam par 'jom pa ni ri ta ri// zisan
70b5(rgyud): ze bya ste// klu bzhi pa la gro bzhis/ nga ga rta babs brdzun par bya// dpas gas bla nanas pa dang // lcags tho gze ba na rnams 'an pas phyog pa tha ngas/ 
70b6(rgyud): bdug pa la sogs za bar bya// de nas dri zhim dri la sogs// rang gi lus ni bslus nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas maM/ oM dzaHd+hU ba hoHb+ha ga bAr ti ma tra kar Ni kA rbi bya hoHsa ma
70b7(rgyud): rnas pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo // de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas// de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan sor thams cad las rnam mar grol te/ bde 'gro ra
71a1(rgyud): ris kyi 'jig rten dang gong nas gong du sa rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas su yang gdon ma za bar 'grub par 'gyur
71a2(rgyud): go// bram bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byab pa byas pas ni rims nang thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// 
71a3(rgyud): nan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi
71a4(rgyud): ky-i nas kyin sa sa rgyan das/  sa migs pa tha te bzlas pa dag byin thog dang / da nams kyi ba ma pasbyin na pomamapa cad las yongs su tshul pa
71a5(rgyud): da do// den ma com ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes l+r-ing go rad+hasbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyigal du bltas te// phyag mtsha lan pa 'di skad ces gsos to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya das pa'i
71a6(rgyud): nyid bshad par bgyi'o// thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i// rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlobs// mnyam par bzhag pas dpral bar ni// phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas
71a7(rgyud): der gshegs skyes rnams kyis// phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad// rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs sa// thal mo snyam par gyur ba ni// rtag tu pad la'i rigs nyid kyi// bang pa'i phyags
71a8(rgyud): yin par bshad// rdo rje bal mo sbyar nas kyang // snying gar krung ma'i mtha' sbyar ba// rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'dren dmachotshig thams cad 'a tshan byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rgyal du bdudu
71b1(rgyud): zhag pa/ de'i stong du ga yas pa bzhi ga hU~M/ ma ngas gnyis smad ldan pa'i sta 'dzin de lan gzhog pa ti na / yin pa bshad do// 
71b2(rgyud): nyid pas bzlog rtse lhag 'og bsnol la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo rdzog
71b3(rgyud): rasbyar ba las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis mnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar mnyams
71b4(rgyud): ladza/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag pad mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan
71b5(rgyud): / bo thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad skyong ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub yo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bos
71b6(rgyud): sor bsdams la/ lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bskur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// snyim pa bzod la gyen du
71b7(rgyud): yor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o// de las 'oganas gyen du 'phor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo gnyis kyin du mnyam la mdun na 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
71b8(rgyud): 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// dbyed pas rab mi rgyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i byin gyi'o// de nyid las su mo gnyes nang du bcu ga pa ni a s+tha'i byag bya'o// rdo rje cings pa las nga / 
72a1(rgyud): mo gnyis mnyams te/ migs dang po gcag la bar mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam
72a2(rgyud): 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o//  nyid lasa'i dper 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// de batshur gnyis las
72a3(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te/ mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor lo skur ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lha
72a4(rgyud): bur byas te/ lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la// sor mo lhags rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni
72a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa me 'jigs pa skyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brgyad ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni
72a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags pa'i'o// de nyid pas me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mdara'o// de nyid les skar bkug ste/ mthe bo kanyis rtse mo spad pa ni tho gros
72a7(rgyud): thegs pa'ig// de nyid las tshigs paras bcug pa ni na paci'o'o//  nyid las mar mo rnams 'angad bar 'dra bar 'gyid pa ni gape brjid kyi'o// nga nyid las skye bor bzhag pa dpal gyi'o// / 
72a8(rgyud): nyid las mdun du bzhag pa bshad pa'i'o// de nyid las pa dang 'dra bar byas pa ni pad ma'i'o// de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'i'o// de nyid las gdu lu khra bar byas pa ni
72b1(rgyud): 'kho tsho 'a'o// de nyid las pad ma 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lho'i 'o// de nyid las rdzi mo yang tsam po skyed byin rgya gram mo// de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis
72b2(rgyud): bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o// bsdams pa nyid mdun du gzhag pa ni 'dug pa'i 'o/ de nyid gyen du bskyod pa ni phreng ba'i'o// mdun du mthe'o gnyis bsdams te/ 
72b3(rgyud): skor ba ni mar me'i 'o// de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis spang pa ni zhags pa'i 'o// de nyid las gcig la
72b4(rgyud): gcig 'dud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid las bskyod pa de sanyes pa'i 'o// sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te/ cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam
72b5(rgyud): bar rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o// yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i sman sngar 'bum com zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad
72b6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lho'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom phran 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu no
72b7(rgyud): ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyisnga
72b8(rgyud): / ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na/ mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan du gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde
73a1(rgyud): nas bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ dam mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa sa rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pa 'tsho ba dang bral bar gyur pa dang / ma de'i mya ngan gyis
73a2(rgyud): gzir bsam yang dus las 'das so// lan cig ci zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshol stug po gzhan zhig tu rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo // de na drang srong dgos pa med par byams pa
73a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba zhi ka gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin du la mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dgas dang / phag rgod dang / ba lang dang / ma he la sogs pa dang / sprul dang / sre mo
73a4(rgyud): dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ba/ rlung dang grang bas yongs su
73a5(rgyud): gdung zhing 'tshe ba de na bdag nyid chen po 'di gnas so snyam par sems kyis brtags nas de'i drung du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po khyod ci/ 
73a6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis padag la gnod par byed/ drang srong gis smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las// sdug bcwa
73a7(rgyud): kyi lda bcung shad tsam shi ga blangs nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar sna bar 'gyur bas 'dzini sdug 'ardza gyi/ smad cig tsam 'ami/ 
73a8(rgyud): mni gsus gyi ba de 'arjes su myong bas bsgral pa brgya slong phrag dums pa thug pa med par dmyal pa la sogs pa'i thug la nga ses su gyi 'ar ma ngo sus gyi sa pa 'don pa'i phyir
73b1(rgyud): migs pa yang gsang bar 'gyur nasag chags gzhan latsams te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun tshangs su byar ldan ra byed pa gyur ro// drang mthun
73b2(rgyud): klub pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci dag
73b3(rgyud): rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smos shig dang / de la kho bo yang skyabs su lachi'o// pha ma la gtses pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcad na sdig pa de lta bu zhig thob par
73b4(rgyud): ngas rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhi g.yo sa su loH/ pas ma bsad pa dang / srog chags rnams kyang ma bsad na bsod nams ci 'dra ba cig
73b5(rgyud): 'bras pa sa pasheg cag 'dad pa'i po ma spyad grangs na bsod nams dang 'bram bugyi 'dra bzhig 'o ba/ de nas dang mngang bad la 'dra skad ca basmras so// ci stesems can chen ba sa
73b6(rgyud): po tshig 'di nyan 'dod na// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal la// gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni// ci bdog pas ni mchod byas te// sangs rgyas spyod
73b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// batha mam chos ni nyan par gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag pa// thob nas kyang ni skyabs su song // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos// rgyal pos thos nas dka'
73b8(rgyud): ramyur// yi dgas byol song dmyal ba rnam la// sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste// yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams/ ga g.yod ce bzhin tu mi bzad pa// pa ma gtses pa'i rgyu las byung / 
74a1(rgyud): pa du mar rab sdug bsngal// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// mgon med skyabs kyang med pa ste// thos nas mya ngan zug rngu yis// rang gi yid la gdungs pa na// ji ltar rlung
74a2(rgyud): gis mar me bzhin// de nyid du ni dus las 'das// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes nas// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi/ blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la// lha rnams
74a3(rgyud): kun dang yid 'thun zhing // rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes// bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas// ngan song du yang ltung bar gyur// de nas da ltar lha dbang po// khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni// dga'
74a4(rgyud): ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog/ bde yang kun gyi gnas su skyes// lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang // gang gi tshe sngon byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyed kyis shes
74a5(rgyud): par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di nyid do// de'i phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis brgya
74a6(rgyud): pabar mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i bar gyur to// ma gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsika nyid yin no// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni
74a7(rgyud): gzhan yin par mi blta'i/ lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa rgya'i bu rnams la rab tu mgu zhing rangs te/ ba spu'i bu gnas sku rnams langs te
74a8(rgyud): rgyas brgyas bzhes na can pa thos nas patsam ldan 'das phyag na darjel yang 'chub 'di sa mngon par ba snyed dag tshal pa btab po// koT k+Shaka ru ma ma gas/ ko rje la sa / 
74b1(rgyud): kayak+Sha/ kol bko ma kol bcu/ kol stab e ti zhes byas nas/ brgya sbyin la sogs l+h+wam chog nams// sems can kun la phan pa dang // tsha dang nad med spel ba'i phyir// mgan pa khyod lags pa
74b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang / skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / cho bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ gsang dpa' bdag po bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
74b3(rgyud): byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te/ tshangs pa pa sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang nga
74b4(rgyud): yang dag par bskyed pa de ni legs so legs so// legs par bsgrubs shing dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan padas phyag na rdo rjes sems can tham ba cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab par 'byung
74b5(rgyud): 'ordo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'pheb pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dir ngagi
74b6(rgyud): thugs sa slong //  tha ba sa ma / oM byA yai thA ba chenan pa shA ka swA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams bye nga gA 'di bgangam pag tu songs
74b7(rgyud): darab tu ni ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyi yang dag par shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab
74b8(rgyud): ra bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de na
75a1(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'odu byeng nga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnams par zhugs nas dbanan gshegs pa thangs rgya ba ga tu yod pa na
75a2(rgyud): ga rgyam de la / sa /  / mamo maH@ kA b+h+yaH/ de di
75a3(rgyud): de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu ni'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdin mi ba par sleb pa rnam par 'joms pazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'angan la stobs par zhugs nas
75a4(rgyud): na gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgri'i pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs kanas byung ngo // a~M ka~M ka ne/ ka~M ka ni/ ron ni ro tsa ni/ pro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni tA swa ni/ pra te ha na pra tI
75a5(rgyud): sarba kArba pa ri pa rA Ni me sarbas tA rAnaN swA hA/ 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa
75a6(rgyud): shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi la skom yar zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM rad na da
75a7(rgyud): mahAr dane/ ra nas b+ha be/ rang dkar ne/ ra dam le/ wi shud te/ shong+ka pa/ sarba pA 'i hU~M d+haT/ de nas 'di bshad mthag tu bdud kyi gnas 'ams cad btsag rnam par bcom par gyur
75a8(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jams pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad//

75b2(rgyud): cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so// bskyod/ rab tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do// bsul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nam slad kyi ya mtshan du ma ring

75b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste// rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la// lta ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// de yi dbus bu gtso ba ne la phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po// phyag dardo rje dril bsnams shing // zlang
75b5(rgyud): rgyas pa'i zhal 'dzub bri// shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni// mgon po mi bskyod byi bar bya// lho mi phyogs su rin cher bri/  nub phyogs tu skyes pa dar la// byang phyogs su'i gdon mi ra// dpa' bo stobs
75b6(rgyud): chen bri bar bya// de bzhin gshag pa pa thams cad de// 'khor los sgyur ba chas pa dang // zla ba'i dkyil la khor mdog 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang // phyag ni mchog sbyid me 'jigs pa
