75b8(rgyud): gas// sngags kyi lharna mas spyan drangs su/ dzad+hahUM ba~M hoH/ e b+ha ga par a h+ye he ma ya ste/ de dpag ca ba byon pa dag/ mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang // mche 'dag sngal gyi sa 'jigs ldan
76a1(rgyud): d+yA/ oM rba d+hi hU~M/ dAnas man da mchog sbyin par bya ste/ oM badz+ras pa / de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dkrol bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra d+ha pa/ sung g+haT ya/ drin sa 'di bstan par
76a2(rgyud): mi badz+ra ba ny+yato// de na sa 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM 'dra sa b+hi/ h+ye hUM/ maM br-id t+ta sa b+hi ma/ oMr ta na aSh+NI/ ny+tsa tAM/ oM pad ma a g+ni ny+tsahrIH/ a~M ka ma a b+hi lhas// de nas bum
76a3(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ka la sha ma b+hiShiny+tsatrAM/ oM thad d+ha ka la shA oM b+hiShiny+tsa a~M/ ir ta na kA la na maSh+NIShiny+tsatrAM/ oM pad ma ka lA sha ma b+h+yoShiHhrIHoM kAm ka 'dug ma b+hiShiny+tsa aH/ der
76a4(rgyud): nga ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM ra ta na mA la a b+hi/  hU~M trA~M Sh+T+rIn+nat+ma/ oM badz+ra paT a pA la~M ban a b+hi Shi Sh+yatAM/ maM bud d+he mA d+ha a b+hiShiny+tsA ma~M/ oM badra mu d+hi a b+hIShiny+tsa trAM/ oM ra tan mu drA ad+hI/ 
76a5(rgyud): de'adam bu nA A b+hiShiny+tsahrIH/ a~M karba sa hA a d+hi ma/ oM badzin ma A d+hi She b+h+rUM ma~M hrIHaH/ oM badra kApa? ar+d+heShiHdz+dza aH/ oM badz+rAnaH A b+hiShits+tshahU~M thAM/ oM badz+rAn+da la a d+hi
76a6(rgyud): i oM oM/ swAhrI/ d+h+we ne hrIH/ maHa / oM bang+ga d+hA Na ma b+he/ (/ it+ti TI ga tA d+hA ra Ni ma b+he/ ts+tsha ma/ oM din tA a b+hi 9// ma bo d-i ShI khyis d+hi hrI/ 
76a7(rgyud): rlom/ mabang su sa / yas na sa rgyas te// / ma po sa bu sas /  gams byas ma mas brams pa so/ 
76b1(rgyud): hUM AH/ de ltar dbang bsku nas tsha bsring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// ma hU~M badz+ra A puShe hU~M AH/ de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i cha zla ba'i 'od can zla bar dkyil
76b2(rgyud): bzhugs sheng rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud ci 'dzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/ gdong gyen du
76b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser gyi mar snod sa par bcug la
76b4(rgyud): g.yod pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shi bam man thog zag tu bzlam par bya'o// de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i dang ldang la rlangs pa 'am/ du ba 'am/ me byung ngam/ 
76b5(rgyud): rag le sgron nam/ 'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de 'am/ mar sar ram/ til mar ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'a/ 'o yaya/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa 'am/ sha
76b6(rgyud): 'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu bsgrubs te/ nang bar sngar bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam thos na ba chen ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma yod
76b7(rgyud): bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni med do// mtshon ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten rlud med/ sngob skyen/ lus la skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par
76b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lus brten ni co mo brgya nub par 'gyur te/ gnan yang bzlas 'byas pa tham gyis zhi bdang / rgyas bdang / dbangal sogs pa mas rnams brtag me dgos par 'gyur
77a1(rgyud): chom med do// denas rgyam bcan pa banas pamam ldan 'das phyag da nga rgyad ldan pa 'don sa da man la nan 'das bdag cag kyang thams can thams cang
77a2(rgyud): kyi don dang / phar pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams

77a4(rgyud): 'arlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM be/ de nas dri ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM dr-i/ de nas grul bupa kyi rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang rang gi stang pa
77a5(rgyud): 'di bshad do// oM ge de nas klu'i rgyal po mig me 'azing gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM// de nas de dag gi dkyil labar bshad dang/ gu ban pa la sgo ba ni pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa
77a6(rgyud): / de yi dbus su gtso zon// phyagan rdo 'bring bcas bri// de yi g.yon gyi phyogs su ni// rnam thos bu dge'i lag pa na// btson ne 'u le bogs pa dang // rin chen tan gyis brgyan pa dang // sbom ni
77a7(rgyud): dge'i gdan la zhugs// gser mdog ga'i can ldan par bri// mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs// rin chen chu ba 'bab pa bri// mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni// pi bang len pa brtson par
77a8(rgyud): badres zhing bdog sdub ste// rgyan rnams sun gyis 'atsun pakri/ gal 'phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags so// rami khril gan rdzogs pa //  phyogs kyini mem ma pa'ang // de rnga nags
77b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa mchog/ zlum mgo bdun gyis bskor bas// thog kyang dmar ning shin tu 'bar// sgo'i phyogs ni thams cad du// ska ba rnams kyang dbazhin no// de nas/ rdo rje 'i phyag rgya nas bya bas// sngags// 
77b2(rgyud): mkhan bdag nyed zhugs nab kyang // bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te// de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo // sran drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod chog bzhin du arga dbul// de nas sngags mkhan sngags/ 
77b3(rgyud): 'di dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis// slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // bram zi la sogs de bzhin te// me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog kam ren/ 
77b4(rgyud): po che 'dis dor bar bya'o// oM pratI rA tA ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni// de ni 'dis 'grub gzhan du med// de nas glan pazhag pa yi// bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te// dang po pra kan rdo rje yis// 
77b5(rgyud): phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya// de la sogs pa kau rims gyis// dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bsrur na// rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na che bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gleng dbang dpal ba
77b6(rgyud): 8// gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog/ lan bzhir dab ni bsrung ba dang // lan bzhir gzhug pa byas na ni// de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/ bu mug bzhin du 'byung bar bya// bdag cag rgyal po chen po
77b7(rgyud): zhes// bran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang // 'brang 'khor du 'acas pa yi// rgyal po rtag tu bsnang 'a brtsi// de gnod gzhan gyi thum dang // de yi nad dang 'che bdag gi// 'jigs dang pu ge la so

78a1(rgyud): 'joms// migs pa'ang gis bkra shis zhing // mug la sogs rnam par 'joms// mdon na bdag gis de yi ni// de dang bsam pa kun bgyi ste// ji stangs pa ma lags na// d+ha

78b1(rgyud): kyo bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi phrus kun gnam par brgya/

81a6(rgyud): na du 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo bkas par gyur cig/ rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang / babyab pa dang / sra ba bkyi/ byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtso

81b1(rgyud): dpal sgrub mgo bzhes bskor ba'i// rdo rje 'dzin gtso ba sams nas su// pud ces bya ba 'bum pazlas pa// de nas drug blangs phud ces ni// bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ba sams nas kyang //

81b4(rgyud): na po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs par byed pa chen po bud med chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ca
81b5(rgyud): skrag pa dang / bud med rnams kyi skrag pas lha dang klu la sogapa pa thams cad skrag/ rnam par skrag/ rab tu skrag ste/ kha brub du 'gyel nas gos dang bra la te/ bems kyang stor nas kun
81b6(rgyud): 'phyan pa de dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab du gsol/ 'jigs par byed pa chen po legs

81b8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// mkhyer ba ste swA hA/ oM b+hU nI h+lA mi b+hiswA hUM/ moSh+mA pUt+ma/ a thAswA hA/ oM ny+tsa swAhA/ man+tatrA~M/ oM \u0f7fswAd+ya/ oM b+h+yaHswAd+ha/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzin
82a1(rgyud): chen po ni brgyad bod de dag bdag ging gtan/ de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bcad// mkhar po chen po rtsibs brgyad pa// bris nas dbus su rdo rje 'dzin// ma chen 'jag rten
82a2(rgyud): las ni// rnam rgyal zhes bya gzhag par bya// de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed pa'o// drag po chen po khros pa ni// 'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// gzhan yang
82a3(rgyud): 'jigs byed brgyad pon// bud med rnams dang ldan pa la/  bros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par// ci bde bar ni bri bar bya// zha 'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du// sgo ba shin du khros sngar bri// de nas
82a4(rgyud): lcags kyu la sogs pas// bkug ste mgo mi thod pa'i// khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang // sha car gtomam par 'i dang / snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang // mgo thod mgos
82a5(rgyud): bu dang // khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brkyang // dkyil 'khor der ni gzhad par bya// de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i rna mchog gis slob ma gzhug par bya// bum pa'am mgo pi
82a6(rgyud): de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste// lung zad khyim 'am mtshan gcig par zhwazha 'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog/ tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas
82a7(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya// de nas 'jigs par byed pa yi// bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas// mi 'jigs par ni mgo bod par// khrag mchog bkang ste argya dbul// de na
82a8(rgyud): bo 'degs byed pa// ba rungs yid can bud med kyi// tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed gan brgyad kyim bskol ba ma songa'ang 'gyur// de mchong 'jigs pa med khyam sa/ hU~M nas bya ba
82b1(rgyud): byeng nga/ na dun gags// 'ad pa bya gang ba bul bar bya/ don pa 'jigs bya mju ma 'dzi'as/ nam kun sa rab tu grub 'gyur nas/ ci 'dod ces ni blam nas kyang /

82b5(rgyud): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bga' stsal na rang gi brtag pa bshad par 'tshal

82b7(rgyud): du/ oM i/ oM ke/ oM ga/ oM pr-i/ oM ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ nadakyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris pa /  dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba// de yi mdun du dpa'
82b8(rgyud): dbang phyug rtse gsum la gathogs bri// rgyab tu tsharas bze bya ste/ gagayon 'angal gan 'khor lo thogs la g.yas par dbang po rang gi ni// phyag rgya tshe mtshan ma la gathogs the// rang gi
83a1(rgyud): dkyim mtsha chur ma rnams// 'dir yang gro ba de bzhin to// ba dang bum pa gang ba bzhag/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du// stabs pa 'ang la sogs ma thu chen pazhag/ dngas
83a2(rgyud): zugs nas wa rnams ni// mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya// dzaHhU~M baM hoHwA thams cad // dkyil la bar dam par bzhugs par ma dang // de nas 'ongs par mthong ba ga/ dga'
83a3(rgyud): chen po sa mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgyas slob sa rnams gzhug ste// oM pa tI ts+tsha tI ma hA satwa badz+ra d+hA ba.A dz+nyA ya ha ha ha ho// me tog chog bzhin du dor// mig
83a4(rgyud): bstan par bya// de nas sngags kyis btab pa yi// bum pa'i chus ni dbang bskur ro// de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i// dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya// 'bum gcig gam ni 'bum

83a7(rgyud): gang yin pa// de ni ci bder sbyin bya yis// bzang pos myur du soms te smras// gang phyer mchog ni khyod la sbyar// de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir// lha la mchog ni gsol ba gang ba/

83b1(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bang

84a1(rgyud): dang / sa'i 'og dang / mang mos snang ba rnam pa stsal par bgyi'o// mdor na brgya byin nyid dang / ma pa nyid dang / gtogs 'dzi nyid dang / dbang phyu chen po nyi

84a4(rgyud): par rab tu dgod/ rtse rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing rmad kyil mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i rdzogs rnams

84b1(rgyud): dag ya bdag par rab tu mgus pa spu langs nas tshogasas nas bya ba 'di dag gamal to// bcom ldan 'das lags ma lags so// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs po legs so// gang gi slad du cho
84b2(rgyud): ba'i sems can rnams che bsring bar bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i chi bdag gis nyen pa rnams gang gi mdus ma lags par 'chi ba las rnam par thol bar bgyi ba dang / ngan mong du skyes pa

85b1(rgyud): thag tA aSh+NI ShiN+Da badz+ra d+ha bas+tha ya hUM hU~M/ oM badz+ra badz+ra aSh+NI ShAN+DarmA hU~M/ ma ta na ha na a b+hiShits+tsha hU~M/ oM bdam pad ma a b+hi Shiny+tsatrUM hrIH/ aHrma ka ma a b+hi hU~M sh+tsa/ de nas

86a1(rgyud): bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dag/ dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang // sngags rig pas ni bsgrub pa'i phyir// gzhan

87b1(rgyud): khung tham par ma mchog/ khru gang khru do khru bzhi pa'i// zlum po nyid du byas nas ni// de yi ming yang yungs kar gyis// brgya phrag stong du bsregs byas na// ngan song kun las rnam par thar// de yi sha

87b7(rgyud): a yungs kar bsres pa dang // de yi rus pa shal sogs// la ngan ming nas smos te bya// de ni bde 'gror skyes nas kyang / ga mkhas pas rgyas pa bye dgos te// khru do pa'am khru bzhi pa// de
88a1(rgyud): mchog ni khru brgyad par// byas nas hom khung gru bzhi pa// kun du mu ngan ldan par bya// de dbus pad ma rin man can// 'don ser po ldan par bri// 'khor yug tun
88a2(rgyud): dang // bu ran rnams la chu skyes bri// phyi rol du ni rigs lnga yis// so so phyag rgya bri bar bya// de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang // lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya// go pa rnams ser por bsku
88a3(rgyud): kyang // mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing // de la phan phyir rgyal ba'i phyir// rgyas pa yi ni pas byas na// lus can de yi tshe dang dpal// ga'i brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phel// de nas pa na
88a4(rgyud): rayang // dbang du bya ba'i las byas na// hom khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la// khru gang ba 'am khru pa// khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus su// pad ma dmar po bris nas kyang // de yi dbus sumadal
88a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i// gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya// khor lug tu yang mda' bcas pa'i// gzhu ni kha dog dmar por bri// sngags rdzogs pas ni tag par yangs phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya// sem
88a6(rgyud): de yang dran byas te// dmar por gyur pa'i gos gyon la// me tog dpar ram pad ma'am// 'bras bung mar ramatshon bsdus pa'i// mar dang gur kus bsres pa dang // tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma
88a7(rgyud): yis// sbyin sreg byas na lta la sogs// thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// del gdon rnams gnom pa'i phyir// mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam ba ste// phred dang gsum 'am khru gsum 'am// 
88a8(rgyud): sbyar dam pa khru dgur bya// gru gsum pa dang ldan pa rini// dbus su rdo rje rtsa dgu pa/ brtse gsum pa dang rtsa gram pa'i// rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang / namagon rdo rje rtse gsum dang // 
88b1(rgyud): gcig ma khyud bskor// phyi ral du yang ram gsum du// snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya// bya dang gtor bum pa dang // bshos cha rnam pa mang du bzhag/ sha dang khrag gas bkang ba pa// 
88b2(rgyud): bod ba kun du gzhag/ de la lus can sdig sogs dang // bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// gos nag bkro shing khros nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bskur// de
88b3(rgyud): de yi sdig btsum lus// bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar// mtho ris 'jig rten mi yin do// khams gsum pa ra ci bder spyod// go rim 'di dag nyid kyis ni// tshe 'di'i gnas la 'ang
88b4(rgyud): denas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur// gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun// snga ma ji bzhin de ltar bya// des ni sems can thams cad la'ang // myur du bde srid rgyo
88b5(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lharnams yings sun la bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan khong du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don
88b6(rgyud): phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dre ba dang / 'dir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi chu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du long
88b7(rgyud): brkyang bar bgyi// gang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/ yul dang phyogs dang / rang gi skye
88b8(rgyud): yongs kyi skye bo dang / bran la sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyi// nor dang 'bru rnayas mang du 'byor bar bgyi/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 
89a1(rgyud): dang / rgyas pa dang / ma mag pa pa dang / zhi ba rnams su bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par gyi ba/ klod kyang kye 'tshal gang gis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di da
89a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ grong dang grong khyer du bcug pa la/ bdag nyid kyis bsu ba dang / glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor
89a3(rgyud): nad dang / gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam/ bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// gang du 'di rab tu spyod pade
89a4(rgyud): dA bcom ldan 'da' phyag do nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i sku zhugs par mtshal bar brtse ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang por ba thams cad yongs su sgo
89a5(rgyud): da brtag pa'i rgyal po gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par
89a6(rgyud): bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bkye/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bkyi'o// bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad pa'i rdong slob
89a7(rgyud): dka' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o// bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o// phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o
89a8(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyang byal bar bgyis// bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i gang pa ni rdul mgo bas blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar 'gyi lo/ bcom ldan 'das mchod par
89b1(rgyud): bdag chag de'i phyi bzhin du rdzas su 'brang ngo // bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba ga lags pa de dag kyang bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// phyag na dzo
89b2(rgyud): papar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bde ba chen po kun du bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// 
89b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams chos la rim gro bya bar de ltar dam tshig bcas par gyur pa gang yin
89b4(rgyud): legs so legs so// legs par sgrubs shig// bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang / rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyiranyi
89b5(rgyud): po 'di bshad do// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i hUM badra bAM Ni dr-iT+Ta tiHd+hU a~M dz+haiM maM/ aM badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM dr-i D+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hU~M sa/ oM badz+ra h+ne a/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor sngam
89b6(rgyud): // dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// kun tu bzang ngam bde ba che// spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje la// g.yas su phyag ni rin chen bsnams// phyag na pad ma nub phyogs bri// byang
89b7(rgyud): / phyag na rgya gram bsnams// phyi rol du ni kun bsko/ cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya// de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams// go rim bzhin du bre bar bya// de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnam
89b8(rgyud): byamal ba la sogs mchog chen bri// de ltar dge slong kun dga' bogs// bubya rnam ladi mi phyi tshom brig rang ni chung ma bum bskor pa // tshangs pa la sogs phyo ma bri// gza' dang skar man
90a1(rgyud): / rgyal po bzhi po rnams drang ni// phyogs stong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// de'i phyi rol dmyal kun dang // 'dod chags la sogs byol song 'dra// sgo skar gsungs pa bzhin du/ 
90a2(rgyud): stobs kyi dab pa rnams// dri rnams lnga yi chus bkang ba// gser gyi bum pa 'od can dang // gtor ma dang ni lta ba shas dang // me tog bdug pa rab mdzes dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'bar na
90a3(rgyud): dang // bla re dang ni rnga mchog dang // dril bu rdo rje nor bu dang // ngo sha la nyi zla la sogs brgyan// 'dod can rnams kyi 'bras bu ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lus dgang ngo // de nas sngags mkhan nyid kyis ni/ 
90a4(rgyud): bdag nyid 'jug par bya// bdag nyid kyis ni dbang yang bsrug// sdom gnas dmatshig ldan pa dang // bla ma mos shing mi 'jigs la// rig skyes sbyin dang bral ba dang // ser snam lus spangs kyu ser/ 
90a5(rgyud): yang po badz+ran myur ba/ gtod da tshul khrims mang du thos// byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems// dga' dang btung snyoms gnas pa dang // stong pa mtshan pa med pa'i sems// smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i/ 
90a6(rgyud): spob pa yang sngags 'di yis// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la// sngags gakhan gyis ni gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra hU~M dzaH/ oM badz+ra sa mA la pra be shatrUM/ oM badz+ra pA Ni pra tInA badz+ras thA ga tA mu katrUM/ haha hos ma
90a7(rgyud): / me tog gi phreng ba dor nas gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo bol bcing bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig smin par bya ste/ 
90a8(rgyud): shing mdu bang bas kyad kyi mgo bags par gyur to// oM badz+ras mam khyen kyis/ de nas 'dis dam tshig ga su zung sa gdang gsags dgral bar bya'o// 'i bajas ba kaha~M/ A d+ham
90b1(rgyud): shwa mr-ik+Sha yA mAn d+hu phaT/ da phyagar dang la sags pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan to/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang dbang bsrung bar bya'o/ oM byAd+haT+TAN sa shAn tu
90b2(rgyud): raka to a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM badra badz+ra oM b+hi shiny+tsa sarba badz+ra a b+hi She ka ta d+haM A/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi shiny+tsa sarba bud d+ha a b+hi She ka ta mo hAM/ oM ra ta na a b+hi shiny+tsa sarba rad na a b+hiShe ka ta oM tAM/ oM pad ma aH
90b3(rgyud): rgyal rba pad+ma a b+hU Sha ka ta oM hrIH/ oM ka rba a pri shiny+tsa sarba ka rba ma b+hi Sha ka ta oM mA/ de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' mnod par bya'o// oM sarba tathA ga te yA dz+nyA a b+hi/ She)
90b4(rgyud): oM kan te dA su mi gr-i h+Na badz+ra pra sid d+ha le hUM/ de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang smin no// bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni// 
90b5(rgyud): rang ngam bdeper// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang // snying gar hUM zhes bya bsams na// rdo rnga sems dpa' mtsham par 'gyur// dpal ldan las rnams kun byed ce // kun du babang por 'dag/ 
90b6(rgyud): ted 'gyur// de ltar 'gyur ba tha tshom med// hU~M las sangs rgyas gzuga'agyur na// phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// snying gar 'khar lo ba bsgoms na// phyug na rdorje 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro 'or
90b7(rgyud): sgoms te// snying ga'i dbus su pan ces pa// hU~M zhes bya bas bskor bsams na// khri ba stobs chen nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje brtan par bdag bslar la// steng gir oM zhes bya ba yis// bskor ba'i hUM
90b8(rgyud): ldan pa'i// bsams na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rjer bsgoms la steng ge ni// dbus su pad mo zhes bya ba// a zhes bya bas bskor bsams na// phyag na pad ma mnyam par 'gyur// 'khor lo
91a1(rgyud): gram hUM ldan par// a zhes bya bas bskyed nas kyang // oM nas bya bas bskor bsams na// rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur// de nas las rnams bshad bya te// zhi ba dang na rdzas pa
91a2(rgyud): las// de ltar dbang dor mngon spyod rnams// bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis// las rnams thams cad bya ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag bsgyur la// zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya'ing // cho ga shes pas
91a3(rgyud): nang par nyid// bzlas dang sbyin srog nyid byed cing // 'od zor sprin gyis de lus la// 'phro bar gyur par rnam bsgoms te// rtag tu shar bltas 'od zer gyis// nyes pa thams cad sel byed pa// 'di
91a4(rgyud): sems can pan dga' ngas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya// kun du bzang po'i sku chen nam// bde ba chen por bsams nas kyang // nang par re re 'od byed na// snga ma bzhin du las byas te/ 
91a5(rgyud): nang par sngar ni sems can rnams// sdig can sems ni zhi bar 'gyur// gser 'od mdzes shing 'bar ba yi// na rin chen 'dzin du bsams nas ni// b.ra'ab legs byas nyi ma yi// gung la rgyas
91a6(rgyud): las shes te// rin chen 'dra bar khung brkos la// bzlas dang sbyin sreg rab tu bya// yang na sngags pas snga ma bzhin// 'od kyis lus la rab tu dag pan sbyor dang ldan pas khung bu ni// pad
91a7(rgyud): bar byas nas kyang // pad ma 'dzin par bdag bsgyur la// dgo dang nye ba'i nyi ma'i mthar// bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing // 'od zer sprin gyi lus bkang nas// thams cad ma lus dbang du
91a8(rgyud): pa kun du babang po yis// de pa las de sngog// rdo rjen chen rgyas paste// dbang bskur ba yang da bzhen // dpal byinas bya bar bzhin du yongs kyong dbang blag dbas mnyam mopa
91b1(rgyud): ba ga brjod dag/ bdog ldanan tu ra ba bya// khan cung zad du sa dad pasar// dga' mdungs rnams su 'gyur// pad ma gnad pasams kun no// rtogs mdzad sangs rgyas tha
91b2(rgyud): tsid kyang // mnyes 'gyung lta bran smos ci dgos// gzhan gyi rigs sogs tshigs mchog rnams// rnon pos gcod pa nyid du mdzad// gdon dang yi dag pa 'drenams dang // gdon sbyin srin po bka/ 
91b3(rgyud): tan dang // gza' mchog brgyad ni ma rung sa rnams// 'khor los rtsa nas 'byin par mdzad// lkugs dang grags pa ma pir dang // glen rnams mi smra sba bar mdzad// lce la dzam zhes bya ba yis// ma rungs
91b4(rgyud): rnams kyang lkugs par mdzad// rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang // sems can don mdzad thams cad ston/ 
91b5(rgyud): rje gdod sbyin nyid kyib kyang // marungs rab tu ma rungs kun// kha byed sdig spyod smos ci dgos// dam rungs snying kar dam du ni// ( zhes bya ba bsams nas kyang // dug dang rims dang gdon la sogs// 
91b6(rgyud): rje bsdams pas bcing bar mdzad// bzlas dang sbyin sreg las rnams kyis// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par ma dang // 'od zer bsil bas dngos po la// rgyas par gyur pas sgo ba byed cing // ni// 
91b7(rgyud): ba'i lha me rnal 'byor dang // zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi bar bya// rang gi lus ni gser bcos dang // nyi ma gas pa shar dge 'dra b.razhabasams la rgyas par bya ba'i phyir// 'od zer srin gyis dgang bar bya// 
91b8(rgyud): pad po sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// hrIH'dra 'od zer btang ba yis// snyeng la kun du skor byed cing // 'dod bkun gyi dbang du byed/ dza rdza drA ke ting 'dzin gyis// khros na rdo rje mchod nga 'icharo// sdig spyod lus
92a1(rgyud): / dbab byas na// dmathab tu brlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes sems can thams cad pa/ 
92a2(rgyud): phan pa'i phying tshom thams cad gcod pa ngan song thams cad bzlog pa'i brtag pa dam pa 'di bshad pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do// bka
92a3(rgyud): gnyis mdun du bzhag la// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsams te// hUM zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes bya bas r+b+ba pa'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ lag pa/ 
92a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi thal mo gnyis ka la a la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug gis bkang ning 'phro bar byas te/ mthe bo gnyis la tshe nas bya ba bsam/ 'dzub mo gnyis la hUM zhes bya ba gzhag/ gung po gnyis la
92a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba gzhag/ srin lag gnyis la hrIHzhes bya ba bzhag/ mthe'u chung gnyis la a nes bya ba gzhag/ de ltar yi ga rnams gzhag pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par chos
92a6(rgyud): bskyed de// chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang / bdag dang yang rjes su 'thun par dran par byas te/ lag pa gnyis pad ma lta bur sbyar ba byas nas oM zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang ba dang / a
92a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/ de bzhin du hU~M zhes bya ba dang /  zhes bya ba gnyis pa dpa'i 'ad ba ra 'dra bar bya/ smyezhes bya ba gnyis gzhibs te brkyang ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi smra ba'i phyag tu
92a8(rgyud): rnas sa dang ldan pa'i dmachog go// de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang / de la sa rab tul bar po 'dra rnam par mcheg// de nyid lag khar bzhag pa ni m+bi'i rtse// 'di phyag gyi tshogs med nyid / 
92b1(rgyud): gnyis su byas nas las kyi byas na las kyi'o// g.yon pa mgo bod thogs 'dra dang // g.yas pa mdung thung rtsa gsum dang // g.yon pa pad mo kha 'dzums dang // g.yas pa oM nas bya bar bzhag/ ga
92b2(rgyud): 'khor la ba gsum dang // a dang mi gnyis kyi skad la// lhag ma gsum ni dza dza can// mau dang hUM gnyis gzhung byas la// lhag ma mdar byas mad tshan gyi'o// lag pa g.yas g.yo nal khor yor ba/ 
92b3(rgyud): / nyim zla ba'i zhal// thal mo dam sbyar sor mo 'phro// gza' lhag rtag tu se gol gtogs// de nyid tshig dbang gsungs pa ste// mchul tshig 'byung 'dra bar gnag/ pa ba sangs ni bde ldan pa// 
92b4(rgyud): dbyug pa 'dzin par bya// ban glang sna ni chu srin 'dra// shes bya rgyu skar me stag 'dra// de nyid bskor na klo rA phreng gi bla 'og gzhag na sprin phyag rgya// 'di dag ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste// las kyi phywa
92b5(rgyud): yang 'di dag nyid do// de nyid las srin lag gnyis bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba tshigs par ma bcag pa ni dbang bskulab sbyin par byed pa ste/ nam mkha'i sku
92b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba bcings te// srin lag pad ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni 'das las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las hU~M zhes bya ba dang // hUM zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te bsgreng
92b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las pad mo 'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las rod zer 'gro ba'i tshul du byas pa'i kun du bzang po'i phyag tu'o// 
92b8(rgyud): bkug pa ni khro tsa sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya gzi can no// de nyid las shin du bsdams pani rdo rje bsdams pa'o// brkyang pa ni ga'i can no// hU~M zhes bya ba'i mo ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis lnga
93a1(rgyud): kur byas pa ni 'khrugs 'o// nyid mang dbyas pa'i 'dod pa'o//  dang mogs bya ba gnyis sbyar ba da dgyes pa'i'o// de nyid kyi mamor lta bur byas pa ni ga bya kyang//  na
93a2(rgyud): bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o// bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/ de nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad pa'i ya mtshan do// thal mo pang po 'dra bar bkug pa ni pad ma'i'o// A zhes bya ba dang
93a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor po'i'o// snga ma las a~M zhes bya ba gnyis khar ba 'ag pa ni tshig 'byung ba ste/ mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni las thams
93a4(rgyud): cad sbyin par byed pa'o// de nyid bsus mdud stsal mgor 'gyur// ku du gnod sbyin mche ba 'dra// srin po yi ni khrag 'phrog pa// lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste// dbyu gtor ldan pa gnod sbyin no// bum
93a5(rgyud): bzhag pa nor gyi ste// mthe zo sre mo'i sna 'drar bya// mgo yi thod pa nag po'i ste// 'bring gi ri ti lag brgyad pa// pi bdagayon pod 'dri za'i'o// lag gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba// gung mo dbyug 'drag
93a6(rgyud): / 'o// rdol khre dang dbang sgyur ba// mthe'u chung ral gri mdzub zhags pa// rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin// de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams// lag las skye ba skyes par 'gyur// lha rnams sun
93a7(rgyud): bod du// pad me'i phyag rgya bkri shis te// klu rnam pa shes bya u tra pa la// de ltar son gad sbyin rnams// ri po rnams kyi mdo rtsal pa// bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsngal// gapa rnams can
93a8(rgyud): dbyug pa ste// an+ta dbul ba rgyu skar rnam na de dag kun gyi sems grub pa'o// mgo bzang pa khar bzhag pa 'i/ sa phyag rgya 'di ni 'bra man pa'i/ dmago thod lce yi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'i
93b1(rgyud): // de dag na nga rudu y-i / ga chen po pa shad par bya// la rgya ba da //  pa mam pa dpor // da y-i// mnyes byung bab rjud// na
93b2(rgyud): gnyis bsgre la// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang // hUM dang a gnyis gshibs te basbeng// ma nas byi ba ngos paca 'i// phyag rgya snang ba byed par dgongs// de la
93b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba bcings// oM zhes bya ba nang du gzug/ me zhes bye ba sngon bzhin slar// mi yang ma dang 'dra bar bya// trAM zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni// A dang oM gnyis lu bu N+yed// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la
93b4(rgyud): lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di// 'dud rtsi 'khyil bar shes par bya// hUM zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni// hUM zhes bya nga'ang de bzhin no// de skar dz+dzi nas bya ba gshibs// lte ba mi 'od zer 'dra bar bya// 
93b5(rgyud): mgrin phyag rgya gang yin pa// de yang las rnamapa kun la gsungs// sman gyi mig dang 'dra bar bshad// sA la kI mi rdo rje 'dra// dkar mo pad ma nyid du bshad// Ata ba la ni slob mar dgongs// srasasas

93b7(rgyud): / 5/ oM dzad d+hA d+d+ha/ oM badz+ra d+ha \u0f7f ny+dziH/ oM badz+ra ba rtswa da nyi da ga 'ad basbyin ko/ Na ma ba n+d+ha/ oM Sh+T+r-iT+TarmA rmAHdz+dza T+TaH/ zhi ba'i bdung ga/ gas ts+tsha/ 
93b8(rgyud): sham ba ta/ shis pa ta/ sham pa ta/ sha ma ba ta/ sham pa ta/ sham pa ta/ sham pa ta/ shar ba ta/ sham pata/ sham pa te/ sham pa te/ sha ba~M ba ta/ shim pa te/ sham pa ta/ sham te/ rgyal ba'i
94a1(rgyud): )/ kyAkr-Im+mA\u0f88\u0f90/ ts+tshisl-iT+Tar+m+ma m+bu zlu/ m+b+hats+tsha/  smra/ 
94a2(rgyud): nis lha rnams kun dag 'a nas// piMg na rdorje phyag 'tshal te// khro ba 'khor me bshad pa'i phyir// gsol ba 'debs pa nyid du gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das bye na rdo rjes rang ni ba te/ dza

95a1(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de// bdag nyid khro bar rnams zhugs la// de na snying ga nyis partsol// rang ni chos kyi yin pas// ma~M banas yang dang yang tsun/

99a5(rgyud): spre rin chen mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mchog/ rdo rje la shes ye shes te/ rig pa'i bye ba'i tshigs kyi sgong// ha la ha la nag po che// sgra ci zhing ni 'joms pacan// rdorje
99a6(rgyud): dum ngan nam skyong ba// skad cig g.yob 'tsham gcod// glog bzhin gal gyi ljags las 'gro// rdo rje me stem rung ba 'dul// drag bor ba snang snang mdzad pa// nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal/ 
99a7(rgyud): jigs par mdzad pa po// khro bo dum 'od bzhin 'phro// phyag rnams du ma mtshon cha bar+tha// du ma'i zhal la sru lang stod// 'khyil cing rgyan lang 'khyil pa la// sems kyi chos pas sku'i mnga'/ 
99a8(rgyud): gapa ma lu ba spangs// ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang dri ma mar mdzad// sbrum gtogs 'dud rnga can// rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog pa// 'dod chags zhe sa
99b1(rgyud): (// l+r-ing nga drang can rnam byung ba/ na nang dul la dga' bste// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rabartags pa// sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas su// rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems// kun du bzang po
99b2(rgyud): bzang ba// mtshan nams dam pas rnam par brgyan// khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po// thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtso// gang gis 'di bris bklags gyur tam// rtag tu don 'chang byed dam// dran nam nyan par
99b3(rgyud): byed kyang rung // phyag na rdo rje 'dre bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis skad ces bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lnga dang / si dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
99b4(rgyud): la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong bas
99b5(rgyud): brjid kyi rgyal ba'i rtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn ting gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba brje dza ya rak+She tas bsgyur cing zhus/ AHr+yarin chen mchog gis skad gsapa
99b6(rgyud): kyil bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ dge'o// nus dag/ dur khrod dag dang shan pa yi// khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su// mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba// thab khung tha ma par ma mchog
99b7(rgyud): gsum 'am khru gsum thar// khru dgu pa ni byas pa las// stegs bu de 'i tshad brtsigs te// gru gsum pa'am mdung rtse 'dra// lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni// bsdus pas rbag khung
99b8(rgyud): bor bya// dbus su rdo rje rtse dkru ba// nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri// bu nga na steng du rtse gsum dang // mya gram pa yi rdo rdzas mtshan// de 'i phyi rol su spya la// dbyug pa dang ning grwa nga// rAm ng+ge hrI
100a1(rgyud): bzo// dge phyi ro la keng dus te// 'ad gshegs la sogs phyag chas mtshan// dung smin ma dag 'dra drang srong mtshig/ ma ma snying bzhugs rtsa gsum dang // gzar bu grang bar
100a2(rgyud): ldan// de lha'i me lha spyan drangs nas// lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis sreg/ shin tu gdug me cher mar bcas// sreg shing lam shing byas nas kyang // sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang // pu phye
100a3(rgyud): da dag// nas ldan pa she // rnamapapa na thangs la rgya/ del yongs su bdang/ na dngal nga ldan napaya /

100a5(rgyud): tas bsgyur b.lo// / swa bar hi ta b+ha bA k+sha// pus dgra// rgya gar skad du/ sarba dun te ba'i gdon tre dra rA dza pe ta thA ga tA s+ya a ha te sa myak+ka sa bud d+ha mya gal ba e ka de sha nA ma/ bod ska dadu/ 
100a6(rgyud): bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal shA
100a7(rgyud): seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad kyi mchog dga' ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ nor bu dang gser gyi shing lo ma dang / yal ga
100a8(rgyud): dang / lcag mar bcas pa'i spong po dang / shing gel pa dang // sman dang / me tog gas la dang / me tog uta pa la dang / ma tog kar/ kA dang / me tog bkul dang / me tog nyi la ka dang / ma
100b1(rgyud): ma sho ka dang // ma tog man dU ra ba dang / me tog man dAr ba chen po la sogs pa me tog rnam pa sna chags pas nye bar ma dzes pa/ dpag bsam gyi zhing rnams kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs
100b2(rgyud): gyis rnam par smras pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs skad snyan pa 'byin pa/ dza dang / rnga mu kun ha dang / gling bu dang / dza b+hi ri la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha yi

100b4(rgyud): bu po 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya stong rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam sal blding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor rnam pa

100b6(rgyud): g.yo ba dang / bro gros yang ra ba dang / kun tu blo gros dang / blo gros mtha' yas pa dang / kun nas legs pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros kam la dang / bla gros chen po dang / blo gros lha rdzas dang / bro gros sna tshogs
100b7(rgyud): dag tho gams lum pa dang / kun tu babang ba ste/ de dgal pogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mama'al ba shing bu med pa nas sa rjes/ hrI sang ga ste/ blam
100b8(rgyud): byas/ mchod cing dzada' dbyas/ shin du phul du byung bar byas te/ 'khor gyi tshogs chen po'i dbus su mangs pa chen po pa pa'i gdan 'a bzhugs shing can song thams cad songs su so
101a1(rgyud): mas par zhugs pa// des thag nyed du ngan song gsum gyi rgyud rnam par grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba bya chu mdapatshan tsha med ra 'phro ba dang sdud ba dum phreng ba rang gi mdzad
101a2(rgyud): sun sa phyung ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du snang bar byas so// kun du snang bar byas pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las dkrol te/ yang dag/ 
101a3(rgyud): bso so so sor thob par byas shing dga' ba'i tshal yang kun du snang bar byas te/ mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te mgo bos phyag btsal
101a4(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas e ma ho sangs rgyas chos// e ma ho sangs rgyas mdzad pa shin du legs// gang phyir

101a7(rgyud): 'o// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di na ngo mtshar me che ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams
101a8(rgyud): legs par bsags pa'o// lha yi dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur ba'o// lha yi dbang po yang dag par rdzog pa'i mangs
101b1(rgyud): dmed pa'i phabs yongs su rdzogs pa'o// lha 'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na shes rab dpag tu med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa chad med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pa
101b2(rgyud): / sa gdul bya'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni me
101b3(rgyud): / dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// lha yi dbang po de'i phying sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 
101b4(rgyud): mas kyis snod ji lta ba de ltar sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / gdul bya ji lta ba de ltar sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa yin no zhes shes par bya ba 'di

101b6(rgyud): mchod pa rgya che zhing le ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir dag / snying rje dang bcas par bya ba'i phyir da/

102a1(rgyud): 'am sdug bsngal gang myong bar 'gyur 'dabacom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol// bdabar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha yi dbang po de 'i dus

102b1(rgyud): thabs gang ni yun gyi sa ma grol bar thung ba de'i yangs su skyebs mdzang/ bad bar gshenas pa yongs su skyobs mdzod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/  yi nga tha

102b7(rgyud): lal las rnam par grol zhing mtho ris lha yi 'jig rten nam/ mi yi 'jig rnyed du chu ranas kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chand du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kye
102b8(rgyud): byen dang tshang sa la sogs pa lha le bu namam de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyis brlab pa'i don du don yod rdo rje'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs 'o/ 
103a1(rgyud): badz+ra ma d+hi Than rten pa ma hU~M/ delta ting pa skyem sa par zhugs nas ral gyi no/ mardo rje byin kyis 'ablam yin gyis brlabs nas// ngan song thams cad yongs su spyong
103a2(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM shod+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM'i 'o d+ha ne shud d+he sa rba ka rma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ rig pa 'di gsungs mthag nyid du sems can thams cad

103b7(rgyud): kyai 'aM/ mang na dang blan pa thams cad nges par 'jobs pa'i blogs kyi'o// mi gan d+ha rten te/ spos kyi grang b.ra'o// oM byar gas te/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i'o// mig gnagagan mni rte nams
103b8(rgyud): dbye'o// 'dzin cu tan te rlon lenas tog go'o// mo sa me ta tha ste sa me ta ba ta hA/ 'od dpag med kyi// me can du po can dra byu ba lag te hUM swA hA/ zla'ad kyi'o// ma ga drab te byad pa las
104a1(rgyud): c-ing sh-in// ma d+hA lem hASh+Ta shai r+m+ma/ dra can gyid kyi'o// ma bajug rte/  mchog/ oM ak+Sha pa rbas/ sa kyi la gams par/ khe go d+han swAH/ rba brab yin dpa / 
104a2(rgyud): ne ti thAn pA rba swA hA/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'i'o// yos man tra bad+yA hUM/ kun du bzang po'i'o// bzhal la b.rang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sngags 'di dag ri ra ba bzhin du
104a3(rgyud): brjod do// 'di dag gis rgyud du ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i cho ga'i rim pas nyin re zhing snga ba'i dus su bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom bzhin pas lha yi rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin gsum mchog 'bad pas
104a4(rgyud): bsgoms te/ ngan song yongs su sbyong bar grub par 'gyur ro// lha yi dbang po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i gze brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi
104a5(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ gang 'ga' zhig ming tsam nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa 'am/ bris nas kyang mgo 'am/ gtsug pud dam/ dpung pa 'am/ mgul bar btags te 'chang bar byed na de 'i
104a6(rgyud): nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang / 'chi ba dang 'brel ba'i rmi lam 'byung ba 'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi la ma tsam du yang mi 'byung ngo // gang 'ga' zhig dkyil 'khor du
104a7(rgyud): lte ba yin du zhugs nas dbang bskur ha snying po yang bros shing sngags kyi don sgom par byed na lha smos kyang ci dgos te/  dag la sdig pa gang cung zad kyang nye bar mi 'gyur ltung ngan song du 'gro bar me 'gyur ro// 
104a8(rgyud): kyi pa dang / brad med dang / lha dang / kri drag/ gnod sbyi dag/ phrin po dang / khyim song dang / ye dwag pa dang / dmyal pa la sags pa gang yang rung bzhi pa'i lus rnam pad dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bsku
104b1(rgyud): dang myal bar skyes na yang de ma thag nyid du rnam par thar nas lha ye rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// lha yi rigs der skyes bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed cing phyir mi ldog
104b2(rgyud): papar yang 'gyur ro// rgyud nges pa can du yang 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ 
104b3(rgyud): yi rigs sam/ gzhan du yang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// lha yi dbang po mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha yi dbang pos bcom ldan
104b4(rgyud): 'dapal snga ma bzhin du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can rnams ngan
104b5(rgyud): yoyong thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / blan pa mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
104b6(rgyud): pas ngan sor thams cad yongs su sbyongar ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bsnyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po
104b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs te/ de mgon po shAkya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs pa ni/ dang po re shig rnal 'byor pas skye bos dben pa'i yid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i sa phyogs su/ 'das zhing shin du

105b1(rgyud): dang ldan pas byu gegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa tshang ma la man ci gnyis brkyang stemanyam sa bzung ban rdo rje sun gyi phyag ma'o// rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang bsas bzhag sna 'og
105b2(rgyud): bya'o// oM badz+ra dri D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sa tsaM swA hA zhes bya'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed sran gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas skyed bcing bar bya ste/ oM hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT ces pa dang / rdo rje khu tshar gnyis bcings la mas
105b3(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo ltar bskor nas mgo bo'i steng du bzung ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// de yi 'og tu rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phrag cha dang bcas pas slar steng bcing bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra yakra hUM zhes pa
105b4(rgyud): 'di dang rdo rje thal mo mthe bo gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje gtsugator gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ 
105b5(rgyud): haM zhes pa'o// druM zhes pa yang ngo // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar ma bzlog nas skye bor gzhag pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// yang rdo rje zhags

106b1(rgyud): dang / rdo rje bral mo brkyang bas shar phyogs su phyag byas te/ oM sarba bi d+yA pA dzA u bas+thAnA ya a ta ma ni ni rA ta mA ma~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta badras pA ya d+ha Sh+Tha mA zhem pa 'das so// de nas de bzhin du langs la

106b3(rgyud): de bzhin du langs la/ rdo rje bal mo spyi bor banag ste/ nung phyog pa su kha sa la rag cing phyag bya ste/ oM sarba bid+yA pU dzA pra bar ta nA ya A ta mnaM/ nir+yA ta stA mi/ sarba twA thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma tha bar tA

109b4(rgyud): sems ma rdo rje bcings nas/ oM sab be dwe sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM a ba na ya hUM/ rdo rje bsdams pa brtan bcings nas// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bar nas// myur du gyen du legs 'phen la// ltung ba sro

109b7(rgyud): pas snying ka'i dbus su yi ge a las na ba'i dkyil 'khor dang de yi sbrang du oM mu de Te de ma hA mun ye swA hA/ oM na maHsarba dun te sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM pe sho d+ha ne shud d+ha bi shud d+hes rba karba A ba ra Na biH
109b8(rgyud): hA/ de dag shes ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkuganas bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas la/ nam
110a1(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba gzug snye dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi sa dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'gyur ro// dgas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur ba las dam tshig gi kyil ma ci yongs su rdzo ga

110b1(rgyud): na nanyis kyis rna ga bags la/ de na par nyid rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba gnang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas rnams can rnga po// dab ga pa der bakhyod dbang bskur// 'di sangs rgyas tham
110b2(rgyud): dkyis kyang ni rtag d+hAg nga // phagan rje'i btul thugs btan// oMsaH tertag ta med d+hi badz+ras mas /  d+hA rnam ti hrI hU~Mnas pa'o// ma bi d+ha ba kras / 
110b3(rgyud): / bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mthe bong dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung gyen du bsgreng bye kha skyer nas mdzub mo dang ming med mams dpa'i skyil krung byas pa ni do/ 
110b4(rgyud): kah+Na ste/ snying ga dang 'byin pa dang / dbul bdang/ mdzod su pa/ sbyin marnams dang / sna dang / na ba dang / dag dung sus mo dang / rkang bdag dang / byin pa dang / mig gnyis dang / gsadu
110b5(rgyud): rkyen gyis rlab pa yang // de nga gsas sa mapa ma ye sa las na pa'i dkyil la ba ma pon las byung ba'i mtshan ma tham pa cad kyi skyed pa'i sngal bskyed ce sa sa na me d+hi Sh+Tha / \u0f7f
110b6(rgyud): gnas su dzad pa s+ho// rna /  k+Shak+Sha Sh+Ta te/ 
110b7(rgyud): rnams su bklag pa bajug pa bcing pa pa dbang du gyu// rang ge thugs kang gyiyin no// sbyang ba ma dzan rtsalag// makya se ge 'dim tshig // phyag rgyar btu bshad par bya// dpal sa pade
111a1(rgyud): mchog gis ni// bzhugs pad ma chog phyag rgyar bshad// rdo rje bcing ba dam bya ba la// gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyang // rdo rje phyag rgya dam bcas pa// rdo rje gtsug tor phyagargya
111a2(rgyud): de nyid gung mo rin chen dang // ku yo 'ad ma'i rnam pa dang // de nyid khung mo rdo rje las// mom po lcag sa 'bar byas nyid// sor yo nyid 'bor byas pa// gtsug tor gzi brjid daphyag rgya'o// de nyid la
111a3(rgyud): lag dang // mthe'u gnyis ni mnyam ste bsgreng // mdzub yo pad ma'i 'dab ma las// gung mo rdo rje bsgreng ba dang // de nyid mdun du bzhag na pa ni// rdo rje dang tshul du bya// snying gar yang ni mthe bo ma1
111a4(rgyud): rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ma// thal mo sbyar pa kha nas dbyung // kar byed spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin// thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bo mnyam ste rab tu bsnga pa/ 
111a5(rgyud): brkyang ba byug pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing man pa// mdzub mo mtsho bong gung mo rnams/ na re re zhing yang phan tshun du/ mngon du phyogs pa gzung bar bya// mdzub bo gcig ni cung bad bkug/ 
111a6(rgyud): gnyis ni mdung ba bcing // mthe bo mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing // rdo rje khu tshur rtse mo bsdams// mgrin par bar d+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgom// sngar gyi 'byin pa'i sngags kyi
111a7(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ bsams te las kyi phyag rgya bya// ji skad bshad pa'i chob 'khor lo// shAkye rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sa gnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin da
111a8(rgyud): rigs sbyin sogs rim pa bzhin// nye 'dzin mtshig tu gnas pa ni// gtsug tor ga'i brjid phyag rgya'o// gapas ba'i la gang dpag pa dang // g.yon pa snying gar ba gre phyag na g.yon pa sdigs mdzub pa
111b1(rgyud): ste// g.yas pa bteg ste brkyang bar bya// lag pa gnyis ka gar bsdoms nas// gdugs kyi rnam par bzhag par bya// chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga gang // rdzogs sangs rgyas skyob min pa'i yang // rdo rje bsgyings pa
111b2(rgyud): / sbyor ba yis// btags pa'i bsam pas 'dud par bya// phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // gar gyis yongs su bskor ba nyid// rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis// 'dug pa la sogs de bozhin sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing
111b3(rgyud): yim// ma pe chung la ni lcags sgrog ce// 'khrig ma mdud cing mdzub gnyis bsnol// rgyab dag kyang ni nges par bsdam// de nas de phyir go rim bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'i// las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba yi// mtsha
111b4(rgyud): da yang dag rab tu bshad// rdo nga lu tur gces bcings nas// phan tshun lhan cig gshib ma nas ni/ mdzub mo dang ni phung mo dgug/ ye hog rnam par gzung bar bya// byams pa yi ni phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag
111b5(rgyud): g.yas pa'i dpung pa'i thad kar ni// mdzub mo gung mo brgya nas ni/  tshig gi tshul du gzhag par bya zhar thong bdon yod phyag rgya'o// rdo rje tshu gnyis bcings nas// mdzu yod pa ni brgyang nas su// g.yas pa lcags kyu leg
111b6(rgyud): bzhag pa// na song thams cad spong ba'i min// gsod latha tshur dkrur bzhas na galas pa'i dbyig sa bya ne/ a ma du sbed nas bgag par bya// byang na chud pa kung pajom gyi'o// g.yon laT tsu lte bar bzhag/ 
111b7(rgyud): ba g.yas pa glang po che'i nasna yi tshul du bzhag pa ni// thos kyi grang po'i phyen rgya'o/ g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bas ste// g.yas par la gri thegs pa yi// tshul du 'jog par byed pa de// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i phyag kyi
111b8(rgyud): nigayon pa khu tshur snying ga gan ga// g.yas pa snyed skang sa pa mdzod pa// dod batshur gnyen bcings pa// bya mtshan 'dzi pa lta 'u ni// g.yas kya lags su 'dog byed pa// la shas tog gi phyag rgyago/ la
112a1(rgyud): / pa gnyis kyis bum 'don kyar// bzhag pa 'dad pag me pa'i'o// g.yon pa la bu chur badra steng gzhag/ g.yas pa'i khu dur gnags su ni// ma la chung brgyang byas la// 
112a2(rgyud): tha 'ad kyi'o// lag pa gnyi ni snyi ga rba// pad ma'i rnam par na 'byes// rtse mo na tan sur ba ni// babang skyo na ni phyag tu men// do pe la bur gnyis bcings la// gon 'dzin pa lta bur ni// nu ma gnyis su
112a3(rgyud): legs gzhag la// dra ba can 'od phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur gzhag la// g.yas po snying gar bzhag nas ni// sor mo dbus ma bsgred byas la// rdon snying po'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon gcu tshur snying gar
112a4(rgyud): gzhag/ g.yam pa mi 'jigs sbyin rnams la// blo gros me bad pa yi'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar gzhag/ g.yas pa me gos gtogs pa ni// spobs pa pa
112a5(rgyud): gzhag ste// g.yas pa rin chen khu tshur bya// kun tu babang po'i phyag rgya yin// mtshan ma dang bral chog yis// las kyi phyag char bshad pa yin// snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga ba'i// gzugs can yang dag gzung bzhing // 'byed
112a6(rgyud): rnams su ji ltar gzung // phyag rgya mtshan ma bsnams pa dag // rdo ril bu bzung nas ni// thugs kar rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// phyag rgya che zhes byang chub gang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'o// 'byin pa rnams
112a7(rgyud): gzung // phyag rgya mtshon chab sdams pa rnams// bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis// phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings nas// snying po don gyi bzlas pa dang // rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// phyag rgya bzhi rnams
112a8(rgyud): byed pa// spyanams thamasas dargyas btab dang // kun ma khyen pan ta rdzogs pa dang // semam can kun gyi don gyi'i byer// ngan mong thams cad legs sbyangs nas// sems can byang chub thob bya byer// de nas drag pa/ 
112b1(rgyud): ka ba s+ho// nas kun sa dkyil 'kha // phyag tu sngags ra tu gyis// khyab thams ca rnas par 'gyur// chom ma pa rdzog // bya nas thugs rnam pa brjod par bya/ oMn ma byug ba ta// 
112b2(rgyud): du ga te ba re she d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha he sa \u0f89\u0fa4 ka saM rbad d+hA ya/ ha thA/ oM na d+ha ne she d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud d+he be shud d+he larba karma A pa ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ g.yon 'a'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu brangs
112b3(rgyud): lags g.yas pas rje 'byung ba dang bcas pas rdo rjem yin 'dasad ces brjod de/ drang canaT de h+nu dza rang ni snying gar ba rlid phyagasal ba'i sbyor bas gzung shing rdeg hoHzhes brjod do// de nas
112b4(rgyud): brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de rnams bltas la mchod pa tham pa cad kyis rab tu mchod pas mchod do// de nas de rnams kyis bsgo
112b5(rgyud): nams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi// ngan song thams cad srong mdzad pa// shAkya seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
112b6(rgyud): las/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// mnyam nyid de nyid bsgoms pa yis// khams gsum la gnas thams cad la// dbang bsku
112b7(rgyud): rol mdzad pa// rin chen gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// pi sor kun rtog rang bzhin can// chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas// sems can dbugs 'byen mdzad pa po// pad ma'i gtsug tor khyod phyag
112b8(rgyud): mas cad sdug bsngal ni bya'i phyir// bya ba rjes sru ba rang bzhin cad// yin las snatshogs mdzad pa'o// da tshogs gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad/ 
113a1(rgyud): sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yi// bden pa ma'ong bar mdzad pa po// gtsug tor gi ci 'arjid khyod phyag 'tshal// yid bzhin nor bu'irgyal mtshan snams// sman pas sems can
113a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas// sems can byang chub
113a3(rgyud): thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor rnon po khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyis// gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan pa yi// chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor gdugs dkar khyo
113a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang // spos dang me tog mar ma pa// driyi lha mo khyod phyag 'tshal// dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba// sgo bzhi'i dbus na gang sugs pa
113a5(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags srog dril// sgo skyong khyed rnams la phyag 'tshal// sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na// khyams rnams su ni bzhugs mdzad pa// rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas// byang chub
113a6(rgyud): sems dpa' khyed phyag 'tshal// tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs// phyogs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// me dang srin po rlung lha dang // 'byung po'i bdag po khyad phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'ang
113a7(rgyud): yis ni// dkyil 'khor mdun du kun bstod nas// sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas// bstod pa 'di ga yang dag brjod// phyi nas rang gi lus la ni// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu gzhug/ de ltar nges par
113a8(rgyud): sgom bzhin pa'o// dkyil labar dang ba sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas dkyil 'thor rgyam mchog zhes bya ba rab tu bshad par bya ste/  akA bo lul bca /  A dud pa nan thA// de 'don na rnam par
113b1(rgyud): sa phyogs bcu la 'jig rten gyi khams thams dastong pa nyid 'acu drug tu lhag params pa bya ste/ ngam rin pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid du blta'o// de nas yi ge hU~M las rdzogs pa'i rdongarjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor
113b2(rgyud): de keng du yi ge ra kyis mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / de yi stang du le ge ba la ma na gter chen po dang / de yi steng du yi ge zhe las gaper mi dkyil 'khor dang / de yi steng du dbus su hU~M su~M ng+ge zhes bye ba ste/ de las ring
113b3(rgyud): rin po che'i rang bzhin rin po thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed la/ oM badz+ra rtse zhes pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje bsdams pas byin gyis brlabs po// de yi steng du rdo rje'i rgyu yi las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge b+h+rUM dkar po
113b4(rgyud): raba'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ ta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// grwa bzhi rnams ni thams cad du// sgo dang sgo khyad mtshams rnams pa// 
113b5(rgyud): tshan ma rdo rjes spras// dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing // thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// nang gi dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje phreng bas yongs su
113b6(rgyud): 'o// de'i lte ba'i steng du seng ge'i gdan no// de'i steng du na ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo rtse bas brgyad pa'i nang rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te lha rnams kyi gnas so// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas ni snam
113b7(rgyud): dmas la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid rtsa brgyad blta'o// seng ge'i gdan gyi steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge a la sogs pa dang / yi ge ga la soga' ba shes rapa dang thabs kyi le ge'u bar gyur pa mkhal rgyan gyi
113b8(rgyud): nganas rnas par thugs kya kyi ma ma can kyi na dod d+hA rdzogs pa ga gags sa sa sa pa k+Sha/ thugs des la naH
114a1(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyu haM/ sgrub thathams cad tang po dzi pa snyomam par zhugs pa// de nas tang // brnams par thugs pa'i sas rgyas tsamam ldan 'das des phyag da
114a2(rgyud): sngags bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya// chos kyi 'khor mo'i phyag rgya ni// 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin// de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste// ji gyur bar
114a3(rgyud): mal chags pa'i// blang ba la sogs bsdams pa rnams// pad ma'i 'dab ma kha phyen// bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed// de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// srid gsum 'khor bar bcings
114a4(rgyud): 'di// thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi// seng ges bcings pa las grol mdzad// de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams cad
114a5(rgyud): kye bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsam pa te rje phred rdornga ba phems pa'am mar thug pa 'byung ba yin no// de nas sdug sa rnam pa 'byung ste/ oM ma b+ha ga pa ta man dun ti pa ri sho d+han d+ha yA/ tAthAg lngal
114a6(rgyud): nyi ma phyags bung sa/ tAH/ oM rten no ne/ sarba pA pa 'i shong+ka ne/ bud d+habi shud d+has rba karmas par/ me bud d+han hA/ sngags 'di sa par brjod do// de nas de'i gsas ni// rim bzhin
114a7(rgyud): yang dag rab bshad bya/ oM badz+ra hU~M phaT/ kha li sgon sa phyung nas ni// kun nas 'od zer lnga par 'thon// kun nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas// sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal rnams niH
114a8(rgyud): // 'od nas zhes so ga pa/ sngags gas la// thugs dang nyim sa pa/ 9 nga sbyin pang brdzog pa la// nang gi ma
114b1(rgyud): shing phyogs pa das na par bzhugs// rdo rjeg tsun ta bzhin nanags// sems can kun pa na du// thugs galas byung bzhugs pan// su mdog da/  ning 'dazer 'bar// sa gnan rgyag
114b2(rgyud): yang dag bzhugs// de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni// sngar bshad pa'i thams cad kyang // spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sngags dang 'od per legs 'dras dang // sku ni bskyed cing yang dag rdzogs// ji bzhin gan
114b3(rgyud): su bzhugs par bya// a rang nod tam d+he zhes bya ba'i dbyung bar bya'o// lho la rtsibs su yang dge bzhugs// padam zla ba'i dbus bu ni// rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// thugs gan pa ni nges bton
114b4(rgyud): nag// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag brgyan// sku mdog sngo zhing shin du mdzes// 'di yi phyag rgya mchog sbyin nyid// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzod// sngar
114b5(rgyud): bzhin spro dang bkru ba dang // gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yis// oM pad yod ta ma hIHzhes dbyung bar bya'o// de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i// pad stengs zla ba'i
114b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i// pad ma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// rmugs ka las ni phyung gyur nas// rjes su ston mdzad bzhugs pa ni// pad mar ga'i 'od 'bar ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam par bzhugs// ma
114b7(rgyud): / byang phyogs rtse bas gnas padam le// steng du rla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// zugs ka nas bton sangs rgyayini// sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// zlu mdog ljang khu 'od
114b8(rgyud): 'bar ba// 'di yi phyag tum che ba rdegs skyed// phyag rgyam phrin lam sna chogs sa dang // sems can 'khor ba la ma smos pa'o// seshe ma kyis mangs ma dbyung // gtsug tu byed de bsnyenapa
115a1(rgyud): / me sematshams gnas padas gnas// yang dag rnamad dkyil la sa// gags pas nyes yang dag bsnams// pag gnon pani yul gnas// su mdog dkar dpa 'od
115a2(rgyud): khams gsum po ni snang bar mdzad// hUM gi sa bon las byung ba// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs// thugs ka las byung phyung nas ni// bden bral rtsi bsal bzhugs nas ni// pad gnas

115a6(rgyud): bas su dpung bar bya// kun da lta bu'i mdog lta bu// 'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs bskums pa// de kun sna chags pad mar gnas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i// oM trA~M Sh+T+r-iHAHsngags

115b5(rgyud): dpa' gsum pa yang // mtshan ni ngan song srong 'joms pa// su ma dog dkar po 'od 'bar shing // phyag rgya lcags kyu bsnams pa can// bzhi ba mya ngan mun bkun// nges 'joms blo gros de bzhi
115b6(rgyud): / dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog tu snang // de yi phyag rgya dbug pa bsnams// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' bzhi rnams kyang // 
115b7(rgyud): rab tu bzhugs pa'o// dang po bras kyi skang po yang // dkar po lnga pa'i sku mdog can// 'de yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na// dri yis dung de rab tu bkang // g.yon gcu dur dkar bzhag la// sleb pa thams cad
115b8(rgyud): par spyod// gnyis pa dpa' bar 'gro ba mtshan// nyon mong sa sems cad rab krol mdzad// shel gyi mdog can 'di bzang ba// 'di sa phyag rgyar la gre bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag nas/ 
116a1(rgyud): sems can g+sa rdza nau mdza pa'o// su namamaud de nyid// rgyan rnamasanakyis brgyanag/ dgasu dog 'dra// kha
116a2(rgyud): rnam par spangs// 'di 'i phyag rgya phyag gapas na// pad ma la gnas chos kyi mdzod// g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur ba lagal// nam mkha' nor kun 'chang ba po// len pa yang ni ye shes tog/ 
116a3(rgyud): pathams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// sngon pa'i mdog can yang dag gsal// yid sbyin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// g.yon pal gudrar dkur 'jog cing // dbul bar sprug pa
116a4(rgyud): dgrol bar mdzad// nub sgo'i drung du pad ma la// gnas pa'i rba ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dang po bdud rtsi 'od ces bya// zla ba'i mdog gis rnam par mdzes// bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par
116a5(rgyud): bsnams// cad pan rin chen phyag gis so// g.yen labu tshur dkur 'jog cing // rgya chen mo ni rtsol ba po// gnyis pa'i mtshan nim kha'i 'od// mi shes pa yi mun pa bsal// sbrum
116a6(rgyud): dkari sa mangs pa ni// phyag rgya g.yas pa'i phyag nyid kyis// pad mar gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs// g.yon gagu tur dkur bzhag pa'o// gsum pa bzang stong zhes pab// dag
116a7(rgyud): dmar ba'i mdog can nyid// chos rnams thams cad dbugs la mdzad// phyag rgya phyag ni g.yas pa yis// den chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams// g.yon pa/ tha chur dkur gnas pa
116a8(rgyud): / chub sems dpa' bzhi pa yang // dra ba can gyi 'od mtshan can// sku mdag dmar pa'ad 'bar ba// rdo rje'i khur ni bsnams pa can// bya sgo'i rtsa bar bdam la// gnas pa'i na
116b1(rgyud): // sa byams 'dasad// mtshanan nas//  gad / nas mas// da pa yin ya// g.yon ga 'ju
116b2(rgyud): gnas pa'o// gnyis pa zo gros zhes pa yi// ma zad pa zar yang dge ldan// kun dus pa'i mdog ltar gsal// phyag rgya phyag ni gnyis pa yis// ye shes thub pa yang dag bsnams// ma
116b3(rgyud): thams cad pa chim ma dang // sangs rgyas phras po gsum pa yang // skyes pa brtsegs pa'i ma spyad can// dumadog dam nang 'da' bar ga/ phyag tu phyag g.yas padamal// gnas
116b4(rgyud): phung po nyid// g.yon ga'u chur dgur gnas pa'o// rgyal ba'i sras po bani ba ni// kun du bzang po zhes byaste// su mdogs zhing 'od 'bar ba// g.yas pa'i phyag gi phyag rgya ni// rin chen
116b5(rgyud): bsnams pa la// g.yon la ba tshur dkur bsnyen pa'o// de lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// byang chub sems dpa' brtse bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting po
116b6(rgyud): oM mr-i ne ma ne ma hA mun ya swA hA// na maHsarba du ti pa re sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta nA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te me myags bud pA ya/ had+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud d+he bi shud d+he sa rba karma A bar
116b7(rgyud): na // sa 'das shA kya'i rgyal po la sogs pa ltas sa cun bdun pa sa la rdzogs par bzlas so// de nas de'i rjes la ye shes kyi dkyil la nga bar bya'o// 
116b8(rgyud): phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas// sgo ni dbye bar byas nas su// dorje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // mche chung wa gurgad byas la// rnyed bye ba yi phyag rgya yis// 
117a1(rgyud): tsho su kAT rahA/ dmapa' sngags dang phyag rgyas skad bya'o// rdorjel la'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'a sangs su bteg ste// sos tsha 'dra ba
117a2(rgyud): lag ngang dag ni rdo rjer bcings// rdo rjes kol rnam grol bas// shAkya'i rgyal po sbyor bdag dpal// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu byar bya// g.yon pa se gol brdabs pa yis// mnyam par 'ja
117a3(rgyud): tha par 'gyur// g.yas pa yis kyang brdab par gsungs// gnyis ga yang ni sdud pa yin// oM badz+ras yang nga chu toH bka' bsgo ba 'di bsgrags tsam gyis// 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'kha
117a4(rgyud): gas// sangs rgyas thams cad byon 'gyur na// gzhan rnams rab 'jug lta ci smos// de nas mdun kyi nam mkha' dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bltas la// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis mchod
117a5(rgyud): snod na gnas pa'i dri yi ru yis yang dag par bsangs te/ zhal bsil dbul lo// de nas mchod 'on gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon dbul lo// de nas zhabs bsel gyi phyag rgyas zhabs bsil da
117a6(rgyud): den pa \u0f7fhUM/ dz+ra drA phreM// / rdo gnad byin gyi phyag cas bgegs pasnar la// dkyil 'khor du gzhug go// de nas yang phyag d+ha dang po snga ba shA
117a7(rgyud): rgya'i tshogs dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing ngo // de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i chog bya'o// de nas las kyi phyag bya'i sngags kyis las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo //

117b1(rgyud): / mau ma nyid kyil la dang bcas pa'o// dpal tshul ba rnam pa mam 'dza nga zug pas dbang bzla ba sbyin pa bya/ dbang bskur ba da / 
117b2(rgyud): ze ste sa bcu'i mthar thug pa sbyin no// dbang bsrur ma thag tu/ a sarba ta thA ga ta drA pa p+'u daM me gas bu pA ra Ni se ma ya hUM/ oM sarba ta gta m+b+ha pA dz+dza m+be g+ha sa yungs ro Na sa ma ma hA/ mes chags ga
117b3(rgyud): pU dz+ra me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ a sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+he rA dzA me g+ha sa mud s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi yis mchod do// rdo rdegs pa ning rdo rje'i tshig yi ge brgya pa sngon du 'tsho
117b4(rgyud): / sngar banid bstod pa bya'o// de nas mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med snying po'i chos can ni// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sal// yon tan dngos grub thams cad mtha' yas
117b5(rgyud): mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog rab chos can rnams// yon tan mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams med do// nam mkha' dang mnyam dper gyur pa nyid yod ma yin// sems can
117b6(rgyud): grub mchog stsol brnams la gsol// dngor grub mtha' yas rnams la dpe dang rnam par bral// dri med thugs rjebargya pa nyid kyi shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa
117b7(rgyud): can// gro ba'i don sgrub su da mtha'al yas mal can// thug pa rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tarnam pa ldang // lagag med nyid kyi thugs rdzing ska pa mi gsog/ 'jig rten ga

118a2(rgyud): dngos grub mchog sbyin bdag la su li zhes pa dang / thams cad lce brgya pa'i kha yis bstod pa nye bar spyod par mes te rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas bstod par bya'o// de nas phyogs bcur de bzhin
118a3(rgyud): gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyi rol kye lha rnams la mchod pa thams cad dang gtor ma'i cho ga nye bar mkhab dang bcas pa'i gtor

118b2(rgyud): na pa// dge ba'i rgyu dpyir sdig pa dang // slob bzhi phyir bsreg bya ste// mer dang 'o ma spang rdzi dang // 'bras yos nyungs kar bsres pa dang // til dang 'bru dang 'bras la sogs// rud shing rnams su lag
118b3(rgyud): gnyis kyis// las rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang // sa ma ji ltar de ltar gyis// de yis myur du sems can rnams// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob// las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ti
118b4(rgyud): 'dzin to// de dag kyang sems can de la byas pa de nas de dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa bde bar gshe
118b5(rgyud): pa dang ldan par skyes so// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams snyan dngas dang bcas pas gar byed cing / sngags kyi mchod pa'i sprin mtha' yas pas skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa lam
118b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir lha'i tshogs rnams mdun du bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / rwa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa sna tshogs pa
118b7(rgyud): dang / can dum rnams kyi kyang mdzes shing nabapa' dang rin po che'i tshar la sogs pas kyang dga' ba'i tshal yongs su gang par byas so// de nas ngo la char che bar gyur to// ngan song thams cad
118b8(rgyud): sa su spyong pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa las btag pa dang po'o// de ras bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
119a1(rgyud): 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sngags kyis brtag pa'i rgyal ba brtag pa phye mar g.yus te/ dpa' ba gdan la sra bzhengs nas na/ dgyes pas rdo rje gsor zhing
119a2(rgyud): bdag pod dgyes pa thub pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas sleb pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i
119a3(rgyud): de nyid rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // mos rba pA ped ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sarba a bA ya bi sho d+ha na badz+ra phaT/ is cag rma A ba ra NA ne ka shrI ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM bruM bi nA sha ya sarba A ba raN+Da ni
119a4(rgyud): be sho d+ha ya sarba A ba ra NAn d+ha phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka han tan sa na A ba ra NA ne h+ne phaT/ a s+ye sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra sa rba A pA raShAn hU~M la/ oM tru ha ra ha ra sa rba bar NA na tu pe/ oM

120b1(rgyud): yong thams cad yongs su sto ba'i rgyam po'i phyag 68// de nyid kyi mdzab ma dang mang med dag rin po che la rnam par ba// 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// maH'u chu dang mnazajoms sa pa

120b8(rgyud): A rnamasas rnams nis na par byas pa rnam par rgyas phyin rgyag// gams pa mtshad sbyin dang maman pa mi 'dags pa sbyi pa zhin gshegs ma yin no// da
121a1(rgyud): sa ma ga nyis du 'dra bar byas pa ni dza r+dz+nyAN+Da // da las ma gsas pa gag ni thugs // de nyid las ma la 'dra bar byas pan mad

121b1(rgyud): bu rnams ga zed la 'do bu mo seM byas pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni lags sa lags so// legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag sa
121b2(rgyud): thams cad tshe dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
121b3(rgyud): kashegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ ma hA pra N+ye a pa ra mi tA ya yu pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ma tsi te ka ri Ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
121b4(rgyud): snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad pa tsam gyis ngan song thams cad pa tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang byol mong gi 'gro ba rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad
121b5(rgyud): bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
121b6(rgyud): chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhi
121b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi tsha dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do// ma~M ma mi te a mi tA/ ya mi ta ud b+ha ba~M/ a mi ta paM b+ha pe/ a me ta bi kAn te/ a mi te be kan tas
121b8(rgyud): nisarba ka ma k+saM shak+Sha saM ka ri swA hA/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi'o// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi
122a1(rgyud): gzungs 'di rang gi drug sa gnas byung ngo // 9ga ka de ki ka ni/ rtse na can/ rdorje rdo ni/ dA sa nri tAs ni/ pra ti ha na pra he ha nas chag sapa rab du N+DI mes nas tAnan tsa swA hA/ 'di bshad btsam
122a2(rgyud): thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ del
122a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi slob pa ma lus pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzung ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //  ma rang ne rad ne/ ma hA rad ne/ rad na saM b+ha'o// rad na ki radran
122a4(rgyud): rad na mA lA bi shud d+he/ sho b+ha ga/ sarba pA paM hUM dzaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
122a5(rgyud): dan mi za bar ma tshems par sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs la
122a6(rgyud): rang gzugs kanas phyung ngo // so mo ma pra ti ta ta sa tha' bar khe dz+nyAn he tang d+ha dz+rag 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten mapa 'de thams cad g.yos rab tu gapos pa dang/

132b8(rgyud): ra// sngags rig ser sa med sems dang // dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan pa// dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni// sems kyis bsgom par byas nas
133a1(rgyud): ma las dab dkyil 'khar bsam// rang gis 'on dbus sa// bsam nas dam chug phyag tu yang // bsam bzhin dbazhin de nyid kyang // lu la rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du//

133a7(rgyud): bdang / bris pa dang / 'drer bcug pa dang / rjes su mi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig/ lha'i bu rnams mdor nang la yang de'i phan yon bshad par sprol
133a8(rgyud): de/ gang nga la bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya phrag stong du mar bskur yang grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsod nams kyi
133b1(rgyud): ba kya brjod do// gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman pa 'ad na bcom ldan 'das ngo mar che'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mthar cha'o// bcom ldan 'das
133b2(rgyud): cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par rdzogs pa smo'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o// de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad cel gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam
133b3(rgyud): bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung shing tshe chung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag
133b4(rgyud): la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ kye lha'i bu dag de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig/ bcug nas kyang dbang bskur cig/ chos kyi yi ge yang blos su chug cig/ de nas sems can de dag

134a1(rgyud): rnams zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po tha ma dang bar ma dang mchog khru gang dang khyade 'am/ khru bzhi pa byas nas de'i ming gis yungs kar dkar po rnams brgya phrag stong du sregs na ngan pa

134a3(rgyud): brgyad dkar po 'od zer 'bar// 'khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa// 'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri// de nas sna tshogs dong bya// rdo rje rin chen du skye pa mchog/ de nas sdig pa gnom pa'i phyir// phyag tu dam
134a4(rgyud): bsna tshogs bya// phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni phyi ro la bri// gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang // de ltar 'jig rten 'khor rnams kyang // gtso bo'i ri mo lugs ma dang // rdo rje can dang /

134b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang // phyi rol de yi lha yi bya// sems can de ni dran byas la// na bza' dmar po gyon pa yi// me tog dmar shing pad ma yang // 'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa// mar dang gur

150b1(rgyud): btsug sa la mtha'ang lag pa thil du bzhag pa ni ma lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bang mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya nyid
