269a6(rgyud): 'did las par ba bad pani zhes bya ba'o// sbyin min rnamasani sbyin bya'o// 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams// bdag nyid da ni gzhan rnams padan bsam pa pams cad rdzog 'phyir ro// zhes bya ba
269a7(rgyud): tshig gi mchog go/ dam tshig 'di yis mchog tu ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// myur du yang dag dam pa mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par mdzod// de ltar gsang ba mchog gi tshul dka
269a8(rgyud): ga mchog tu rgyas pa ste// mchog chen ni rtog pa thams cad kyi// rnying po byed par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// dang byung mchog dang po las rtog pa thams cad kyi bslab pa 'o/ 
269b1(rgyud): / de nas grub chen thams cad kyi// bsgrub pa'i mchag ni bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag mche/ gtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir// snod ma yin pa'i sems can no// 
269b2(rgyud): thams cad byed rnams la// mthong ba la sogs sems can dod// sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa yin// mthong med long bde rnams ni// bsod nams med sogs rtags ldan la/ 
269b3(rgyud): sems sogs sems dpa mchog su mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyurnams ni// rdo rje sems sogs sems mchog gi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig mchog ni bcing ba ste/ 
269b4(rgyud): dang gapa pa'o// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi// gang phyir sku rnams brtan pa ni// de yi phyag rgyas grags pa ste// dngos grub kun gyir de dag sprul// gang dag gzung ba tsam gyis ni// 
269b5(rgyud): sems dpa' la sogs mchog/ mthong zhing mngon par mthong ba nyid// mchog tu bsdus par gyur pa yin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam kyi la ni// gang phyir bsdus par 'gyur ba ste// 
269b6(rgyud): sogs sems dpa' rnams// nyams pas 'jigs pas grub par 'gyur/ ci lcang rgyal po rnams kyi bkar/ tam kyi byam rgya yad 'a dka ba sha phyag rgyags la btsun gyis kyang // 'da' bar nus
269b7(rgyud): ma yin no// sangs rgyas nyid ngamado 'dzin// de ltar bskal pa bye bas kyang gathob par mi 'gyur ma ra mi snar byas rgya mchog bzung pa'o// ci ltar 'dul ldan 'jig rten ni// de ltar dngos pa
269b8(rgyud): / gsungs pa yin// de la thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub thams cad mchog tu byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ri// 'dus pa bde ba chen po rnams// rdo rje sems sogs skad cig gis/ 
270a1(rgyud): 6/ byid kyis brlab pa brtan par bdang zhes bya'o// de nas 'di gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhas shang mchog tu phrab // bab pa dang rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khya
270a2(rgyud): bdag ga/ zin ma dang tha ma med pa// mi nga me bang pa med pa// don ma cing sogs pa med pa// shin tu mchog sa dga' bas lum pa'i de can pa dang yi da da bam lam shi yul pa
270a3(rgyud): kyi khams thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur 'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje dbab pa rnams kyis rab tu pad par ma dad nas// bde
270a4(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod pa'i mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshon cha mchog gi 'di mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga rgyud phye ma'i mchog byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshe
270a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gis bdag la byin gyis bdab pa bslab pa gcig pu'i cho ga bshad par byar zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsangs so// nyin du sngon du lan
270a6(rgyud): chedang rnying po bzlas// kun 'i ga tur 'grub pa'o// bdag byin brlab pa gci ga sus 'thung ces kyang rnamachog tu grub pa'o// de nas mchog tugs sa bdag la byin kyis brlab pa gcigs
270a7(rgyud): /  gdus migag // gas nas ga no//  la gas pa rdzas// pan+dams gyu/ 
270a8(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu bsgrub pa'i tshag byas pa'i khyad par shesas mchog tu gru' pa de// dardu ngul tha kun bdag nyid// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i srung bdag ldan// phyag
270b1(rgyud): kyar gyi rab 'byor bdag/ rdo sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// kun 'i chag 'di mas ni// rdo rje sems dpal yang dag bltas// kun mchag dngas grub chen po la// dbang phyug chen po nyid byin brlabs/ 
270b2(rgyud): ngan yong kha rab tu bdag rkyen parna'as// ra bzhin nyid ces thams cad du// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad de// rang cad bcings nas grub par 'gyur// bdag byer ba rlang sa deng don yod phyir// myur dul
270b3(rgyud): / med dngos grub rnams// las kyi tshogs kyis bslabs pa yis// dngos grub kun myur 'grub par 'gyur// 'ad yes cung zad mi 'grub med// dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde// thams cad byin 'ar
270b4(rgyud): bsgrub pa pas// mi 'gyur ba ni kun grub byed ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdorje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las dngos grub thams cad byed byel brlab pa'i cho ga mchog tugs
270b5(rgyud): des bya'o// / de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi tshig rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te// de la thog ma kho nar re shig don sa
270b6(rgyud): ranal 'byar gyi skad kyi dbyings so// 'di yang brtson pa yin no zhes bya ba ni skad gyi dbyings kyi don to// gang zhing brtson pa yin zhe na// smras pa rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngas su ngan par sbyor bas na rnal 'byor
270b7(rgyud): slar yang gzhan ni yang dag par bsdu ba dang par dag par kun tu sbyor ba dang yang dbu par spong ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ro brjod pa'i rnam grangs so// gang yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rang gi lcag
270b8(rgyud): rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor rjes su bsgrub pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i spyor pa zhes bya'o// de la ci ltar thams cad kyi rnal 'khor yin zhen// dam tshig gi rnag 'byor ni thams
271a1(rgyud): /  rgya nas bya med do// de kren gshegs pa kun gyis pag// du ba pas// ga pa migarjes sna lkugs// da byegagags nas kya da
271a2(rgyud): dag nyid kyi bya ga brgya'i sbyor ba'i yang dag par kun tu sbyor bas na thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ro// de la tshe ltar na thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor la
271a3(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag yang dag sbyor// ci lha'i dbyibs dang zhwa dang yin// bdag nyid bdag nyid nyid la ni// brgod nas rjes su bsgrub par bya nas bya ba ni rang ga dmatshig gi rnal 'byor thams cad can la
271a4(rgyud): zhes bya'o// de la rjes su bsgrub pa ni// lhag pa'i lhan gang gang gis// phyag rgya gang dang gang 'chang ba// deng de yi rnal 'byor gyis// phyag de sbyor bya zhes bya'o// de nas mchog tu gsapa
271a5(rgyud): rab mchog gi/ rjes su bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchog tu shin du grub pa ni// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// gzi brjod can na nyid kyang yin// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// de phyir bad
271a6(rgyud): nyid brtag par bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o// de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i mchog gi rjes su bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mtsha
271a7(rgyud): //  sgya da //  gas phyag mye smra na// ga sa dag sa 'byong dag rgya ma tshig pa gyu / ga pa rnams dkyi
271b1(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig mchog gi rnal 'byor ni yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'o// de nas gzhan yang slar mchog tu shin tu gsang ba mchog gi rjes su srub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par mchog tu gru
271b2(rgyud): las kyang shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni// rdo rjes mos dpar bdag ster ba'i// ci bzhin dbyings dang skar ldan pa// kun bdag phrag rgya rnal 'byer bdag/ mi 'gyur mchog ni grub pa
271b3(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsal ba'i rjes 'gro ba// rnal 'byor kun bdag grub pa ste// gsal zhing shin tu grub mchog yin// 'di yis mi 'grub cung zad med// dngos gru
271b4(rgyud): / dang de bzhin bde// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub dang // dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub ces bya ba ni gsang ba 'dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te shin tu mchog tu rab tu phub pa'o// 'dod pa kun la longs
271b5(rgyud): // ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis// rnal 'byor dag ni 'di dag gis// ring gi bdag nyid 'i mtshang bya zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu gas ba bla na med pa theg pa
271b6(rgyud): / dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gi rnal 'byor dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor tham
271b7(rgyud): rad kyi blan med pa'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi cha dang rnam
271b8(rgyud): gzhon pa dang dad med pa dang gzugs dang kha dog dang gzi brjed dang stobs dang spro ba dang dngos grub mchog thams cad dang dpal dang / skal pa babang po dang dga' ba chen po dang shin tu bde ba dang
272a1(rgyud): lams pa dal dbu pa bachog tu thum pa sa/  ze lus shing lus pa med pa la ma lus pa'i dngas gru' chen po dam pa mas da bye dbang phyug can pa'i bdag nyid
272a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu grub pa ste rgyas btab pa tsam gyi skad cig gis rab tu grub pa yin no// de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na 'di lta ste/ spyod pa phya
272a3(rgyud): rag lus// phyag rgya rnal 'byor la gnas pa// rnal 'byor khyad par gyi bsgrub bya// rnal 'byor dam tshig gis sgrub byed// sems ni stong pa sgyu mar mtshungs// lus dang bral bar mo grub ste// 
272a4(rgyud): de yang ni cig pa 'dra// bya ba med cing sems dang bral// lus kyang sems dang bral ba ste// sems kyang lus dang bral ba ni// grub pa ma yin de bzhin 'di// phyag rgya rnal 'byor cho gar brjod/ 
272a5(rgyud): lub ni sems kyis dang // sems kyang lus kyis grub 'gyur ba// de bzhin phyag rgya rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor dam tshig bsrub pas so// de ltar dam tshig rnal 'byor dag/ phan tshur du ni pa
272a6(rgyud): byed// phan tshun ni yang rtag bdag nyid// de bzhin gzhags par grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni shin tum cho gtugs dpa chog bu pas ma 'dra' ba rjems dpas gsungs so// del ce ltar phyag sems cad dang
272a7(rgyud): la 'byor dag rjes su bsgrub pa yin zhe na// phyag rgya sgra ni brtan pa'i phyir// de yang bde bas brtan par 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo bar 'gyur// yang nal che ba thob par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'phye
272a8(rgyud): sems las byung // yid bde ba yis rab tu sgrub// 'i mi bde bas g.yo lam// yang na 'gag pa thob par 'gyur// de phyir 'bang pa thams cad kyis// phyag rgya rnal 'byor rjes grub byed// dpa
272b1(rgyud): sa sa yang //  bdag bas bsgru bya// na sa tug la rnamasas ngasasasu sa gsungs sa// des dam ga
272b2(rgyud): rjes su sgrub pa'i bde ba gang yin ne na// 'dod pa suni la sa gyur ro//  dod par ni bstan pa yis/ rang she sa yin pa 'byor gyis// bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par phye zhes bya ba'o// de yinanan
272b3(rgyud): pam cad gyi mchog tug sang bablan med pa'i thag chen po'i ma dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ze na po na sa bam chog tu bde zhes bya ro// des
272b4(rgyud): shAng byin bye sa pa gru sA+e ga zhen/ da nyes pa mi pas/ ga bsngas ldan pas par skams// sngags ma gyi ni sems g.yengs 'gyur// rnama'i rgya na
272b5(rgyud): bye ci 'dod la spyod pa// kun pa bde bzhin thams cad byed// ce 'dod byam la spyod pa// ci 'dod par ni spyod pa sod// gang dang gang du 'chag pa dang // dgod pa 'am ni smra ba 'am// gang dang de gyi bzhin du
272b6(rgyud): mamajug / sleb rnams dang ldan pa //  'i nal 'gyu // gags kyi zhan lam nyid la bya // thams ca shid na ba
272b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis// rnam pa kun tu gnod me 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po kun bdag nyid// dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyur// thams cad nga rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// sangs rgyas bya
272b8(rgyud): sems dpa' nyed// rnal 'byor 'di yis rnyed sar// dngos grub rnams dang las mchog gi// tshogs rnams gzhan lha spos ce dgos// don yod mchog tu grub pa dang // phyag rgya thams cad rjes grub byed/ 
273a1(rgyud): dpa' ldan sdug pasngal kun 'phrog pa'i// rdul 'byor de'i 'gyur mchog ces byab mchog med padeb bcom ldan 'das do/ sems dpas gsungs so// di la rnal 'byor thams
273a2(rgyud): dab cing ba ci ltar yin ne na// bsam pa med cing thams cad sla// de bzhin thams cad bsams nas kyang // ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rang bzhin nyid du snyoms par zhugs// de la cing
273a3(rgyud): byor thams cad 'acing ba dang lung bstan pa yin zhe na// rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad dang sbyor bas// ye shes tsam la sbyor ba 'dir// rnal 'byor nas de brjod pa yid zhes bya ba na
273a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rnal 'byor gyi cho ga mchog tu shin du gsang ba zhes bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po dang shin tu rnal 'byor bcing ba dang lung bstan pa
273a5(rgyud): / gsungs te// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag spyor pas// mchod pa kun gyi rjes sbyor ba// rnal 'byor thams cad rab sbyor 'di// rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod par bya// de la 'di ltar brjod bya ste// de nyid
273a6(rgyud): 'di krub ste// mchog tu mchog gi bdag nyid de// shi mchog tugasang ba ste// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// rdo rje srab dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la// thams
273a7(rgyud): 'byor chog spyod// gzhan rnams la na ma byas so// 'di la srub med gang bad med// dngos grub las dang bde ba dang // thams cad rnal 'byor ba rjes bsgrub pas// mi 'gyur bams
273a8(rgyud): papar byed// nal 'byar tshig gsal ba 'di// gcig bu'ang gang la yod gyur na// gan gyi mi thub mi sod cing // bdud pa sogs pas non mi 'gyur// de 'argyal po rdo rje 'dzi// rdo rje sems
273b1(rgyud): der gshegs// ku mchog dngos gung rten pal// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bgru ba 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchos dang polas shin tu gsang ba ma
273b2(rgyud): 'byor thams cad kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba'o// de nas rtog pa thams cad dan yod cing thogs pa med pa mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba rgya che zhing bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing shin tu tshad med pa ma lus
273b3(rgyud): lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa 'dangos grub thams cad ra 'ang srub par byed pa mchog tu grub pa'i phyag rgya'i chung bshad par byaro zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rbad pa
273b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// g.yon pa'i pad par bkod pa yi// dpas kyi pad mi bde bar// sems dpa'i skyil po krung bcings te// ra nyid lus ni drang por 'dzin// rdo rdzogs pa
273b5(rgyud): kun las rgya la// mchog gi dngos grub kun gyi byed// mug du thugs kyi rdo rje mas// rdo rje sems dpal nyid du 'gyur// 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa'a'am// sangs rgyas nyid ni gci can nyid// dngos grub
273b6(rgyud): dbang phyug yin// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsus so// dkyil 'khor du ni mazhugs kyang // phyag rgya chen
273b7(rgyud): par// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang // phyag rgyas mched cing bkur bar 'gyur// gang gis 'di mthong phyag byed dang // bstod pa dang ni mchod par byed// ston pa mthong dang phyag byed dang / 
273b8(rgyud): la bdag pa mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub kun gyi tshogs chen po'o// bde ba phun tshogs dbang phyug ce// phyag rgya chen pos grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyes pa 'dra// lha la sogs pa
274a1(rgyud): na tsa 'byin rlabs pas// bsgrub sa pa'i stobs kyis mchog kun 'byung // de nas log mdang sa ma med pa'i ji rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po kun gyi dkyil 'khor chen po thams
274a2(rgyud): ma na chos pa // da ma ga pa ga c-i ma pa ma sunam pa da byud la9 sa gas gas ma kyid
274a3(rgyud): chen po'i phyag tu 'dab chen po'i rdo rjegasang pa 'dam tshig ces bya ba'o// de ci bani 'di yin te// sor mo thams cad mnyam snar bas// rdo rje thal mo nas brjod do// kun mchog da du snga mas
274a4(rgyud): yis// rdorje bsdams pa bshad pa las// rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni// ladzub mama' po yang ngag sbyar// galas pa'i babong rtags kyi ni// rtse mo bkug nas bcing bar bya// mad lnga bsdus pa
274a5(rgyud): na sa~M/ da me cings pa na dganas gima'i pa dzi rdzu rnams// de ka/ nga ba snams 'das nas// da da kyigs sa/ 
274a6(rgyud): 'i tshul ni de nyid kyis// rang she snying kar lugs kyu brdeg/ lcags kyu'i rgyal po 'di mas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ba che// dga' ba'i rdo rje lugs kyu dku// slar yang nye ba'i snying pa
274a7(rgyud): / dgapa drag sa na// rjes su chags pa 'i mams gdungs// snying 'i 'phrog pas 'a gyur da kyis// myur du nyon nas thub par 'gyur ni ma macom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang cing
274b1(rgyud): dang na na ldan 'das da na pa sug sa pa sa// nga bzhin du zhi dag shegs pa thathas rang / thung chub sems dpa ma mags papa pan pang nga ma
274b2(rgyud): sa deta ba pas 'ongs teg pa'i grub par 'byer do// gal ma ngas ni 'jig par 'gyu 'o//  rten pa dang ngan meng pa'i dam mi garjes byaba'i snying po mchog gi phyag d+ha'o// da bachod pa
274b3(rgyud): ba mo shin tu rab tu brkyang po'i thal mo'o// de nas dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyang bus ma'i rdo rje gzung ba'i me tog gi lcug mas bzla bar bya'o// rdo rje'i chu dang rdoH/ khu yur gyis dbang bskur na/ thams cad
274b4(rgyud): bdag po nyid dang tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad la dgas pa yin pa sabatung ba byas na mug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa yin no// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i
274b5(rgyud): ni// bad rag lum dang la T+wAM ga/ bcings na ci nus par de dga'// rdo rje gar bskor darol ba li// yongs su bskor bas 'dzin pa che// ka pu mra ba'i sbyor ba re// spyi bor bzhag ste phab nas kyang // rtse
274b6(rgyud): sa 'dzubya ma mthe'u chung sogs// bkrol nas rdon can la bam// 'di yis dkyil 'khor ma nags kyang // darje slob dpon nyid pob 'gyur// nga nyid zhags pa tsam gyis ni// mchod pas don
274b7(rgyud): ro// yongs su rdzogs // ya na sa da pa'o// matan la mnas mad mtshan nas// mthun ma dang gnasal ba// ba dgasum mchog la n+d+hag
274b8(rgyud): babs mtha' ma la sogs dkrol// srog 'argya mchog sus skor ba la mo// rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do// sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje ni// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas mchod// sgeg pa dang bcas pa
275a1(rgyud): m-ig gis phyan 'tshal bas rjong sems dpa'ang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags par byas nas drug byed drugazhug pa'o// rdo rngabal mo bskong bas ma lus pa rgya
275a2(rgyud): nas thams cad la bstod ci'i phyag tu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lcags kyu mchog rdo rdo pa sdams pa'i mthe bo ston ci skyel ma krung rdu sa gnyis bkrug pa'i yul can dbus
275a3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i kha 'a bus pa'i mchog ga yan lagasuM bor gzhag la galas logs su thams cad la cod pa ne bcings la bdun lan sa rdo rje chur gnyis kyis mabu pa'i tshul bya ste// phreng ba bcings pa
275a4(rgyud): byas la sgeg pa dang bcas pas ma le lu drung la sogs pa bkrol te logs gnyis pa dang byang la bcings pa'i tshul du byas la mnyam pa'i thal mos rgyas btab pas/ rdo sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba
275a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin no// de nal bde ba chen po 'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu du 'gyur bar byas te// mas cad kyi rdon slob dpon nyid dang ngo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ba yin no// rdo rje sa chud kyis rdo rtse
275a6(rgyud): rje 'dzis mtsho 'dug par po sbyin pa / tha ba'is kya sring pon pa yon dul mede nas ma nyon pa 'i gas pa'i de las 'a 'ams cad rnams sa kyi slob dpoms
275a7(rgyud): la me the sko pa'i phyag 'tshal pa'i phyag rgyas slong bar bya sted na dkyil 'khor ba na// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi la phrug grub pa 'chang chen
275a8(rgyud): po bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ bdeb chen po legs chen ba 'i lugs kyu rang gi snying par sngags lan gcig brjod pas rdo rjesams dpa' spyan drang ba'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
275b1(rgyud): bya'o//  grus 'i glu len cing // banapa mabyon ni gyi da bar// rdo rdzag gyi mchod pa yis// ma nga / mchod nas myur du thug/ de la ma dang mdza rigs papa'i grwa tshad dang com sogs pa rnams kyis za

281a1(rgyud): mas so byams pag brtson 'grus ga/ ting 'dzinan/ shes rab ga ye shes so/ slobs po// zhabs so// sa par brjod pa la phrag rnas so/ m-i/ spyong pa mang sos yang dag par rig/ 
281a2(rgyud): ba'o// ma 'dres pa'o// chos so// las so// lus sna tshogs so// sems can gyi don no// sangs rgyas kyang don ro// lus so// ngag go// yid do// rdo rje chen po'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+ra/ os man ta b+ha tre tsan+d+re ba/ 
281a3(rgyud): oM tsin+t+ra ma Ni/ oM a ne ro d+ha/ oM dzi ti bi ra te/ oM sarba dzA me/ oM ma hA rAg d+harmA te/ oM bid+me ka ba tsa/ oM badz+ra dre TI tsita te hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shudad+hAHd+harma tAdz+nyA na bi shud d+he/ oM karma bi shud
281a4(rgyud): puMm b+ha bidz+ri NI phaT/ oM karma ra e/ oM badz+ra badz+ra Ni/ oM hUM sarba d+harma na/ i hrIH/ i e kA ro mu khaM/ oM prad+d+ha pA ra me tA yaM/ baM hUM/ oM aM/ oM sarba ta bA ga ta kI yAwe oM sarba ta bA ga d+haH
281a5(rgyud): esarba ta thA ga ta tsid ta badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngag gi phyag rgya ni dbyangs shin tu bab pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i chos kyi ngag steng bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
281a6(rgyud): med par 'grub po// de nas pazlas pa ni dze rnga pag/ bsgrub pa ya de bzhin no// las lta bar spyor ba ni de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 
281a7(rgyud): kyai phyag rgyab ci pa'o// de nas rdo rdza nyam ma ltar yar ba'i phyag N+Da bcing pa ni de la phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid thams cad kyi rjes so// nga mtshig gi byas kyi'i rgyud rirdo rdza bsdams pa nang dung
281a8(rgyud): ba masems cad kyi bar ba dkyil la ra gyin pa ba rdo rje bzhag sa khams gsum pa thams cad bsreg pa dang / 'chad bdang / mal ba byed pa dus te bcom las kyi
281b1(rgyud): dbang du byed par u so// de nyid kyi dzin pa'i song mo sdigs 'dra ba bya zhing g.yas pa'i lcags kyus dgug par byas na thams cad dkrugs pa'o// rdorje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni rdzo 'i rdo rje su tshur gnyis pa'i rdo rjes ma
281b2(rgyud): / chung gi lcags gru bcings te/ des sdigs 'dzub bya zhing las thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad nyams su myong ba yin no// rdo rje thal mos 'dzub mo bcings la khro gnyer thur du gzhag par bya zhing me stag tu
281b3(rgyud): 'phro zhing g.yo ba ni rdo khro gnyer ro// thams cad sreg par byed pa dang / thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / rab tu 'dul bar byed pa ni khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo lags par bskor bas g.yon pa'i dzu
281b4(rgyud): lcags kyu ste/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bsgrub pa thams cad pa dor yod pa'o// rdo rje pad ma dbus mnyam pa'i kha bus kyi mdzad do// rdo rje pad ma ni thams cad gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams ni
281b5(rgyud): dang 'dzub mo'i gdu bu la g.yas pa'i hUM gis 'dzub mo bzung ste thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang mchog tu grub pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzod las byung ba ni kalpa pa'i 'dzub mos g.yon pa'i yi ge hUM bzung ba steg
281b6(rgyud): da 'dren pa zhes bya ba thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa dang 'bigs par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi mchog go// rdo rje bsdams pa'i g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur g.yas pa'i theg
281b7(rgyud): kyis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba ste thamA da dral bar byed pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi ma be'u chung yang dag par btung ba g.yom lag pa'i steng du gzhag pa ni kha T+wAM ga bsgreng pa // ga
281b8(rgyud): pathams cad kyi phyag tu phye zhing dral bar byed pa dang / rgyas 'debs pa dang / kas de ba dang / pha ba la sogs pa'i yo byad pams cad g.yas pas 'khor mo ba rung ba'i tshul srid ci dor bsgre khams cad gcod par
282a1(rgyud): gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje chen po'i khro ba 'dra 'o gagalas pa rdo rje 'a be'am pa dang spor ba sro ning dayo ba'i 'da' ma tshan gyi bdan gsum mo// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bo dang 'dzub mo gnyis
282a2(rgyud): jilas byung ba'i srin lag mnyam par sna na mapa la chung la bye'o// dpal mas cad byed pa dan rnam par thal bar byed pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang / thams cad 'bebs par byed pa'o// \u0f7f
282a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i dbang bsrur bshad pa'o// rdo rje'i rigs rnams cad kyini/ rdo rjethal mo mnyam sa de/ 'dzu mo gnyis kyis dadang byangs cing / maH ba srin lag rdo rjon/ yongs su bskyor te dbang bskur // 24
282a4(rgyud): grelnga pa phyag nas gzung bar bya'o// ci 'byor pas slob dpon la yon phul te dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems pa
282a5(rgyud): gsungs so// rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje te ri ts+yai r-I las 'byung ba ste don yod thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kye ma
282a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'u chur g.yon pas snyems pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / g.yas pa'i rdo rje chud kyis rdo rje ga sor ba ste 'dis thams cad rgyal ba dang / 'bar ba dang / sreg pa dang / lung 'dang / rgyas btab pa dang / kas
282a7(rgyud): spong ba dang / khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bdang/ brtan pa dang / g.yo ba thams cad la nges par sbyor ba dang / dngos grub pa dang / mchog thams cad bskul ba gad da 'i la sa rgyan rdo rdza 'u tshu
282a8(rgyud): 'dzub dang bcas pa'i 'dzub mo ni khro bo'i rdo rje su gyur ro// de dag gi las dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis thams cad dgug pa'o// snying gar gcig shos dang g.yas pas gdug
282b1(rgyud): ca gcod pa'o// 'khreg ma'i mdud pas g.yas pa'i khro bo 'gugs pas thams cad dgug pa dang rab tu gzhug pa'o// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i mda' 'phangs pa'o// de bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa
282b2(rgyud): bar gyi sbyor bas rang gi phyag rgya gyen du 'phangs pa'o// las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rkyen du 'phang ba'o// las kyed mchog gaphyag rgya gnyis su byas la rdo rje thal mo rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ste rdo rje gar kyi
282b3(rgyud): bas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya steng du dor rab ste thams cad la rgyas gdab pa dang / bslab pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / 'tsho bar byed pa ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa'o// de nas ngag gi phyag rgya ni sprin
282b4(rgyud): bla sgrogs pa'i hUM yig hUM phra ba'i sgra dang bcas pa khro zhing gsal ba'i khro ba'i rdo rje dag go/ bslab pa'i don bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ma grub na las kyi phyag rgyab cing ba'o// bsgrub pa ni de bzhin du phyag rgya
282b5(rgyud): lan gcig tu bya'o// las la nges par sbyor ba ni khro gnyer gyis so// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba'o// ske tshe dang bcas pa'i til mar non po'i sbyin pasreg ni g.yas pas so// de nyid kyis btang ba'o// 
282b6(rgyud): kyis rnams cad 'ching ba'o// g.yo ba med pa nyid do// gnyid log pa bstan pa'o// khro ba'i rdo rje lta ba'i sdigs 'dzub go phyag tu slong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'dzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas skyes / 
282b7(rgyud): de dag nyid kyis gdu bubacing ba'o// mche bas btsir ba'o// de nas dral ba'o// g.yas pas dag pa'o// 'jab mo gnyis kyis 'bar ba'o// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo g.yon pa spyang ba'i tshul
282b8(rgyud): dzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar bar phye ba'o// gcod pa'o// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis sor po sbyar ba'i rtse mo gcod pa'o// lag pa gnyis mnye ba'o// thams cad du sor ma thams cad dor ba'o// gcig car
283a1(rgyud): phyag rgyad krol ba'o// drang zhing g.yo bas sdegs 'dzub po// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo gdengs ka bstod pas sdigs 'dzub po// g.yas pa'i 'ju ma mamangs mazung ba la/ dra ba dang / 'gad pa
283a2(rgyud): dang / drug pa la sogs pas bstan pa'o// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis me gol rdebs pa'o// g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// sa lo rab tu bzhag pa'o// bskyod par bya'o// gar
283a3(rgyud): 'byin pa'o// brlab par bya'o// thams cad du bslab par bya'o// ta ha ra dgod pa'o// bskor ba'i dgug par bya'o// drang bar bya'o// gtang bar bya'o// yongs su bskor nas nub par
283a4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas dor ba'o// myur du dor ba'o// de bzhin du kun nas 'dren pa'o// de bzhin du gyen du drang ba'o// rang nyid kyis ngar byalan du bar bya'o// bdag nyid la brdeg par bya'o// TI shar bdag par sbyin pa
283a5(rgyud): dngar bya'o// sdang bar sdom pa'o// rang gi gos pasto par bya'o// khribs de bzhin du 'bar ba ston pa'o// galas pa'i 'dzub mo lcags kyu'o// de nyid kyis rab tu gzhug pa'o// 
283a6(rgyud): pa'i sagol lo// g.yon pa'i so sol lo// lce reg pa ni 'dzub mogaces kyis so// yan la gal ba sdug yas su bska bas 'khyil ba'o// ltung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o// dus su bsgos pa'o// khro ba'i ltabs shi
283a7(rgyud): rlung rnams la med kyis 'dod pa'o// de bzhin du la la'o// lta ba'o// smin ma'o// sa lo bu'o// phyag rgyas brdeg pa'o// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'o// khro ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig byed kyi lhags so// dzums pa zed

283b1(rgyud): skyen / klung ma gas na ma sa tu ba ga/  ku bya kyis pas gang du 'gyung la ba thobs sodang cing ga rlom ma rgyagasumangal gdug pa'i kyis

283b3(rgyud): kyis so// g.yon pa'i dril bu dral ba'o// nga bzhin du rdo rje d+ha mad dkyigayas pa'i khu tshur g.yon pa'i rdorje khro bos mnan te/ ma he'u chung gi gdu bu bkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog par bya'o// g.yas pa'i dril bu rdza
283b4(rgyud): ga 'a dang bral ba sna na da kyis mi la ma rol gsas rnam pa ma du cag yon gams 'ong tha na kyis snyan nyid yin du 'brel bas 'phrog pa la dang lta d+hA
283b5(rgyud): dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// de nas 'phags baspyad ras gzigs dbyang phyug
283b6(rgyud): rgya'i rlung ni bad ma chen po rje'i bal mo ba srub pa da ma dpa se bong dang mthe po chung la phye ba'i 'dabam bzhi bcos nyid thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa'o// phyag rgya chen pa

284a1(rgyud): mang tshan pa'i na kyi'i 'jam mo mnyam pa ga yab / babang par gzung ba pa ma'i slob ma zhes bya ba'i byab rgya'o// pa mchen po 'i bdan rin po cha gnyis bzung zhing des pad ma sbyin / 
284a2(rgyud): / 'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad las thob pa dang thams cad rjes su chags pa dang srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi chags thams cad las stsol ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i shin tu grub pa zhes/

284a4(rgyud): tshe 'i khro gnyer gyi sman no// rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon kyi'o// g.yon pa'i 'dzub ma kra/ ma rba bos yongs su gzung ste dung gi dbyibs de g.yas pa'i mthe bong bsgreng ba'i gnyen ste/ 
284a5(rgyud): mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i pad ma dang / sor mo lhag pa yang dag par brkyang ba'i 'khor lo na pad ma'i lca 'dug ma'o// dam pas byung ba'i 'dzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang po
284a6(rgyud): lhag ma kha phye ba'i bad 'a las byung ba'i zhes bya'o// rta mgrin gyi ni 'dzub mo gnyis shin tu sbyar ba'i lcags kyu rgod ma'i kha shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang / mthe 'u chung dang gnyes rab tu
284a7(rgyud): brgyang pa so so'i phyel g.yon g.yo zhing bzung ba ni pad ma'i ljags su zhes bya ba'o// 'di rnams kyi dbang bskur ba thams ca dang / las thams cad dang / grol ba thams cad dang / dgug pa thams
284a8(rgyud): gru don yod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyab shad pa'o// de nal las kyi phyag tu ni Sha d+h+r-i ka bcing sa nas pad ma'o rigs thams cad kyi mchogs snyas ladzin ba zung
284b1(rgyud): bab so// ngag gi ting po 'dzin gyis ga 'dus dkrug pa ni chos kyi dgagis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o// pad ma chen po bcings nas pad kyis sbyin pa sreg bya'o// sems kyis ni bar bya'o// dngos po bsrung bar bya'o// ma par/

284b3(rgyud): rdorje rin chen te mtho bong dang 'jun ma' sor cho ma na'i rtse mo mnyams nas 'og tra rab tu bsdus te/ dbang bsrung ba'i rdo rjebal mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o// des kyi sta ba bzhin du dab
284b4(rgyud): slar ba'o// rdo rje de nyid snying gar ro// gyen du kha blta ba'o// de nyid khu tshur ro// khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// 'di nyid gnyis su bzhag nas las kyi phyag rgyar ga
284b5(rgyud): dbang bsrung ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i byeti gyi mchod bathob pa'i don yang dag ste / rdzogs pa'o// bcom ldan das kyi las kyi mchog ni byasal ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshan pa'i khu nar TI
284b6(rgyud): rab stod nas g.yas nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o// nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya nyid kyis so// snying po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka' bsgo ning de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor ba'o// gal te ma gru na dbang
284b7(rgyud): bsrur bar gnas pa'i rdo rjerjen chen gyis dam mkhar las thams cad kyi bka' bsgo'o// chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni 'di'o// don yod thogs med grub pa dang // las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang / ngag sa

285a1(rgyud): // dang g.yas na mdar gtong ba'o//  rnams kyi mtshig ni 'jug pa la bya ste/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe chung zhi gdu bus lu gra r+b+ha bcing bar byas la 'dzub mo dang dbus ma dang / 9
285a2(rgyud): mnyams te cigasum pa la mtshan pa ni med pa rnams kyi la// sa bzhin du sathung bas lha mo rnams kyim/  rdub sdams pa'i dbus pa dang srin lag zhes sor ban mo bzhi pa 'dzub med pa ma
285a3(rgyud): mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// srin mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// gang gi ched kyi la 'a por gyi brtag par mchus na de'i tsher de bcings te bltas na dbyi 'khor
285a4(rgyud): brtag pa dang mthong ba dang mchod paci 'gab par 'gyur ro// gdangs gcan gyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mtha thong bcings nas phyi rol tul bltas pa'i sor mos gdapas ka sgreng ba ste/ klu thams cad dgug pa dang / 
285a5(rgyud): zhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'adam tshig ste/ gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// lto 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// dbus ma srin lag bzhi'i mdud pa legs par
285a6(rgyud): dpe'i sbyor bla nar nga cing bsngas la mas b.rung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis brdeg par bya ste nye bor 'phel bdug thams cad 'bar ba'o// kun nal bsdus na dug thams cad 'ching ba'o// 
285a7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad baba' ba dang 'pho ba dang dug med par bya ba'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor na rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas bur du gzhig par bya'o// phyi'i byag cu'i rgyud do// 
285a8(rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag nas/ ba dan gsum ni yongs su bzung // rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya ba/ dor na thams/

285b4(rgyud): rje chen po'i nod na byang ni kyas / de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bslabs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshigs kyi phyag rgya'i chud ni 'di yin te/ de la
285b5(rgyud): re shig dang po'i dngos grub brgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong du 'gyur to// ci lta ba bzhin du dmachog phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis log pa g.yas pa dang / 
285b6(rgyud): bdag gi rdo rje chen po'i sbyor bas las thams cad kyi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i stong nyid du 'gyur te rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pas so// de ltar rang gi phyag mtshan gyi khu d+har dza rje kar las
285b7(rgyud): byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang po'i las kyi tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa gsum mo// de ltar lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa'i cig shos kyi sa las thams cad rab tu sgrub par
285b8(rgyud): byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya srong bzhi pa'o// de ltar ma lus pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ni lag pa gcig zhes phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o// de ltar 'gro ba kun don du/ 'khor
286a1(rgyud): dang ma chag las dang bcas// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa no// rdzas ma sa dpa pa sgrib par mdzad// des ba ba na na bya// mchog tu 'grob thams cad sbyar byed ga/ mchog dang
286a2(rgyud): bla ma bla na med// gsal ba'i rgyud ning yis yang dag bshad// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po las rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyang ngo // nganas sngon pa rdo rje 'dzem/ gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas// 
286a3(rgyud): du phyag na'i rgyud can po'i// mtshan cha dam pa'i de gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pathams cad byegs ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba/ 
286a4(rgyud): chel zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa/ gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa/ bla na med pa'i bla ma mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams
286a5(rgyud): dkyilas rnamapa sgrub pa po ngan yod cing posra ba med pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang bas gsungs so// ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung la dga' ba chen pos dang zo'i rdo rje'i lta bas/ 
286a6(rgyud): lnga zhing byed pa dag gis ma lus shing thul pa med pa 'angs grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// bde ba chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// 
286a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba'ad pa chen po la dgod cing brtan pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i byed pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs

287a2(rgyud): mas ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod mi ma nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa gang // gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// de bzhin gzhan la sbyin me bya// gang gis gru

287a4(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang ba'o// rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin skyer// byag rgya

290a1(rgyud): ma mi 'gyur// de nas rnam pa dzin/ kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba// thams cad mdzad cing thams cad ma khyen/ thams cad sgrub par mdza pa yin rnam

290a5(rgyud): dron yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o// sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grung thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag

291a2(rgyud): kar men mo 'deg pa'o// lcags kyu brdeg pa'o// g.yon pa'i sngags ku lag pas pa de gzhugs pa'o//  lcags kyu'i rtsom btsir ba'o// phan tshun sems byung ba'i snying kar byis pa'o//

291a4(rgyud): dmachog dang / dkyil 'khor dang / chos dang / ye shes dang / las dang / pade ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams
291a5(rgyud): sa byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i ljags kyus so// kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so// mthe bo rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su brung ba'o// 'dzub mo rdo rje'o//

291a7(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo btsir ba'o// 'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang

291b1(rgyud): kyi mchod pa lnga dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gnon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjes su chags pa ni rdo rje ltabs so// rab tu dag pa'i bsgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo bar byed pas rgya
291b2(rgyud): bdung btung ba'o// chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs rings por gtong bas so// de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung po gnyis bstod pas so// thams cad kyis
291b3(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying kar gzhug pas so// yod pa thams cad rnyed pa ni mig dgugs pas so// 'dod pa'i chags 'a bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i dman pa'i gdong gis bstabs
291b4(rgyud): thams cad 'bebs pa'i chog ni rang gi snying phra bar bstod pa'i las rnams kyis so// 'dod pa'i chags pa gsang ba ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid ldang bar byed pas so/ 'dod pa thams
291b5(rgyud): kyi rjes su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka' baspobs so// de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar stso
291b6(rgyud): na 'ang+ga a cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub g+has nas brta na 'gru'i bar 'gyur to// zhes byab bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas ga sungs so// de nas

297b8(rgyud): da/ de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni// rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir// sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas
298a1(rgyud): bsdus shes bya'o// de la tsa ltar na nam mkha' snying po yin zhe na/ thams cad nam mkha' bcom ldan 'as// sems can bsod nams mtha pa nang che// nam
298a2(rgyud): mkha'i snying po sems papa'i dang // de nas nor bu rigs kyi ni/ dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che// nor bu chen po'i rig grub pa// palam pa thams cad yos
298a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ngoyon nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ #
298a4(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la// spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje spu// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o// de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de lon nyid // kun mchog dngos grus
298a5(rgyud): chen po yi// dbang phrag chen po'i mtshan chetshe// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// rdo rje rje lnga zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan kyi khon cid shes pa ni/ sangs
298a6(rgyud): thams cad sangs nyes nyid// sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje ches// nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de khon
298a7(rgyud): tede bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar thams cad dkrug pa'i rgyud yin den/ rtogs pa thams cad gsang tshan gyi// rdo rje lcags kyu dril ba
298a8(rgyud): pas/ rtabakug ste de nas rjes bslab pa// dril bu nyid kyis bya ba yin// ci lung mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga len zhen/ rtog pa kun gyigs chen gyis// rab tu
298b1(rgyud): sa mchod nas ni// rgyu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul pas// mchi dang slar yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la ca ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam chag chen// 
298b2(rgyud): po'i de kho na nyid yin na ni/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis// phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs// dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis// rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas// thog mtha
298b3(rgyud): med pa'i sems dpa' de// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba me// kun tu babang ba kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bdag ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes su'o// de ci ltar rang lhag pa
298b4(rgyud): b+ha thams cad kyi bsgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin nen/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // rtog pa kun las bslab bya gang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas thar+d+ha nA~M// 
298b5(rgyud): sa su bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje dril bu rab sad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes bslab pas// mchog dang lha sogs 'grub pa
298b6(rgyud): me pa mas cad paskye pa'i rgyud yin ne na/ bsgrub pa'i 'dod bsgrubs na ni// khyinas ci ltar 'dod pa yis// kyi 'dod sbed pa la spyod cing // thams cad byed cing sems cad baba'// langs pa
298b7(rgyud): de'adug pa 'am// gdo de kyi chag pa'am// dag pa dang ni sla ba 'am// gangader ci nan de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur// de dang de'i ngo bar bya// mnyam par banaganas rnam
298b8(rgyud): rang ga sdug pa'i sa slong bya// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di mas na// khams cad nyi ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngas tham pa ni// sa tu mtho shing grub par 'gyur// dpa na chen po
299a1(rgyud): nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhig dang pas klog/ de ni ldog kun dang bral bas// de sa grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchag na tshad khon nyid do// de myur / 
299a2(rgyud): dpal mchog dang ngo'i chog mnyams mchog gi bla ma gsal// mchog tu gsang ba bslab pa'i tshig bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol// rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bdegs
299a3(rgyud): sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa// bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gi de gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/ de nas ston pa
299a4(rgyud): rjedzen// mkhar ltar bug med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni// rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so// bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o// bde
299a5(rgyud): / chen mchog gi mchog dang rjes su chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni// kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug 'di ni gso ba yin/ 
299a6(rgyud): mtha' yas pa dang 'og med mthar thug med pa ni// mchod bu chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// nam mkhar dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol// den
299a7(rgyud): sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min// sems can rnams ni dman la nen cing nyung la dka'// dad pa med cing bslu ba byed la ma spangs pa// rtag tu rjes su cha
299a8(rgyud): shing chags bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan byer 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na'ang gnas gang gis rab tu po sgrub pa'am// yang na je bzhin gsungs pa ta/ 
299b1(rgyud): 'der sgrub byed// sau sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi las chags rnams kyis de ni gnod ma nus// rdo rje 'chung sogs sku ni gangagis ska
299b2(rgyud): pata ta gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ci bzhin gsungs// des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni ga
299b3(rgyud): nus// gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa// ci ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed// rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni// 'dod pa'i
299b4(rgyud): grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur// rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par spangs par mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dge phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min// 'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams
299b5(rgyud): kyang ni yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin// nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir du ni brtan par mdzad pa yi
299b6(rgyud): rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa// de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed// dngos grub chen po la thams cad rjesu chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang / shin tu
299b7(rgyud): ba dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po snyed po bsgrub byed pa// rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par
299b8(rgyud): de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// de byor 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab
300a1(rgyud): mchog sangs rgyas sras na lags so lags// sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so lags// rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs// dam pa chos kyi brga nyi
300a2(rgyud): legs so legs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag byin brlabs pa// rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che// ci ltar dang po'i grub pa de yizhin du// bye nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par
300a3(rgyud): 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsungs nas ni// sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yid rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang
300a4(rgyud): bo las rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs s+ho// // thugs dam sa'i snying po co lding du/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+ta kA ya sha
300a5(rgyud): sgra bskar gyi lo skye ba lta ba chen po dge slong bla ma ni tsa 'od kyi nal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lo ts+tsha chen po rin chen bzang po yis// dpal mcho
300a6(rgyud): dang po'i rgyud 'di bskur ba la// bar par dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas// ba dag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bskur// // ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn
300a7(rgyud): DA ga to bye ba dang / teSh+Thany+tsa yo na ro d+ha e baM byA dI ma hA shra ma NaHstag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus dag/ ldan gnyis zhus/ gsum zhus byas/ 
300a8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya prad+d+he pA ra mai tI na yai sha ta pany+tsa sha ti trA~M/ zod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya sngo bcu pa
300b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagags thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa nin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i
300b2(rgyud): brag rnams tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pa ni gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/ 
300b3(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ sna tshog
300b4(rgyud): bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i srin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ 
300b5(rgyud): pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ 'dod pa'i khams
300b6(rgyud): cad nor bu rin po che chen po rab tu smras pa dang / ba den kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rngam dang / chun phred dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla blta
300b7(rgyud): mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shes pa thams cad bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ 
300b8(rgyud): ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pas na rdo rje dang / sman ral gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi la
301a1(rgyud): lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bya
301a2(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig ste/ yongs su bskor tsang mdun gyis bzlas nas chos ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam
301a3(rgyud): dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba/ par du dag pa/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
301a4(rgyud): yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas pa
301a5(rgyud): b+ha ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas don 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas
301a6(rgyud): ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa
301a7(rgyud): ni 'di la ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di
301a8(rgyud): chub sems ngo'i gnapa po// mas parnam par dag pa'i garas de nges ste/ byang chub sems dpa regarnaMs so// kun rnam pa ra ga la legasapa de se sa ste/ byang chub sam
301b1(rgyud): rnas sa// yang cham par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
301b2(rgyud): pa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i senas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

301b5(rgyud): 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dge ba ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi bar dadu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// lag na rdo rje su
301b6(rgyud): las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad
301b7(rgyud): mchod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'o sgrub pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib po chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi
301b8(rgyud): 'gyur// sdug pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// desu zhig 'dze pa dang / nyin re ning daklog pa dang / ba ton byed pa dang / tshul poni de yid la byed pa
302a1(rgyud): der tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba
302a2(rgyud): dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur
302a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag ni/ 
302a4(rgyud): sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul
302a5(rgyud): don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'dis
302a6(rgyud): bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gser nas rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
302a7(rgyud): 'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi da kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs
302a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrib pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rjesra pa nyid kyi phyir rngo
302b1(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogal bar byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid
302b2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa phyi thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs pa
302b3(rgyud): byang rgyab bani byang chu'i chen po'o// lag na rdo rje yul la chos mngon par sgrub pa ban po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub
302b4(rgyud): snyi po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de na de skad kyis bka' stsalan
302b5(rgyud): com ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dbul te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
302b6(rgyud): so/ !a/ de nang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu zhes
302b7(rgyud): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gte mug gi smos
302b8(rgyud): ba sangs nyid // gti mug ge slo la'i med pa nyid kyi mchol thamal cad spros pa med pa nyid do// chol thams cad kyi rlol pa meng pa nyid kyis / merab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stsol pa meng pa nye
303a1(rgyud): rag par bya'o// na dang yul ya bya ba ral tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /  ba dang / kag pa dang / skam pa das 'al ba dbang gi byar kham
303a2(rgyud): skyes pa'i sems can thams cad pa med kyang ngan mang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// 
303a3(rgyud): donas bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo rjechom nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang 'argyas shing
303a4(rgyud): ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lta la pad+ma gang ldan dang dgod de/ mcheb btsags nas/ rkang pa g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po
303a5(rgyud): so// tahUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'dal de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye
303a6(rgyud): phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 
303a7(rgyud): dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig te sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam
303a8(rgyud): gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
303b1(rgyud): phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'drug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / 
303b2(rgyud): bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ mar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub
303b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de de gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmyal te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs
303b4(rgyud): mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs shes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum
303b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba she rab kyi pha rotu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ da'ang ba
303b6(rgyud): sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
303b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po
303b8(rgyud): rab tu 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo yo rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya tshor ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dmachog rin po che sa bya
304a1(rgyud): snying po 'di smras so// tAM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur
304a2(rgyud): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'deb pa de
304a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyug
304a4(rgyud): su 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 
304a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa na lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304a6(rgyud): phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams/ 
304a7(rgyud): cad dang / gos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
304a8(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i'u chur dam chog chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa la don ga
304b1(rgyud): 'di rgya cher bstan te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rjes pa'i phyag rgya po ma grub thams cad kyi dmachog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// aHdanal bcom ldan 'das chos thams
304b2(rgyud): spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas khang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
304b3(rgyud): stong pa nyid do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
304b4(rgyud): dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri
304b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po mchog 'di smras so// a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
304b6(rgyud): der 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs// 
304b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos tha
304b8(rgyud): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur
305a1(rgyud): denapa byang chub sems dpa' sems bskye ga tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing 'dzum dmyal nas rdo rje
305a2(rgyud): bskor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo sems cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ deras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas
305a3(rgyud): 'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams
305a4(rgyud): cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su slob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam
305a5(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyal ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dra ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin
305a6(rgyud): pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i
305a7(rgyud): rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam mkha' mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhi na rab tu 'dzul zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam mo
305a8(rgyud): ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la 'dul nus pa la yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su la
305b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i stong pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyi
305b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do// 
305b3(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin
305b4(rgyud): rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sprin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di sprul so/ haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
305b5(rgyud): ba chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'ang bshad do// thams cad mnyam pa
305b6(rgyud): ted pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyed pas shes rab kyi pha
305b7(rgyud): byin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyed du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang // 
305b8(rgyud): nga chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas don yod pa tham
306a1(rgyud): sad kyi mchog ces bya ba snyeng po 'di smras so/ hUM/ danas rnam ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can
306a2(rgyud): byan gyis rlo bzhes byab sa rab kyi rom tu phyin pa tshul 'a gad do// byang chub sems dpa sun tu babang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin min pas sems can thams ba ni/ 
306a3(rgyud): debazhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can ni rdo rje'i snying po can no// gang thaMd rab tu 'byung bla sems can thaMd ni chos kyi snying so // 
306a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bye ba byed pal sbyor bas sems can rnamapa cad ni las kyi snying po can no// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ci ro'i sgra byung nas chos nyid
306a5(rgyud): rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de Sho ni'i snying po 'di bul lo// d+hI/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha
306a6(rgyud): tshig 'i rgyun par thams cad jug pa dang / gzung pa dang / gzig ba dang / d+hUb pa'i dmachog ces bya rang gipa pona'i snying po sa ma so/ b+h+yoH/ de nas smra tshor
306a7(rgyud): la sogs pa maung phyogasum gyis pa ma ldan 'das la ga 'tshal te/ tshig 'thun par rang gi khona'i snying po 'di lo// / denas sri mo gnas bcom ldan
306a8(rgyud): sa pa sa sa / napa maldan sa gagag pa sa ma na ma mtshal da rnas
306b1(rgyud): mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis rlab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shel rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul 'ang shad
306b2(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' stsal pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pal rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid
306b3(rgyud): do/ nya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid papa chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin
306b4(rgyud): no// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klag pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / skom pa de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
306b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med pa'i mthar byin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin ba myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
306b6(rgyud): cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la leg le so zhes pa ba byin no// sems can chen po legs
306b7(rgyud): legs// bde ba chen po legs po legs// theg pa chen po legs sa legs// blo gos chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras// sangs rgyas
306b8(rgyud): 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dub ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mngos byin gyi sa brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bran med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams
307a1(rgyud): cad kyis// de dag mi mod mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / gla dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa
307a2(rgyud): ni mngon par bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros/ 
307a3(rgyud): pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma nga

307a5(rgyud): dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub
307a6(rgyud): dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams
307a7(rgyud): tu'ajoms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum
307b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni
307b2(rgyud): rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
307b3(rgyud): po rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog shin
307b4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can
307b5(rgyud): mya ngan mi 'da' byeng par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabal dang // ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag
307b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de smad phyir// 'khor ba'i sring du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar 'dam
307b7(rgyud): rab dmar yang // chos kyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ 'a
307b8(rgyud): nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pa sa na// sems camadon rnamal brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje yul la nang par langs nas mchos dang 'o nil rab kyi ma khro phyinapa
308a1(rgyud): tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par
308a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams car
308a3(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i 'o
308a4(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi
