308a6(rgyud): 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra pa'i sems hU~M phaT/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thamal cad / oM ba nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ mau de bzhin la
308a7(rgyud): spyod pa/ hUM A~M ngel byar gnod 'dzes rdo rje can/ phaT u~M 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ oM spang ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM/ thams cad 'dul ba/ oM hrIHoM a zhes bya
308a8(rgyud): oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ a baM hUM a oM/ oM bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsad rnam par dag
308b1(rgyud): / oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aHoM a/ sdig pa'i bcings pa thams cad chom shig/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar bgyis shA
308b2(rgyud): oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje/ hUM traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa
308b3(rgyud): dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sems can da/ 
308b4(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/ yi ger bri ba'am/ yi ger 'drer gzhug pa'om/ bklag pa'am/ 'tshang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ sti stang du bya ba'/ 
308b5(rgyud): mor bya ba 'am/ mchod par mi nus so// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems ca
308b6(rgyud): de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mngo bo la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi
308b7(rgyud): brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mor ma byas pa dang / sti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod pam byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya
308b8(rgyud): tsas kyi sgo'o rnam grangs 'di tshal ba ra ma nus mo// chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad gang ni spyad pa'i sa phyogs de mchong nyon du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thos
309a1(rgyud): glegs pam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag daphyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig can par
309a2(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yang ba ma spa
309a3(rgyud): pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang de
309a4(rgyud): skye'o// da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyings phyogs tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de sdang
309a5(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ga na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / 
309a6(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
309a7(rgyud): tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// @#// n+ya gar smad du/ sarba tA thA ga tA kA ya bAka tset+ta gu h+Na a le kA rAb+hU ho tan+t+ra rA dzA nA maHbod skad du/ de bzhin
309a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang brgyan gyi bkod pa nas bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal la/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi na pa'i kyi padral gus pas phyag 'tshal
309b1(rgyud): bdag gis nyim bdus ga gan/ colanams pa na na she klu nga gsung dang thug sad rdzo gas bang phyug can po
309b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam mig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
309b3(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rin po che chen po 'acod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
309b4(rgyud): thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las sna tshogs pa chen po dang / de bzhin pa
309b5(rgyud): mas cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po spro ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
309b6(rgyud): kyil 'khor chen po dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shel gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
309b7(rgyud): kye sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi mnga' bdag chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gzhung dang thug rgya rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po
309b8(rgyud): dang zhen gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug pa rdo rje ye shes dpe med cing mi mnyam bya rlung mnyam nam mkha' lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
310a1(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rigs dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig pa gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
310a2(rgyud): nga gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes pa rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'i dga' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i lha'i snying
310a3(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po la nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rwa
310a4(rgyud): pa rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'ang 'di lta ste/ sgo mthar yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / nam ma
310a5(rgyud): sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / a bo dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum tshan mo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
310a6(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / gzhan yang ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo
310a7(rgyud): stong phrag brgya la'ang 'di lta ste/ mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim pa'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / nye bar zhi pa'i bzhin ras she
310a8(rgyud): bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / gyen du blta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang // zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / ba ldang ba me zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo nga
310b1(rgyud): nas bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mi dang / ral pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun ma dang / 'ad pa mtshan ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug gi ba sgo nas
310b2(rgyud): rjebatsun mo dang / dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun pa rnams kyis yongs su
310b3(rgyud): mdun du bdar to// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di lta ste/ snying sprul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo
310b4(rgyud): mo chen mo dang / gdug pa thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / rjes su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pha nya ma chen mo dang / khrag 'gugs pa zhes
310b5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje po nya ma chen mo dang / thams cad 'brog par zhes bya ba'i rdo rje po nya mo chen po la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgyab pa'i rdo rje sgo sungs ma chen mo ma
310b6(rgyud): dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang / dam tshig gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs mtshan mo dang / 'jig
310b7(rgyud): yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo rlungs mtshan mo dang / bogam pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ste sgyings mtshan mo dang / gdul dka' 'dul nas bya ba'i rdo rje n-i srung sa ma tshan mel sogs
310b8(rgyud): pa'o// gzhan yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje thun ma chen mo rnams dang yang tsho la gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sdug slong thugs thamam cad rdo rjes 'ching bar
311a1(rgyud): bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rnga
311a2(rgyud): rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / bskal par gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o// gzhan yang dpa
311a3(rgyud): med pa'i rdo rje rob pa mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i
311a4(rgyud): pa mo chen mo dang / kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / rab tu dga' ba'i
311a5(rgyud): rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / thams cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang nam mkha'i
311a6(rgyud): khams med rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i gang rnams dang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dbadu phrag ces bya ba rdo rje'i lab chen po dang / ma' 'gros
311a7(rgyud): dbang phyug dang dri yi dbang phyug dang stug po bkod pa dang zla ba'i 'od dang 'dun pa sel dang skya bo yongs su dor ba dang legs par sbyangs pa dang 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang gdung ba skyed pa dang
311a8(rgyud): 'dul bar byed pa dang gdug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dong gnas pa po dang rtse ba can dang chos 'chad dang skyong ba po dang slo ba po dang
311b1(rgyud): rab po dang dag la sogs pa rdo rje la pa rnams so// gzhan yang mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje 'o nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di
311b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang rdorje mi 'khrugs pa dang rdorje nu dang gzhan yang dong rgyam po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang rgyas par byed ba dang dbang du byed pa dang mi
311b3(rgyud): thams cad zad par byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das
311b4(rgyud): brtagapa pa mchog gi mngar bdag ste/ kun tu bzang po'i sku yi ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor spros// bcom ldan rdor 'dzin legs par gzugs/ 
311b5(rgyud): gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
311b6(rgyud): kye yangab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhagal te/ rdo rje'i glur cis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus
311b7(rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas dun dor khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dred// chos kyi bla gros khyod la 'dud// chos rnams kun mchog
311b8(rgyud): khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud// dam tshig mchog gi mchog khyod 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud// grags pa chen po bdag cag ni// 
312a1(rgyud): mgon po khyed la zhu bcu// sangs rgyas thams cad spyad bye yum// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil 'khor mtshag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems da
312a2(rgyud): de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra zhig/ 
312a3(rgyud): rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams dad par mi 'gyur zhing rang gi sems yongs su sun 'byin la des ma mthe
312a4(rgyud): ba'i chos lam dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste/ mnar med pa rnams su skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung / 
312a5(rgyud): pabar 'gyur ro// de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro// brjed ngas
312a6(rgyud): rnams dang blo gros chung ba rnams dang khyi dang bya rog dang byil dang phag dang sdug dang glang po che dang seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro// de dang 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta
312a7(rgyud): ra mi bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i sum de rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
312a8(rgyud): sems cand rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis 'da'i ming gzung na yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// 
312b1(rgyud): rnams de'i rgyas de'i zla kyi sgring ba zad de bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro// de nas de dag yod dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das lda
312b2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshegs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang 'dra
312b3(rgyud): ragang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po 'od 'dra
312b4(rgyud): bo gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rang gi sku dang gsung dang thug la rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam pa 'di/ 
312b5(rgyud): stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum gyur pa// stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad/ ga ci zhig yas bstan par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// rims can rnams
312b6(rgyud): la phan bzhed pa// gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya// de kun skams snga ma'o// 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur shes// des na sgyu ma lta bu yis// sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya// namam
312b7(rgyud): khams kyis khyar pa yi// thams cad yul gyis med dag 'thugs// phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis// dben zhing dag la
312b8(rgyud): su ni data yid kyi legs par 'du byas pa// nam mkha' la ni thig gis gdab// thog mar da yes dam pas so// de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil la
313a1(rgyud): mu khyud dag gi rnam mdun du// kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya// dbus kyi cha ru dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor lo lta bur zla bar bya// kun nas brgyang ga
313a2(rgyud): mdzes pa ni/ dkyil 'khor pa'i yi dbus su'o// 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ sha pad+ma ze 'bru ldan pa pri Tha/ mtshams dang mtshams su 'dab ma ni// ji lta ba bzhin bsnyems pa
313a3(rgyud): pas/ rta srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs// grad bu bzhi yi nye bar spras// shasle ba ni dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs seng ge dag gis brgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa
313a4(rgyud): ngan sogs// bla res steng du bres pa dang // rin chen rdo rjes pad ldan sngan// dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khya ba// bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog/ rgyan phreng glang
313a5(rgyud): ldan pa ni// phyi ro// gnas te legs par dris// rtag dang mi rtog rnam spangs te// dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su ni// gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bya// mnyam par gzhag
313a6(rgyud): spro ba yis// sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya// de nas lha mo zhal bzhim// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba// phyag bzhi pa la sman yangs ma// phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chang
313a7(rgyud): bzhi pa'i g.yas par rdo rje ste// g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan// dkar dang dmar po cher sngo ba// stobasangs rin che mchog mdzes 'o'o// gtsug nA rin chen gtsug ta
313a8(rgyud): gtsug rgyan cod pan dam pa can// skal ba chen mo rong ldan ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par grubs// gos phyis stod ni lalas bsgril pa// bzhin gyi dkyi la
313b1(rgyud): 'a brdas shing // snga tsams gos kyis lags gyon pa// dbu ma'i zhar ras gser gyi 'od// zhabs gnas dbus su labar lo ste// mdun na rin chen bdun gnas pa/ 
313b2(rgyud): ldan ling gi'i khri// bai rdo rje 'dzin pa gradang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'gro ba// rgyag nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor no// dpa' bo yi mi bri bar bya// 'di yi mdun du bri bya ba/

313b4(rgyud): phyag rgyas phyag gzha gakrigs// gtsug ldan dar gyi chad par can// da pad+ma'i bzhin ras ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs// de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od// 8
313b5(rgyud): rernal 'byor ldan pa yi// dpa' bo das ni bri bar bya// rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgoms te// der ni bsnyams pas 'gro bar bya// dpa' bas lnga ru pri bya ba// gshin rje'i 'ang
313b6(rgyud): ma mdzes pa la// mchog ldan nam/ mkha' dge ma yong // rin chen khri la legs par bzhugs// bzhin rang sngol spyan dgar pa// 'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'on pag can// 
313b7(rgyud): rlan rin chen phreng ba mchog/ rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che// yid bzhin ner bu'i lag pa can// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dgongs mA// de nas blo ldan rab song ste// rub du yang ni de zhen
313b8(rgyud): dpal dang ldan pas legs par bri// chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma// dmar po'i gos 'dzin dge ba ma// gtsug na cod pan gyis smras ma// sbrul rgyad sna tshogs lus can ma/ 
314a1(rgyud): dar dang rin chen gyis klubs ma// pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi// phyag gi lo 'da' dang ldan pas// zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// nyi ma du ma'i snang ba
314a2(rgyud): nAt+ma/ dzi ltar rig pa bri bar bya// de nas byang dri sbyin nas su// song ste pa'i bas bri bya'o// mig yo bzhin ras grags chen ma// mar gang 'byur ba mtshungs pa mo// dkar
314a3(rgyud): dar gyis yang dag klubs// gtsug nA nor bu cod pan bzang // gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras// rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkra ma// sna tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas// zla
314a4(rgyud): pa'i gdan la yang dge bzhugs// 'od kyis btams pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas mtshams kyi 'dab mal// me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma// rdo rje snang byed dag pa ma'i/ 
314a5(rgyud): pa sngags rig pa yis bris// gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg/ rang gi bdag po'i phyogs su'o// 'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du// gzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen mo//

314a7(rgyud): bzhi dang // phyi rol tu yang lha la sogs// ming ni yang dag bri bar bya// de nas khrus byas byugs la lus// me tog bdug sogs kyis bdugs te// sna tshogs gos ni
314a8(rgyud): tam tog phreng dang gos kyi la brgya// gtsug phud kyang pan dang rdzad zhing // mdzel bo'i 'dir kyis yang dag klub la// rdo rje dril phu la zhi bar rdzun// spyod 'a'a'ajamam
314b1(rgyud): rnam gzhig gis// de nas thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje ma yo dga' thub che// bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas nas su// rdo rje'i sbyor bas

316a8(rgyud): dang ni bdag nyid dang // rgyal ba mangs spyod gter dang de// nor dang 'bru dang grong ging tA// glang po rta dang pa lang sogs// ma he dang nam he mo// gzhan dngaga'am yang ce 'dod
316b1(rgyud): chen pos dbul// bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog// thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya// de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la// rgyan phreng rnams dang 'azhad gang dang // sgeg dang rje 'jo ga' ba

323a4(rgyud): bris te bskrad par bya// de yi zhal du dgra bo ste// mongs pa'i 'dag nyid mi 'gror// de'i m+WAr dungs par 'chi// gsad pa la yang 'di nyid kyis// yongs su mnan nos nges par bzla/

323a6(rgyud): ltar gnas// ji bre da de ni dkyil sman// de la gtor ma sbyin par bya// gal te bgegs ni me smin// der ni mchod mon rab tug tug sa// thul mo gtel gzugs bkug pa yis// na
323a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas yum las so// phyogs bzhi dag tu pur bus gdab// de nas gnas rnams bskrad par bya// de nas mtshams ni bcings par bya// mnyam par bzhag ste bskor bar bya/

323b1(rgyud): kyang // las rnams dag ni thams cad bya// phyogs bcing bdag de bzhin srung // bur ru smad pa de bzhin no// den chen gsum ni thig mar sbyin// cha gcig dag ni nar 'dzin la'o// sdug

329b4(rgyud): grags// de bzhin mong med byil nas su// lhag pa rnams ni gdong du sbyar// phyag rgya chen po shin du ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol// phyag chu 'di rnams bsdams nas ni/ 
329b5(rgyud): rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur// kun du bzang po rgyal po che// lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod ce'o// de nas ma mo de rnams kun// slar yang gtso bo la bstod nas// shes rang chen

329b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i gni// gang gis myur du sgrub po kun// rab tu bde bor gnas pas 'grubya// de ngas bcom ldan rdo rje can// mnyes te gsang ba'i dpa' gsungs//

330a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub// de nyid rdo rje lta 'ur bya// spyod pas bde ba bskyed par byed// 'di ni chos 'dzin zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya gsang ba bsgrub pa'o// g.yon par

335b6(rgyud): tshar dmar ga// mda' lnga dang ni gzhu 'dzin pa// skye ba 'joms pa dpa' bo ni// lag na 'khor lo gzi brjid mchog/ de'i g.yon du bre bya ba// dkar dang dbar ba'i 'od chen po// rdo rjedzad sgrogs rgyal po// 
335b7(rgyud): 'khrol ba dang ldan pa// de'i rgyub du brib / yeng dang krung gub dang 'brag+sa/ l+h+wa ma phyogs su TI bA ga/ mkhar 'gro'i dbang phyug dpal dang lan// sngon po mar sprin dang 'dra'i// lag na 'a gro drin chen
335b8(rgyud): bdun dpal chen 'dad 'a yi// rgyal po bong ga nyid chen pa bri// 'od zer dbang po'i gan gzhu// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// de 'i lho ru bI bya ba// rdo rje rnam par smod pa mchog/ nyi ma nga
336a1(rgyud): lag pa can// rab tu rna pa'i 'bar ba'i phreng // de rje dam pa'i dul mdzadapa' ga// rdo rdo na chen mchog gi tog// bdag dka pa tshang sleg/ gas ldan rnam par 'phyang ba'o// derdo
336a2(rgyud): rigs// lag na rin chen shin tu mdzes// de'i rgyab tu'i bya ba// dgod dang bcas pa'i bzhin ras mchog/ de'i rgyab tu zi byas// dri mi dbang phyug dbang phyug che// la gan sadapa snying ga 'chad// ban du'i ma
336a3(rgyud): dam pa 'dra// de la mngon par phyogs pa yi// rdo rje sgrol ba sman mdzes bri// dkar ser babang po sna tshogs pa// lag na ut+pal sngon po bzang // de yi g.yon du dag pa yis// lag na 'khor lo ches dkar bri/

341a6(rgyud): thub shes pas dbang bskur ro// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam 'phrul gyis// der ni tshwa yis legs bzung ste// lce yi rtse mo mkhas pA smar// rdo rje'am yang na chu skyes kyis// phyag rgya dang ni phyag cha'i lan// 
341a7(rgyud): 'a par sbyin/ de nyid la yang mkhas pas bya// gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i bde ba bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang bas bka' stsal te// de nas yon
341a8(rgyud): pa laga'atshal mchod byas nas/ la dang bu mo nyid dang yang // sring mo yon bu mo dang // dri mo 'am yang na chung ma dang // rgyal po longs spyod sgra zan tshogs// brang dang yul
341b1(rgyud): khyod dang// nad dang rin chen po sogs dang // gnan yang ci tso 'do dang/ ma kho bo'i longs spyod gus pa yis// bla ma'i rnab pa la phyag 'tshal te/ ngos grub kun gyi da kyi phyi/ dkyil 'khor la yang legs pa
341b2(rgyud): yadang spun yang mchod par bya// de bzhin spun sA'i bu yang mchod// bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang // gos dang rgyan dang me tog dang / de bzhin dri dang bdug pa sogs// ji ltar 'dog pa thams cad kyis// mchod par byas
341b3(rgyud): bar bya// lha rnams dag ni thams cad la// de bzhin du ni mchod par bya// gsang sngags rgyal po gshegs su gsol// badz+ra muM des rjod pas gshegs// de nas sngags pas slob ma'i mchog de la// g.yang ba rnam par
341b4(rgyud): la gsang ba yi// rgyal pos gsal mdzad rgyal ba'i g.yang bdag gi// gsang ba mtha' dag legs par bslang par bya// ga sang ba'i phyag rgya mig yangs ma// blo gros brtan pas bsgrub par bya// nga byin brla
341b5(rgyud): pa yis// shes rab kyis ni byin gyis brlag// bdag nyid sems dpar legs bsgoms te// gsang brgyad gyi sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis legs 'grub par// 'gyur ba 'dil the tsom med// klu yo shes
341b6(rgyud): de yang kar nyid rdo rje 'chang gtso ste// nam mkha' kun gyis mchog dpa' bo// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor che// bdag nyid 'dod par bsgom pa yis// 'dod pa'i longs spyo
341b7(rgyud): nga 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gtso bo ste// de yang 'dod pa'i dbang la yor// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug kun// bran dang 'dra bar 'khol bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyi
341b8(rgyud): ri dbong bar// ga par 'gror ma ngon bskom par byad/ de ni sbyor bas drol na la su/ rang gi snying gar gzhug bar bya/ bcug nas rin chen chen po ni// sred pa mdzem la sar bsgom par bya/ yid bzhin min chen
342a1(rgyud): / mjom/ nyi ma bdun na de 'gyur ro// 'dam smras dam pa'i dwangs su ni// 'bar bas kunan sa yas dgang / dri ma dbang phyug rgyum ma khadag nyid sems dpar medas
342a2(rgyud): srung du blo ldan te/ dri ba'i bdag pa'i bdag por 'gyur// dri yis myur ba nyid du ni// brtan deng g.yo ba'i dug 'gugs kyi// don yod kyi ni dkyil 'khor du// snying po snying gi sbyor ba bsam/ yang
342a3(rgyud): bsams pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// de yi phyag rgya'ang de dang mtshungs// rin chen gyi 'ang rin chen che// rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gas pa// dang ni ni dri dang ldan pa'o// sgrub pa pa yis 'grub par 'gyurab/ 
342a4(rgyud): logs pa'i dbye ba yis b+ha ga nan dag kyang rig par bya/ dkyil 'khor ram ni dam tshig kyang // bskam pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// snying po sngags dang phrag rgya dang / rig sngags kyi ra
342a5(rgyud): yis// de mas ldan de nyid de/ skams ma myur du nges par 'grug/ 'dzini bcom ldan la 'byor/ shegs ba rkyen dgada' pas gsungs phyag rgya ni mi mchog gi mchog phyag rgya
342a6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa/ ngan 'di 'azhin ga she pa gas pa thaMd kyi yab dang / yum de rnams kyis gas lag byung du skyo sa mchog pasgrubs pas// bsgrub pa par ni lta krug

342a8(rgyud): gsu dug gdon sa bcom ldan sa kun du ba'anga' chen mam pazhi gshegs pa mas cad kyi gtsug tor rnam la tu brnam pa skyes pa zhes byab to 'i dzi la sa
342b1(rgyud): la tang yi/ na gshegs pad du durd su dmas tu nu rdo rje'o nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs 'arnams las rnam par phyung ngo // lha rnams kyi ni slong po dang // sngags
342b2(rgyud): de bzhin du/ dkyil 'khor du ni legs par bshad/ ji ltar sngon du kha deg sogs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsung
342b3(rgyud): dugasol// sems can rnams la phan pade'i byer// rnal 'byor mi yi phyag n+ya dang / mtshan ma la sogs dam pa rnams// de nas bcom ldan kun du ba'ang // rdo rje dam pa g.yor mdzad na// lag pa'i mtsha
342b4(rgyud): kAr chu pa// gang gil lha rnams mtshon 'gyur ba'o// lag pa zla ba nyi ma du/ mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ shes ra'athabs kyi sa ben ni/ rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu s+t+wa~M// sla yang srung

342b6(rgyud): pas 'grub par 'gyur// 'ching ba chen pos bcings nas su// lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i// gsang sngags rgyal po sngags rig pas// yang dang yang du byin gyis brla// bcangs te 'od ldan na
342b7(rgyud): gnyis// brkyang nas rtso mo sbyang bar bya// de 'di snying po zhes bya ba'o// nyis pa grags ba ldan pa yin/ snying po yis ni mtshan byas nas/ rim gyis snying gar bskor bar bya/ de rje mnyam par spyad byas te
342b8(rgyud): chings pa gzhug par bya// 'di ni dam tshig des bya ste// dam tshig ma lus sgrub par byed// 'di'is lha ma pa la yas na ka/ dzams cad du ni nges par 'grug// de nyid bsdigs pa lta bur sbyar/ 
343a1(rgyud): bya mchog tu 'gyur/ gnyin na 'dra'o// skung bar bstan pa mchog tu med// de las phyi rol bskums pa'o// gsum bdun 'gyur ba yin// snying ga runi spong ba bsam// 
343a2(rgyud): rnyeng dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod// rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar// dam tshig bdag byed nyid du 'gyur/ de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas gsal/ chen po'i las ni byed par 'gyur// de nyid mjed spung smra ba 'i
343a3(rgyud): rjed/ phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur// de nyid du skyes rnam pa ru// snying gar bzhag pa snying po mchog de bzhin rdo rje mnyam sbyar / dam tshig bdag nyid dag tu 'gyur// snying gar kun bsdi/

343b2(rgyud): rag su// mngon par phyogs te bzhag par bya// gzugs kyi snying po ches che ba'o//  hiti kha yi phyogs bzhag pa// sgra mi snying po med 'brog pa'o// nyid kyang bang bskum la nas su//  yi rnam pa la kha dul
343b3(rgyud): tang ba yi sbyor ba yis// de nyid la yang rnam pa ba ni// phyag rgya sngags pas shes par bya// ro 'phrog pa yi las rnams so// de ni gnyis su byas nas su// g.yas pa 'am ni g.yon pa yis// snying gar legs slar

343b6(rgyud): de legs par bzhag dalas 'das te sbyar yang 'ar// gakhas pas dal gyis bstosod par bya// de gnyis kying shar yongs su sbyar/ slems pas gu dang byed par bya// ji srid spyibar gdugs pa'i

343b8(rgyud): bar sbyar// g.yon pa'i stang du de bzhin gzhan// de dag spring kar 'asgreng bar bya// de ni phan tshun shes rab yin// sngagal pa chen pos sbyar bar bya// gzhan ni sbyo bas rnam par spro// 'di ni chos kyi
344a1(rgyud): rgya mchoka tu bshad// de bzhin thal mo mnyam par skar// snying ka ma gson par banag par bya// 'di ldan rnga rje gding pa dang // mdar bsdus nas ni sbyar nas su
344a2(rgyud): g.yas pa thur du 'phyang bar bya// de bzhin steng bskrun mchog smin no// me tog snyim pa yang dag sbyar// rdo rje gnyis ni dbus su bzhag/ bzod pa gnyis pa de la smrar// smin po dag ni phyi ru/

344a4(rgyud): pa spr-inga'i sbyor ba yis// yongs su bskor zhing bskor nas su// g.yas pa ru ni bzhag par bya// rdo rje thal me brkyang nas su// rdo rje'i steng du 'od 'dzes ma/ phyi rol sprul pa'i sgor

344a7(rgyud): gros ldan pas gzungs// de ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis// bltas nas lus can 'gugs par byed// de las sor ma'i rtse mo rnams// cung zad bsnob te brkyang bar bya// rdo rje mche ba lta

344b1(rgyud): sa kyus dgug pa ste// de yi mtha' gdong zhags pa'o// sog la'i zab mongs par ni/ 'dir ni thod pa nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni gnyis pa nyid yin to// las kun gyi ni dam pa spug/ de bzhin bcing pa
344b2(rgyud): gas ba cing nas/ rab tu sbyin pa brkyang bar bya// ga yas pa steng du byas nas su// bsad pa lta bur bcing bar bri// don rdo rje mdung thung de// srin po thams cad phye mar byed// 'dir ni de bzhin thod sa

344b7(rgyud): thig tu ni khams cad gzungs kyi phyag sas// dkyil 'khor du me ba tu bsgrags// 'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta / kyel 'khor ba ni ni rtag pas// de rje slob dpon gyis bya ste/ phyag na rjes pa

346a1(rgyud): / sbyar byas nas// rdo rjethal mo rab tu gnas// rdo rje bsdams par byab nas su// rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam// de nas shes rab che bsgreng ste// rtse mo cung zad bskum ra

346b8(rgyud): pa 'du rgyang bar bya// snying kar ba gleng ba zhes su shad// donyo 'og / tu bstan pa n-i/ dam tshig can zhes mo chu grags// rdorjechos su bshad pa ste// 'a jug pa par byed mchog/ 
347a1(rgyud): rnam par tsham zhes bya// lam kun byed pa'i dam bstar// lag pa bcings pa las bkrul te// shes rab mdzad du rab tu btag// di ni dmachog cher mdzes pa// daphyir de ltar chos
347a2(rgyud): g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni// mi snang mdzad des na las// rin chen 'dra ldan pa'i gdong // snying gar bzhag pa snying por 'gyur/ bsdams nas go char byas nas su// bskang ba dang
347a3(rgyud): / ceces su 'dod// 'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags// bsnun pa las byed pa ru brjod// bsdams las nyi ma rnam par spro// bskor ba dam tshig mchog yin no// lag pa'i mtha' mchos chen po/ 
347a4(rgyud): da las kun byed pa'o// bsdams las sbyin pa bsgreng bar bya// rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o// de nyid steng du bskor nas su// spros pas chos sgrub byed pa'o// rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las// 
347a5(rgyud): / ru ngam pa grub par byed// de nyid steng du smra ba ni// las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no// snying kar legs bzung snying po ste// mdzod spur bzhag 'ad mi chog mchog/ mkhar bzhag pa ni chos
347a6(rgyud): las rnams thams cad bslab pa'o// 'di ni bcom ldan dang can// reb kun rtog sa mdzad pas gsungs// de rje brtsams parnam par 'acing sa/ bad+ma'i rnam pa mchog tubya// ster ste

347a8(rgyud): la mo yang dag smra pa ni// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// 'ani cung ba dbye ni// dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no// snying kar shin tu gsal phyed// ma lus las ni rab tu sdug/ 
347b1(rgyud): dadu bad+ha ni// chos te mchog tu rma byung ba'o// 'di rnams kyis ni mur 'grub ste// sngags pas sngags kyis bskyal bas so// de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te// snying gang la ba la nyid du bya// 'dzi
347b2(rgyud): gsum pa nyid du 'gyur// rtsibs bani pa legs brgyan chos su blta// bskor ba las kyi rdo rje'o// 'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na// grub pa'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa legs bcu
347b3(rgyud): sha' / u dag tu bya// sbyid pa rin chen ltar byas pa// mams dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// snying kar chos kyi
347b4(rgyud): snying po rig sdug pa legs par sbyar// de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng // 'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin no// mche chung bzang po'i bsgyur ba// kun gong rdo rje ldan par bya// gnas ni bzhi yi
347b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grung // spro bor las su bshad pa ste// snying kar snying po rtag par bya// bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste// ngag gis kun bskul chos yin te// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyi
347b6(rgyud): gsungs// bcings nus shes rab drag ni bsgreng // 'od ldan dag ni rtsa bar gyur// 'di ni dang por shes par bya// thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro// bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig/ rtse mo mcheg
347b7(rgyud): drug yid gro// de bzhin du ni 'di sgyur bas// las rnam sa thams cad rib sgrub pa'o// gsang ba'i bcing 'alegs bcings te// rdo rje nang du de bzhin no// rnying kar rnal 'byor ba mi kur/ 
348a1(rgyud): kyini bla med//  bye dag brtag pa lags/  yi na migs pa yi// sangs rgyas ji ltar 'byung ba lags// d+hU ni ches ni bsnyen du las// ji ste ba sa sa
348a2(rgyud): snying po nga ts+tsha sa rgyun gyu// gtsun pa ga pa lta mag/ hrI namapa ga pa da// gtsu rnal byong mi cis/ rna sa grol rnam
348a3(rgyud): dang // banye ba da ma pa de'in // de ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing // rnam pa 'byung ba nyid dang med// 'bod nas ma sa rgyags pa dang // lag pa'i dgas pa 'i nyed bkra/ A
348a4(rgyud): ltar 'grub par 'gyur// gar dang grwa dang cher dgad pa// sreg dang smra baji ltar lags// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin de// gan pa dodang reg par 'gyur// me tog bdug pa mchog dang /

348b2(rgyud): shes ga sum du legs pa shad de// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni bsten pa nyid kyi ni// grong las na po ra tu 'jug/ bas chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas// gnyi ga da

348b6(rgyud): gsol ba btang bar shes// bcings pa brtan par byed pa'o// mnyes pa yis ni legs tshe ma yin// bskul ba 'phro ba nyid du bshad// bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni// gnyis su med pa zhes su

349a1(rgyud): rgya'o// lag pa'i 'od rnams lham ste// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bgrod pa'o// phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya ste// lag pa'i dgod pa'i nor pas sa// gang dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni// lha rnams
349a2(rgyud): thams cad mnyes par 'gyur// 'di rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams/ mtshad na dngos grub zeng ster nes bcom ldan 'ang kun tu babang blo bka 'astsal to/ gas brgyan gyi bzhi 'i rgyud can ga la gas btsun gyi bkod

353a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po legs par zung // sems dpa' chen po ni dga' bas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de 'di gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang phyug rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das
353a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ dpa' bo chen pos ci gsung ba'ang byung ye shes pha rol san// chos kun drab g+sag dpa' dang ldan// 'jig rten gsum gyi sdig 'joms pas// ji skad gsungs bzhin
